font-size: large;\">IT IS NOT SAFE TO RAISE THE WATER LEVEL OF THE 120 YEAR OLD DAM , MORE THAN 139 FEET...THIS CALCULATION IS BASED ON THE UPLIFT CAUSED BY THE WATER HEAD.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAVE BEEN A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS --I HAVE MORE EXPERTISE ON WATER ( THEORY AND PRACTICAL ) THAN THESE LAWYER TURNED JUDGES, WHO WERE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..AND THE THINK TANKS WHO ADVISED THESE JUDGES..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE SIDEWAYS FORCE OF ACCUMULATED BOTTOM SILT CAUSED BY WATER HEAD , IS ACTING ON THE GRAVITY DAM.&nbsp; &nbsp; THIS IS CALCULATED BY THE </span><span style=\"color: red;\">RANKINE FORMULA</span><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ON A VERTICAL WALL WHICH ERRS ON THE DANGEROUS SIDE AS THE BOTTOM WALL SLOPES ( A SAILBOAT MOVES AHEAD BY USING A WEDGE IN HEAD WINDS ) . .</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">MORE CRITICAL-- THE SOFT SILT OFFERS NO </span><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">PASSIVE PRESSURE.</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THIS IS IN ADDITION TO </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">VERTICAL WATER PRESSURE </span></span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ON SLOPING PART</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"> OF THE DAM UNDER THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVEL.</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THERE IS A HYDRAULIC GRADIENT ACTING UPWARDS FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE DAM WALL KNOWN AS </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">UPLIFT</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">.&nbsp; &nbsp;WATER ENTERS FISSURES OF THE FOUNDATION MATERIAL DUE TO WATER HEAD PRESSURE ..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CRITICAL : THE WEIGHT OF THE MASONRY OF THIS GRAVITY DAM WHICH IS REDUCED SEVERELY BY RAISING WATER LEVEL TO THE HEIGHT OF 142 FEET AS THE STUPID SUPREME COURT JUDGES ORDERED..</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF THE MULLAPERIAR DAM BREACHES--IT WILL BREACH THE CHERUTHONI DAM WALL ( IDUKKI DAM SPILLWAY ) ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE COMBINED WATER FLOW OF IDUKKI RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR RESERVOIR WILL KILL LAKHS OF PEOPLE AND DIVIDE KERALA INTO NORTH AND SOUTH KERALA WITH A WATER BODY IN BETWEEN.</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE CM OF TAMIL NADU WAS HELL BENT IN PROVING THAT THE MULLAPERIAR DAM CAN HOLD 142 FEET OF WATER , AS PER SUPREME COURT ORDERS..( WHICH KERALA HAS CONTESTED ) \u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS SOON AS THE LEVEL PASSED 142 FEET, THE CM OF KERALA TALKED TO CM OF TAMIL NADU AND SEEING NO POSITIVE ATTITUDE COMPLAINED TO THE CENTRE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KNOWING THAT IF 142 FEET IS EXCEEDED THERE WILL BE HELL TO PAY, THE CM OF TAMIL NADU OPENED ALL 13 SHUTTERS BY 4 FEET..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS CAUSE A MIGHTY TORRENT OF WATER TO RUSH INTO IDUKKI RESERVOIR -CAUSING MAJOR LOSS OF LIFE AND PROPERTY DAMAGES.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">KERALA WILL CLAIM DAMAGES IN EXCESS OF 1000 CRORES FROM TAMIL NADU..IN ADDITION TO CRIMINAL CHARGES FOR LOSS OF LIFE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA GIVES TAMIL NADU ALL OUR WATER AND THIS IS THE GRATITUDE..THE DAM ITSELF IS INSIDE KERALA BORDER , THOUGH OPERATED BY TAMIL NADU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6342733295400532677\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_171M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534063449317#c6342733295400532677\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 12, 2018 at 2:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_171MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>RUSH RUSH RUSH..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>WARNING--.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A SCARE IN KERALA THAT THERE ARE EARTH QUAKE TREMORS , CAUSING CRACKS ON HOME WALLS AND COMPOUND WALLS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE CRACKS ( WHEN FAR AWAY FROM A DAM ) HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH EARTH QUAKES ..IT HAS TO DO WITH INSUFFICIENT FOUNDATION OF THE STRUCTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">I WARN THE KERALA CM -- DO NOT ALLOW IDUKKI DAM RESERVOIR TO GO BEYOND 2402 FEET HEIGHT\u2026 TAKE THIS FROM A MAN WHO IS AN EXPERT ON WATER..</span><br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS BEEN BUILT WITH INBUILT DE-SILTING FACILITIES..<br />\n<br />\nAS A RESULT WHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED, THE STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGES INCREASE THE WATER LEVEL ARBITRARILY, LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT MULLAPERIAR.. ALL THEY DELIBERATE ON IS IF THE DAM WALL S STRONG ENOUGH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO TAKE TECHNICAL DECISIONS ( PIL BASED ) ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN WATER LEVEL IS RAISED , IMMEDIATELY WATER SURFACE AREA IN THE SILTED RESERVOIR INCREASES --INUNDATING MORE LAND AROUND.. MORE SURFACE AREA MEANS MORE EVAPORATION OF WATER HELD BY THE DAM .<br />\n<br />\nTHE MORE DANGEROUS THING IS THIS CAN CAUSE LANDSLIDES AND SOLITION WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WHICH CAN CRASH INTO THE DAM WALL BREACHING IT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">CRITICAL MESSAGE --- NOW ABOUT TREMORS NEAR DAMS ..</span><br />\n<br />\nGOD NEVER INTENDED MAN TO BUILD DAMS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN HUGE DAMS ARE BUILT WITH HIGH WATER LEVELS IN THE RESERVOIR IT CAUSE GEOPATHIC STRESS WHICH MAKES THE AREA TREMOR PRONE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">RESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED RIS ( RESERVOIR INDUCED SEISMICITY)...THIS SUBJECTS HAS BEEN STUDIES AS POST DISASTER REACTIONS \u2013 AND NEVER PROACTIVELY BEFORE BUILDING A DAM..<br /><br />80% OF INDIAs LARGE DAMS ARE PRONE TO RIS \u2013 AS THEY HAVE BEEN BUILT WITHOUT PROPER GEOLOGICAL STUDIES ON UNSUITABLE AREAS \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nReservoirs can both increase the frequency of earthquakes in areas of already high seismic activity and cause earthquakes to happen in areas previously thought to be seismically inactive.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA---<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nThe 1979 MORVI DAM BURST ( rajkot , gujarat ) is in the Guinness book of world records.<br />\n<br />\nHas India ever investigated the reason for 26,000 deaths at Morvi due to induced seismicity ?<br />\n<br />\nHas India investigates the 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir.<br />\n<br />\nIn dam water reservoirs, the crushing weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">God has made huge NATURAL lakes in safe areas --unlike man's ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.</span><br />\nSignificant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake. When dam reservoirs are filled or drained, induced seismicity can occur immediately or with a small time lag.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 12, 2018 at 2:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_170MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nWhen the pressure of the water in the rocks increases, it acts to lubricate faults which are already under tectonic strain, but are prevented from slipping by the friction of the rock surfaces.<br />\n<br />\nThe most serious case is the 7.9-magnitude Sichuan earthquake in May 2008, which killed an estimated 80,000 people and has been linked to the construction of the huge Zipingpu Dam.<br />\n<br />\nGOD SAVE THIS WATAN FROM OUR \"COLLEGIUM MELORDS\"..<br />\n<br />\nIN USA MOST OF THE METHANE LEAKS OVER LAND AND UNDER THE SEA HAS HAPPENED DIE TO EARTH QUAKES CAUSED BY EXCESSIVE FRACKING.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nKERALA CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nCOLLECTORS OF ALL KERALA CITIES<br />\nRAJNATH INGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nPM<br />\nPMO<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nPOWER MINISTER OF KERALA<br />\nWATER MINISTER OF KERALA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nALL STATE / CENTRAL MINISTERS AND MINISTIES<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL.<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_171b+seedCg0cD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; ALL THEY DELIBERATE ON IS IF THE DAM WALL S STRONG ENOUGH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO TAKE TECHNICAL DECISIONS ( PIL BASED ) ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN WATER LEVEL IS RAISED , IMMEDIATELY WATER SURFACE AREA IN THE SILTED RESERVOIR INCREASES --INUNDATING MORE LAND AROUND.. MORE SURFACE AREA MEANS MORE EVAPORATION OF WATER HELD BY THE DAM .<br />\n<br />\nTHE MORE DANGEROUS THING IS THIS CAN CAUSE LANDSLIDES AND SOLITION WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WHICH CAN CRASH INTO THE DAM WALL BREACHING IT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">CRITICAL MESSAGE --- NOW ABOUT TREMORS NEAR DAMS ..</span><br />\n<br />\nGOD NEVER INTENDED MAN TO BUILD DAMS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN HUGE DAMS ARE BUILT WITH HIGH WATER LEVELS IN THE RESERVOIR IT CAUSE GEOPATHIC STRESS WHICH MAKES THE AREA TREMOR PRONE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">RESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED RIS ( RESERVOIR INDUCED SEISMICITY)...THIS SUBJECTS HAS BEEN STUDIES AS POST DISASTER REACTIONS \u2013 AND NEVER PROACTIVELY BEFORE BUILDING A DAM..<br /><br />80% OF INDIAs LARGE DAMS ARE PRONE TO RIS \u2013 AS THEY HAVE BEEN BUILT WITHOUT PROPER GEOLOGICAL STUDIES ON UNSUITABLE AREAS \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nReservoirs can both increase the frequency of earthquakes in areas of already high seismic activity and cause earthquakes to happen in areas previously thought to be seismically inactive.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA---<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nThe 1979 MORVI DAM BURST ( rajkot , gujarat ) is in the Guinness book of world records.<br />\n<br />\nHas India ever investigated the reason for 26,000 deaths at Morvi due to induced seismicity ?<br />\n<br />\nHas India investigates the 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir.<br />\n<br />\nIn dam water reservoirs, the crushing weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: small;\">God has made huge NATURAL lakes in safe areas --unlike man's ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.</span><br />\nSignificant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake. When dam reservoirs are filled or drained, induced seismicity can occur immediately or with a small time lag.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EXCERPTS FROM THE BLOG\nBELOW--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9211788139054333503\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_65M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12333354635999003839\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Sangeetha</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1526328268315#c9211788139054333503\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 15, 2018 at 1:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_65MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain, can Indian navy captains get rid of sea sickness ? Is there a way to train or treat ? Or getting rid of unhealthy ones the only option ?</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_65BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_64T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_64TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_64TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_64TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_64TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_64TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_64TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_64TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_64TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_64B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8416199444397109344\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_64M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_14.html?showComment=1526343092574#c8416199444397109344\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 15, 2018 at 5:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_64MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSEA SICKNESS HAS A LOT TO DO WITH THE SPIRIT LEVEL INSIDE THE INNER EAR ( COCHLEA )<br />\n<br />\nI GET DIZZY WHEN I SIT ON A FAST SPINNING MERRY GO ROUND.. WHILE MY WIFE LOVES IT..<br />\n<br />\nI WAS SEASICK WHEN I FIRST JOINED THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE WAS NEVER SEA SICK EVEN WHEN THE WHOLE SHIPs CREW WAS AFTER A WEEK OF VERY BAD HURRICANE WEATHER ...<br />\n<br />\nIF PAKISTAN ATTACKS INDIA IN JULY --70% OF OUR INDIAN NAVY OFFICERS WILL BE PUKING THEIR GUTS OUT INSTEAD OF FIGHTING.. I KNOW !<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST THING INDIAN NAVY HAS TO DO IS TO ALLOW WHITE UNIFORMS AND CAPS WHICH FLY OFF IN THE WIND --ONLY FOR CEREMONY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN INS BETWA , THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP CAPSIZED IN MUMBAI LOCK GATE , NOBODY IN THE WHOLE OF INDIAN NAVY KNEW WHAT HAPPENED ... NOT ONE SINGLE MAN SERVING OR RETIRED..<br />\n<br />\nSO CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD TO TELL THEM WHAT HAPPENED..<br />\n<br />\n##########################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil December 6, 2016 at 1:49 PM<br />\nIMPORTANT....... IMPORTANT...... IMPORTANT.......... THE WARSHIP INS BETWA , CAPSIZED WHILE UNDOCKING FROM DRYDOCK , DUE TO STABILITY CALCULATIONS NOT BEING DONE PROPERLY ..................... I AM A SHIP CAPTAIN WITH 30 YEARS EXPERIENCE ............. VIRTUAL LOSS OF GM DUE TO UPTHRUST .................... To calculate virtual loss of GM :-............. P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )....... virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes ).............&nbsp;<span style=\"color: blue;\">Not many people realise that KM reduces with increase of trim................this is the reason why docking/ undocking trim by stern must be as small as possible\u2026\u2026\u2026.. while undocking the most critical and dangerous period is when the ship is afloat with only the aftermost part of keel resting on the aftermost block</span>\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026 \u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026..FIRST STEP TO SALVAGE THE PATHETIC INDIAN NAVY IS TO CHANGE THE COLOUR OF THEIR UNIFORM FROM WHITE TO KHAKHI............. ALL RESPONSIBLE PEOPLE INCLUDING THE CAPTAIN MUST BE SACKED......... THIS IS SHEER INCOMPETENCE...........&nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">The interval of time between the stern post landing on the blocks and the ship taking the blocks overall is referred to as the critical period....... During this period part of the weight of the ship is being borne by the blocks, and this creates an upthrust at the stern which increases as the water level falls in the drydock. ......The upthrust causes a virtual loss in metacentric height and it is essential that positive effective metacentric height be maintained throughout the critical period, or the ship will heel over and perhaps slip off the blocks with disastrous results.&nbsp;</span>....capt ajit vadakayil ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\n############################<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK NIRMALA SITARAMAN TO ADDRESS THE PROBLEM NOW .. PM MODI MUST BE PERSONALLY INVOLVED...<br />\n<br />\nOUR NAVAL OFFICERS LACK CHARACTER AND COMPETENCE... IN MODERN WARS NAVY WINS BATTLES ..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF ( THIS IS A MOST CRITICAL COMMENT ) --<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nNAVAL CHIEF<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nAIRFORCE AND ARMY CHIEFS<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nDEANS OF NAVAL ACADEMIES OF INDIA.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_65b+seedBnBwD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bGFEktxusGU/W3NqTGTMyjI/AAAAAAABdhw/8XTKDGRBSGobjG9E6zljNzn4LDf34R4jgCLcBGAs/s1600/5206EE4-xpsygknkpq-1487823255.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"630\" data-original-width=\"1200\" height=\"336\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bGFEktxusGU/W3NqTGTMyjI/AAAAAAABdhw/8XTKDGRBSGobjG9E6zljNzn4LDf34R4jgCLcBGAs/s640/5206EE4-xpsygknkpq-1487823255.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">THERE IS NO GREATER DISGRACE THAN THIS -- A NAVAL BATTLE SHIP CAPSIZING IN DRY DOCK</span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kA96EY2vI6w/W3NqiMDH9AI/AAAAAAABdh0/KhwSXR9ytw8m9T6z4dRotSNh9exDZPWgwCLcBGAs/s1600/ins-betFFwa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"700\" height=\"364\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kA96EY2vI6w/W3NqiMDH9AI/AAAAAAABdh0/KhwSXR9ytw8m9T6z4dRotSNh9exDZPWgwCLcBGAs/s640/ins-betFFwa.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--_a6KFVbkv0/W3Nq-RZf5aI/AAAAAAABdiA/AjYi-d-iIPgC1dqBmzUYVJ47OL6mGEGIgCLcBGAs/s1600/inAs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"422\" data-original-width=\"759\" height=\"354\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--_a6KFVbkv0/W3Nq-RZf5aI/AAAAAAABdiA/AjYi-d-iIPgC1dqBmzUYVJ47OL6mGEGIgCLcBGAs/s640/inAs.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2uurB8vw0eQ/W3NrgIWHJSI/AAAAAAABdiI/F6fTCjr2Q1kjesQBlCMHjULscQC1XALwwCLcBGAs/s1600/AA292436.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"355\" data-original-width=\"650\" height=\"348\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2uurB8vw0eQ/W3NrgIWHJSI/AAAAAAABdiI/F6fTCjr2Q1kjesQBlCMHjULscQC1XALwwCLcBGAs/s640/AA292436.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yfTQSLghelw/W3NwdPdjdYI/AAAAAAABdis/DEjbd3NrqgkRToEqGFMQKR78KjO_-e_MACLcBGAs/s1600/P%252BF%252BP%252Bis%252Bthe%252BUpthrust%252BForce%252Bacting%252Bat%252Bfirst%252BpointA%252Bof%252Btouching%252Bthe%252Bground.%252BCommence%252BCritical%252BPeriod%25E2%2580%25A6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"720\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yfTQSLghelw/W3NwdPdjdYI/AAAAAAABdis/DEjbd3NrqgkRToEqGFMQKR78KjO_-e_MACLcBGAs/s400/P%252BF%252BP%252Bis%252Bthe%252BUpthrust%252BForce%252Bacting%252Bat%252Bfirst%252BpointA%252Bof%252Btouching%252Bthe%252Bground.%252BCommence%252BCritical%252BPeriod%25E2%2580%25A6.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">My memories go back to the year 1980. I was a young strapping Chief Mate of the SCI ship Vishwa Ajay. It was a fantastic multipurpose ship, made in Warnemunde. It could do 25 knots, had huge jumbo derricks, was fully automated , and could make profit on a voyage by just carrying refrigerated cargo, or vegetable oils in deep tanks.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">But it had a serious problem. All six sister A class ships had stability problems.&nbsp; By the time I joined Vishwa Ajay, 3 of the sister ships had angle off loll and became unstable with huge list.&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><br /></span></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">In fact just as I joined Vishwa Amitabh has a angle of loll in-- hold your breath--Bombay lock gates. The first two ships one of them was Vishwa Aditya had angle of loll while taking to the blocks at dry docks.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">We were due for dry docks and the ship was discharging at Hamburg, just before dry docking at HDW dry dock. I was given instructions NOT to discharge hold no 1 , which contained coffee beans in bags. This was to bring the trim down from 20 feet to a reasonable 4 feet.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">As soon as the Tech Suptd came from SCI Bombay, I told him to arrange for a meeting with the drydock bosses. I had to bypass the Captain who had come up from the ranks and had zilch understanding of stability ( no names ) --his nick name was&nbsp;</span><a href=\"mailto:fuck-knows-step*@#$&amp;se\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-decoration-line: none;\">fuck-knows-step*#$&amp;se</a><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">--I can see many of you smiling wryly already.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">The German yard&nbsp;bosses came , quite qualified and intelligent&nbsp;men. I told them \" I want to avoid dry docking in a graving dock with coffee beans in No 1 hold, as the quality will get deteriorated with paint spray , lack of ventilation etc. Is it possible for the ship to dry-dock at that HDW floating dry dock.\"</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">I took them to the porthole and pointed it out. \"The idea is to reduce the virtual loss of GM due to upthrust while taking the aft most block, at nearly 16 feet of trim\".</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">They did NOT understand , so I had to go to the blackboard and explain with formulas and diagrams. Where the dry dock would be trimmed , so that the difference between the trims of dock blocks and the ship's keel would be just 4 feet.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Suddenly the hull side young boss said \" Yes, Chief , I have studied ship stability , I know what you mean. I will give you the answer tomorrow PM !.&nbsp; Meanwhile congratulations-- You may be knowing that such an attempt will be the&nbsp;FIRST on this planet\"</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Later at night, we had gone out to Reeperbahn ( St Pauli ) and while having a couple beers , my junior officer said \" Saab, I have heard of you from your&nbsp;batch mates. Your nick-name as a cadet was Mr India , right?.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><br /></span></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Half of it was because of your muscles and the other half for always saying again and again that India would be world's No 1 super-power country by 2020, and that Brazil would be No 2.&nbsp; Saab,</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;today you made me proud of being an Indian</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">&nbsp;.&nbsp; The&nbsp;highly qualified Germans were in awe of you.&nbsp;\"</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">I laughed it off&nbsp; \" Only if India can root out corruption-- and Brazilians think sex , booze and music ain't everything!\"&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Of course, &nbsp;we did the docking after 3 days on a floating HDW Hamburg dry dock, with entire cargo discharged --and the dry dock trimmed .&nbsp;</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">When the ship sat on the blocks , I as the Chief Officer sat in the control room of the shore dry dock. &nbsp;Any problems, with dock trimming / ballasting and &nbsp;I would abort, before the floating dry dock and the ship capsized in the water-- a terrible disaster to imagine .</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">To calculate virtual loss of GM :-</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><em style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">P= t X MCTC/ LCF ( t is trim in cms )</em></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><i><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /></i><em style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">virtual loss of GM= PX KM/W ( where W is displacement in tonnes )</em><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Not many people realise that KM reduces with trim. This is why the 3 A class ships had angle of loll.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">I had made sure of the fluid GM of W =Vishwa Ajay by shifting the heavy jumbo boom suddenly, and measuring the period of roll with a stop watch --and averaged it over 5 attempts.</span><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><em style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Square root of GM&nbsp; ( feet ) = 0.44 X&nbsp; (breadth in feet / Time period of roll in seconds) .</em><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><br style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\">Many years&nbsp;later Vishwa Anuraag and Vishwa Apurva would sink at sea.</span></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">CHECK OUT WHAT THE INDIAN NAVY IS WORTH&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #441500; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #441500; line-height: normal; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; mso-outline-level: 2;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">September 17, 2012<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; mso-outline-level: 3;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" name=\"7933514481243617106\"></a><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 22.5pt;\">INS Vikramaditya Trial\nMalfunctions to Delay Handover<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; mso-outline-level: 3;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 22.5pt;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0rlcMcZ-XCY/W3NsoMA3XHI/AAAAAAABdiU/9e6fYH2t9ZkJUAqinxYHji4gQ-9cdt6aQCLcBGAs/s1600/161R887246.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"227\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"362\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0rlcMcZ-XCY/W3NsoMA3XHI/AAAAAAABdiU/9e6fYH2t9ZkJUAqinxYHji4gQ-9cdt6aQCLcBGAs/s640/161R887246.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10.0pt;\">Malfunctions detected during trials\nof Indian Navy aircraft carrier Vikramaditya will delay the vessel\u2019s handover\nto India, the Kommersant business daily reported on Monday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10.0pt;\"><br />\nThe Vikramaditya, formerly the Russian Navy's Admiral Gorshkov, is to be handed\nover to India after ongoing sea trials following a much-delayed refit.\nAccording to the latest agreements, it was to have been handed over on December\n4, but the deadline has been postponed again until October 2013.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10.0pt;\"><br />\nThe problems started when the vessel tried to gain maximum speed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10.0pt;\"><br />\n\u201c<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Seven out of eight steam boilers of the propulsion machinery were out of\norder,</span></span>\u201d an official told Kommersant.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10.0pt;\"><br />\nThe official, who prepared the Vikramaditya for sea trials, said the reason for\nthe boilers\u2019 failure was that India refused to use asbestos as a means to\nprotect the boilers from heat, fearing that the material was dangerous for the\ncrew.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 10.0pt;\"><br />\nHe said the boilers\u2019 designer had to use firebrick, which proved not\nsufficiently heatproof, the official said.<br />\n<br />\nRIA Novosti<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9.5pt;\">Posted by&nbsp;NJS&nbsp;at&nbsp;<a href=\"http://defenseblog-njs.blogspot.com/2012/09/ins-vikramaditya-trial-malfunctions-to.html\" title=\"permanent link\"><span style=\"color: windowtext;\">11:31 AM</span></a>&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/email-post.g?blogID=2539000745528632471&amp;postID=7933514481243617106\" title=\"Email Post\"><span style=\"color: windowtext; THE TOP SOIL WOULD BE TEEMING HIS GOOD MICROBES AND EARTH WORMS..</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BUT THEN CORRUPT POLITICIANS FOUND THE BEST WAY TO MAKE MONEY--BUILDING DAMS --YOU CAN STEAL IN HUNDREDS OF CRORES...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THESE DAMS HOLD THE SILT IN THEIR RESERVOIRS ...</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">NOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS THE INBUILT FACILITY TO REMOVE SILT\u2026\u2026</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT TYPE OF NATION ARE WE . .DONT WE HAVE INTELLIGENT PEOPLE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED, THE AUTHORITIES CRIMINALLY RAISE THE WATER LEVEL \u2026\u2026 THIS CAUSES MORE LAND TO BE SUBMERGED DISPLACING PEOPLE\u2026\u2026.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS CAUSES CRIMINAL LOSS OF WATER BY EVAPORATION AS THE SURFACE AREA BECOME MORE\u2026..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN PUERTO RICO A EARTH DAM WAS BREACHED BY A SOLITION WAVE-- DUE TO A LANDSLIDE CAUSED BY INDUCED SEISMICITY \u2026\u2026.. NOBODY HAS THE PERCEPTION TO UNDERSTAND THIS \u2026..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br />WE HAVE A DISASTER WAITING TO HAPPEN AT MULLAPERIAR\u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT IS TIME TO DISMANTLE WHITE ELEPHANT DAMS , WHICH WAS PUSHED BY MINISTERS TO GET KICKBACKS IN FOREIGN ACCOUNTS . .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GANGES MUST FLOW . . . .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RIVER WATER FEEDS AQUIFERS HUNDREDS OF MILES AWAY FROM THE BANKS -- IT MAY BE TOO LATE AS UNDERGROUND CHANNELS WILL BE BLOCKED .. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">POLITICAL GOONS STAY CLOSE TO GANGES RIVER AND EVERY YEAR THEY COLLECT FLOOD RELIEF . . THEY USUALLY STAY IN ANOTHER HOUSE DURING RAINS . . .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE WANT ALL DAM RESERVOIRS TO BE DESILTED.. LOWER THE MAXIMUM WATER LEVELS IN ALL DAM RESERVOIRS\u2026</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SOME AMOUNT OF RIVER WATER MUST REACH THE SEA, TO FORM A FRESH WATER BARRIER AT THE COAST LINE\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS PREVENTS SALT WATER INGRESS INTO COASTAL RESERVOIRS , LIKE WHAT HAS HAPPENED IN TAIL NADU..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA GETS PLENTY FISH AS THE COASTAL WATER IS BRACKISH , UNLIKE TAMIL NADU FISHERMEN WHO HAVE TO GO TO SRI LANKA TO STEAL THEIR FISH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IS THERE A BLESSING IN DISGUISE DUE TO KERALA FLOODS?.. text-decoration-line: none;\">August 16, 2018 at 2:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_36MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWITH THE EXCEPTION OF NUCLEAR POWER PLANTS , NO MAN MADE STRUCTURE HAS A GREATER POTENTIAL FOR KILLING A LARGER NUMBER OF PEOPLE THAN A DAM.<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT EVERY MAJOR DAM IN INDIA TO HAVE SESMIC RECORDING FACILITIES AS PART OF THE INFRASTRTCURE..<br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS BEEN FITTED WITH DE-SILTING FACILITIES..<br />\n<br />\nNOT ONE SINGE DAM HAS KEPT RECORDS OF RISK ASSESSMENTS , A HARD COPY OF WHICH WAS SIGNED AND FILED..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK\u2014CAN YOU SHOW US THE YEARLY RISK ASSESSMENTS DONE ON DANGEROUS AND RUINED MULLAPERIAR DAM FOR THE PAST 10 YEARS ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nALL MAJOR DAM RESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE RESERVOIR CAPACITY REDUCES , INSTEAD OF DE-SILTING DURING SUMMER MONTHS, THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL, OUR LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ORDER ( LIKE GOD ) TO RAISE THE WATER LEVEL.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS INCREASES THE WATER SURFACE AREA, SUBMERGES MASSIVE LAND AREAS AND CAUSE INDUCES SEISMICITY.<br />\n<br />\nINCREASE IN WATER SURFACE AREA OF THE RESERVOIR CAUSES MASSIVE EVAPORATION LOSSES\u2026 ARE WE MAD PEOPLE ?..<br />\n<br />\nTREMORS DURING SEVERE RAINS CAUSE MASSIVE LANDSLIDES.<br />\n<br />\nIF A LANDSLID HAPPENS INTO A DAM RESERVOIR IT CAN TRIGGER A SLITION WAVE WHICH CAN SMASH THE DAM ASUNDER.<br />\n<br />\nThe weight of the reservoir can also force water down micro-cracks and fissures and faults under and near the reservoir till it catalyses an earthquake\u2026<br />\n<br />\n6000 YEARS AGO, A TECTONIC SHIFT BLOCKED THE MOUTH OF THE SARASWATI RIVER\u2014 AND AN ENTIRE CIVILIZATION HAD TO MIGRATE TO OTHER LANDS. ..<br />\n<br />\nRivers are naturally formed water flow systems which has flown for thousands of years and found comfort and peace with itself . Tampering with them will only kill them.<br />\n<br />\nNATURAL LAKES ARE NOT ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.<br />\n<br />\nUpstream dams, have killed rivers, leaving them looking like almost stagnant drainage canals with neither flow of water, nor the availability of new water. The downstream flow is unable to charge underground aquifers .<br />\n<br />\nWhere the river meets the sea, there is SEVERE salt water intrusion, which kills all underground aquifers . Reducing the flow of river downstream of a dam , or by diversion via canals will increase the concentration of pollutants in the river. Many marine species has become extinct.<br />\n<br />\nMost major rivers have an UNDER GROUND component unknown to the people and the government.<br />\n<br />\nThis underground component recharges the aquifers on either sides of the banks, --far away from the main river banks .<br />\n<br />\nSo if you hold all the water in a dam upstream ( where water keeps evaporating ), and the down stream past is just a trickle , the aquifers are deprived of the critical water charge , due to less hydrostatic pressure.<br />\n<br />\nFor example the Amazon river mouth has fresh water 200 miles into the salt laden sea .<br />\n<br />\nThe underground Saraswati river still flows.<br />\n<br />\nAbout 54,000 HUMAN INDUCED earthquakes large enough to be noticed without the aid of instruments occur annually over the entire Earth MOST of it near huge dams and fracking areas.<br />\n<br />\nThe immediate cause of most shallow earthquakes is the sudden release of stress along a fault, or fracture in the earth\u2019s crust. Earthquake is caused by vibrations in rocks. And the vibrations in rocks are produced by seismic waves..<br />\n<br />\nEarthquakes cause landslides..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eYms_bVDnOw</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_36BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; BETTER THAN ANY TECHNICAL EXPERT IN INDIA \u2013LEAVE ALONE SUPREME COURT JUDGES..<br />\n###################<br />\n<br />\nLast year , I had revealed that I can spray Oxytocin with another secret double hormone mix and get every body on a public train to pair off men with men and women with women ,and have an sexual orgy.<br />\n<br />\nThen I can just change one of the hormones do a spray and make partners change so that men with have sex with women .<br />\n<br />\nAnd then some curious readers were clamouring to know what these hormones are .<br />\n<br />\nWell I cant give matchsticks to monkeys.<br />\n<br />\nThe true incident below is in one of my old blogs which I penned 6 years ago--<br />\n<br />\nDIGRESSION:-------<br />\n<br />\nFour decades ago, when i was a young boy, I took a bus from Mangalore to Mumbai.<br />\n<br />\nOn the passage , the radiator of the bus cracked at midnight somewhere in the middle of no man's land.<br />\n<br />\nI remember, I got hold of another youngster to help me out.<br />\n<br />\nI wanted CHOONA LIME, SUGAR, FRESH MOTHER'S MILK and RAW KERALA BANANA.<br />\n<br />\nI got everything except the milk.<br />\n<br />\nFinally despite being threatened by the husband of a pretty young lady in burkha nursing a baby, I got the milk.<br />\n<br />\nThis kind and intelligent lady felt that I was doing something right,to save the situation ( in a unsafe area ) and squeezed it into a glass\u2014 despite her husband giving her HAJAAAR tough looks .<br />\n<br />\nThe guy whom I chose to assist me , whispered \u201c Another woman has powder milk-- hum log maar khaane waala hai \u201c<br />\n<br />\nI said \u201c NOPE \u2013that will lack hormones and will NOT make heat resistant strong adhesive putty \u201c<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">I made a strong adhesive solution which held the hot radiators leak till the next radiator welding workshop in a small town .<br /><br />Choona was the cement.<br /><br />Sugar was the binder<br /><br />Hormones in fresh \u2013repeat \u2013 fresh mother's milk did the magic catalysis --surprised?<br /><br />Raw Kerala banana was the resin.</span><br />\n<br />\nOn ship's which carry corrosive salt we coat the steel of the ship's cargo hold with lime , sugar and cows milk.<br />\n<br />\nAfter that once the salt is discharged, takes at least 300 bars of water pressure from a HP wash Kew machine to get the white compound off the rough steel surface. Such a sharp water blade can slice off a human arm clean.<br />\n<br />\nCouple of years ago, I had a reader is extreme distress.<br />\n<br />\nHe made a URGENT comment in one of my old posts \u201c My wife had just delivered . Her breasts are dry \u2013HELP !\u201d<br />\n<br />\nI replied \u201c You are lucky , that I have seen your comment. Sent everybody outside the room\u2014have skin to skin contact , start flicking her nipples with your tongue . Once her nipples are erect, put on the baby to the nipple- milk will come out \u201c<br />\n<br />\nAfter 30 minutes he thanked me- \u201c Guruji, milk is now coming out like an overflowing dam \u2013thanks for everything\u201d<br />\n<br />\nI am NOT supposed to discuss this \u2013 this is 6200 year old Ayurveda..<br />\n<br />\nSame thing happened with another reader .<br />\n<br />\nHis wife was having first time labour problems . He called me on the phone , he was nearly faint.<br />\n<br />\nI was talking to a newly married doctor couple\u2014both gynecologists . Lovely beautiful couple, classy family.<br />\n<br />\nBoth were shocked to hear me tell him on my mobile phone which I set of speaker phone \u2014send all out of the room, flick her nipples with your tongue , till they stand out like bullets . All will be fine.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_97BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_97b+seedb5JD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_96T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1534424900454#c7664330454496749626\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 16, 2018 at 6:38 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_53MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE CM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN.<br />\n<br />\nGIVE NOTICE TO ALL DISTRICT COLLECTORS OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS THE FLOOD EMERGENCY IN KERALA BLOWS OVER --WITHIN 30 DAYS THEY MUST PRESENT A REPORT OF THEIR OBSERVATIONS , RECOMMENDATIONS AND ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS , BUTTRESSED WITH PICTURES ..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THAT A BRAIN STORMING SESSION HAS TO BE CONVENED BY NITI AYOG, THE EX-DISTRICT COLLECTOR OF CALICUT AMITABH KANT CAN CHAIR THIS MEET..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO CREATE AN EMERGENCY MANUAL ( FLOODING ) WITH PROPER SIGNED RISK ANALYSIS / CHECKLISTS FOR RELEASING WATER FROM DAMS ..<br />\n<br />\nPLANS MUST BE LAID DOWN FOR A COMMAND AND CONTROL CENTRE .. WE WERE SHOCKED AT THE RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES GIVEN BY MINISTER MM MANI ON TV..<br />\n<br />\nNO RAIL OR ARTERIAL ROAD OR BRIDGE MUST GET SUBMERGED IN FUTURE..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nIN FUTURE ALL HIGH RISE PRIVATE BUILDINGS MUST HAVE A HELIPAD ON TOP.. THE KERALA POLICE MUST OWN THEIR OWN DISASTER MANAGEMENT HELICOPTERS AND DRONES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE ENTIRE ELECTRICAL GRID OF KERALA HAS TO BE REVAMPED..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST UNDERSTAND THAT DURING EL NINO YEARS , DAMS MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO TOP UP RESERVOIRS TO MAXIMUM IN RAINY SEASON..<br />\n<br />\nDAMS OPERATORS MUST KNOW WHAT IS SPRING TIDES WHICH PREVENT WATER DRAINING OFF TO SEA.. DEATHS ARE ALWAYS CAUSED BY DAM WATER RELEASE NOT BY MERE RAINFALL..<br />\n<br />\nDEBRIS REMOVAL AND ESSENTIAL SERVICES MAINTENANCE MUST BE DISCUSSED.. ( PORTABLE GEN SETS/ DYNAMO RECHARGING MOBILE PHONE BATTERIES / FLOODED CAR ENGINE SERVICING / RAINWATER CATCHING TIPS/ LIFE JACKETS / STORM PROOF MATCHES / LIQUID CHLORINE / LIFE STOCK-PETS SAFE AREAS / DEAD CADAVER REMOVAL AND DISPOSAL ETC )<br />\n<br />\nILLEGAL CONTRUCTIONS ON RIVER BANKS/ BUILDING HOSUES IN PADDY LANDS BY BRIBING / ILLEGAL SANDMINING FROM RIVER BEDS IS THE REASON WHY KERALA IS SUFFERING..<br />\n<br />\nNO COMPENSATION MUST BE PAID TO ILLEGAL HOUSE CONSTRUCTION IN PADDY FIELDS AND RIVER SIDE VIEW PRIVATE BUILDINGS BY BRIBING..THESE PEOPLE MUST BE PUNISHED..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST CONVERT THIS DISASTER TO A \"BLESSING IN DISGUISE \" FOR LEARNING LESSONS AND GETTING OUR ACT TOGETHER .. THIS IS A WAKEUP CALL..<br />\n<br />\nWE MUST NOW MOVE FROM CHEMICAL FERTILIZERS TO ORGANIC FERTILSERS --AS SOIL TOXINS HAVE BEEN WASHED AWAY..<br />\n<br />\nDIVERSION CANALS HAS TO BE PLANNED FROM CITIES ( AND AIRPORTS ) TO UNDERPOPULATED LOW LANDS ..IF THIS IS NOT THERE CONSTRUCT IT WITH PIPES AND GENERATOR BACKED PUMPS..WHEN SPRING TIDES AND ADVERSE WINDS CAUSE COASTAL SEA LEVEL BUILD UP..<br />\n<br />\nTAKE AERIAL PICTURES TO DECIDE ON STRENGTHENING OF RIVER EMBANKMENTS..PLAN ON REMOVING SILT WHICH BLOCKS FREE RIVER WATER FLOW..<br />\n<br />\nEVERY HOME FLOODED MUST BE INSPECTED AND ALL ELECTICAL OUTLETS AND PLUGS / SWITCHES RAISED ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html<br />\n<br />\nSTUPID SUPREME COURT COLLEGIUM JUDGES JUST KNOW THIS -- WHEN A DAM GETS SILTED ( ALL MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA ARE MORE THAN 60% SILTED ) , THE REMEDY IS TO DESILT--NOT MINDLESSLY RAISE THE LEVEL OF WATER IN THE RESERVOIR, AS DONE WITH MULLAPERIYAR DAM<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE CRITICAL COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nALL DISTRICT COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nKERALA HOME MINISTRY<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nI&amp;B MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTER<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNGT<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; MOTHERS WARN THEM TO DRINK MILK--NOT WITH GABBAR SINGH BUT WITH MULLAPERIYAR DAM BURST.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">WE CONGRATULATE CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN FOR HIS TENACITY...</b></div>\n<br />\n############################################<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 14, 2018 at 10:53 PM<br />\nWARNING ..<br />\nWARNING ..<br />\nWARNING .<br />\n<br />\nRUSH... RUSH... RUSH...<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.ndtv.com/kerala-news/torrential-rains-landslides-cause-nightmare-in-kerala-39-dead-1900524</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SUPREME COURT HAS ALLOWED THE WATER LEVEL IN MULLAPERIAR RESERVOIR TO BE RAISED TO 142 FEET 4 YEARS AGO --AS THE RESERVOIR IS SILTED.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS NOT SAFE TO RAISE THE WATER LEVEL OF THE 120 YEAR OLD DAM , MORE THAN 139 FEET...THIS CALCULATION IS BASED ON THE UPLIFT CAUSED BY THE WATER HEAD.<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE BEEN A SHIP CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS --I HAVE MORE EXPERTISE ON WATER ( THEORY AND PRACTICAL ) THAN THESE LAWYER TURNED JUDGES, WHO WERE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..AND THE THINK TANKS WHO ADVISED THESE JUDGES..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SIDEWAYS FORCE OF ACCUMULATED BOTTOM SILT CAUSED BY WATER HEAD , IS ACTING ON THE GRAVITY DAM. THIS IS CALCULATED BY THE RANKINE FORMULA ON A VERTICAL WALL WHICH ERRS ON THE DANGEROUS SIDE AS THE BOTTOM WALL SLOPES ( A SAILBOAT MOVES AHEAD BY USING A WEDGE IN HEAD WINDS ) . .<br />\n<br />\nMORE CRITICAL-- THE SOFT SILT OFFERS NO PASSIVE PRESSURE.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS IN ADDITION TO VERTICAL WATER PRESSURE ON SLOPING PART OF THE DAM UNDER THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVEL.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A HYDRAULIC GRADIENT ACTING UPWARDS FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE DAM WALL KNOWN AS UPLIFT. WATER ENTERS FISSURES OF THE FOUNDATION MATERIAL DUE TO WATER HEAD PRESSURE ..<br />\n<br />\nCRITICAL : THE WEIGHT OF THE MASONRY OF THIS GRAVITY DAM WHICH IS REDUCED SEVERELY BY RAISING WATER LEVEL TO THE HEIGHT OF 142 FEET AS THE STUPID SUPREME COURT JUDGES ORDERED..<br />\n<br />\nIF THE MULLAPERIAR DAM BREACHES--IT WILL BREACH THE CHERUTHONI DAM WALL ( IDUKKI DAM SPILLWAY ) ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE COMBINED WATER FLOW OF IDUKKI RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR RESERVOIR WILL KILL LAKHS OF PEOPLE AND DIVIDE KERALA INTO NORTH AND SOUTH KERALA WITH A WATER BODY IN BETWEEN.<br />\n<br />\nTAKE THIS FROM AN EXPERT..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE INDIAN NAVY WARSHIP INS BETWA CAPSIZED AT MUMBAI LOCK GATES- NOBODY KNEW WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TILL CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TOLD THE NAVY FOOLS.<br />\n<br />\nREAD THE COMMENT DATED DEC 6TH 2016, IN THE POST BELOW--<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/india-stands-tall-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n<br />\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilAugust 16, 2018 at 7:35 PM<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCJI MISRA<br />\nJUSTICE INDU MALHOTRA<br />\nNational Crisis Management Committee (NCMS)<br />\nAdditional Solicitor General P S Narasimha<br />\nChief Secretaries of Tamil Nadu and Kerala<br />\nCM OF TAMIL NADU<br />\nGOVERNOR OF TAMIL NADU<br />\nCM OF KERALA PINARAYI VIJAYAN<br />\nWATER MINISTER OF KERALA<br />\nPOWER MINISTER OF KERALA<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nCOLLECTOR OF IDUKKI<br />\nCOLLECTOR OF ERNAKULAM<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nI&amp;B DEPT<br />\nLAW MINISTER<br />\nLAW MINISTRY<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nFINANCE MINISTER<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\n<br />\nALL MALAYALAM TV CHANNELS AND MEDIA<br />\nALL KERALA TV CHANNELS AND MEDIA</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AS PER KERALA LAW YOU CANNOT BUID A HOUSE IN ANCIENT PADDY FIELD AS THEY ACT AS WATER COLLECTION BOWLS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
