MOST WERE CASES OF HOMOSEXUAL PEDOPHILIA ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">85% OF CATHOLIC PRIESTS ( WHO CANNOT MARRY ) ARE HOMOSEXUAL PEDOPHILES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE VICTIMS HAD NO VOICE ,TILL THE INTERNET ERA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">MOTHER TERESAs BILLIONS WERE USED BY THE POPE TO SETTLE ABUSE CASES IN PRIVATE --&nbsp; AS HUSH MONEY.&nbsp; &nbsp; MANY IMMORAL PARENTS TOOK MONEY AND THEN SUBJECTED THEIR YOUNGER CHILDREN TOO TO THE SAME ABUSE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MOTHER TERESA EARNED BILLIONS OF USD BY KEEPING CALCUTTA AS AN OPEN SORE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MOST OF THIS UNACCOUNTED MONEY WAS USED BY VATICAN TO PAY HUSH MONEY TO SEX ABUSE VICTIMS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><b>WHAT IS THE ROLE OF AN UNDERAGE ALTAR BOY ( WELL PAID ) IN A CATHOLIC CHURCH?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MOTHER TERESA WAS NOT A SAINT--SHE WAS THE DEVIL INCARNATE..THE PEOPLE OF INDIA BOYCOTTED MOTHER TERESAs FUNERAL. WHOEVER CAME WERE ARMTWSTED/ PAID BY THE CATHOLIC CHURCH&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT WAS TERESAs GREATEST SIN?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">USING CALCUTTA AS AN OPEN SORE TO ATTRACT DONATIONS ( LIKE FLIES )--AND THEN USING THAT MONEY TO FUND 618 MISSIONS ( FOR CHRISTIANS ) WORLD WIDE IN 126 NATIONS-- IN ADDITION TO HUSH MONEY FOR THE POPE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Archbishop of Calcutta Henry D\u2019Souza has said how often he arranged for an exorcist for Mother Teresa so that she could get rid of her inner demons while she slept.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SHE WAS ON THE VERGE OF SUICIDE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MOTHER TERESA BHAKT JUSTICE JOSEPH KURIAN ( HE WENT ALL THE WAY TO VATICAN FOR MOTHER TERESAs CANONISATION CEREMONY ) IS THE GUY WHO FOUND EASTER MORE IMPORTANT THAN A PM MODI CALLED CONFERENCE \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE KNOW HOW BIG AN AXE HE HAS TO GRIND\u2026 KURIAN JOSEPH WAS PART OF THE FAB FOUR WHO WENT TO THE STREETS ..JOSEPH KURIAN WANTED WOMEN HAVING MENSES IN SABARIMALA..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MOTHER TERESAs SAINTHOOD IS THE WORLDs GREATEST FRAUD -- KERALA NUNS WHO WORKED WITH HER FOR TWO DECADES KNOW HER MEAN NATURE VERY WELL</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE POPE USED MOTHER TERESA AS A TOOL --34 YEARS OF AGGRESSIVE BRANDING TO MAKE HER THE POSTER GIRL FOR CATHOLIC CHURCH AND JESUS CHRIST --ALL THIS WHEN JESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JESUS CHRIST WAS COOKED UP BY ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTIN THE GREAT AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA IN 325 AD ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">LIFE OF JESUS WAS A CLEVER COMBINATION OF THE LIVES OF KERALA SAGE APOLLONIUS OF TYANA , HIS SIDEKICK DAMISA ( WHO MARRIED A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WOMAN MARY MAGDALENE ) AND COSMIC ALLEGORY \"APUN BHI COSMIC ALLEGORY\"..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Teresa likened the suffering of inmates in Calcutta branch to Christ on the cross-- she encouraged PAIN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the 1950s, Mother Teresa helped found a \u2018home for the dying\u2019, where \u201cpeople who lived like animals\u201d could come to \u201cdie like angels\u201d of course after forcibly converting the dying ( lying in their own shit and urine ) to Christianity&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She told those in pain that they were being \u201ckissed by Jesus\u201d, yet on her own deathbed was happy to accept the very best medical care on offer to her.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nobody has ever seen Jesus Christ on a cross till 1150 years ago..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Despite being connected with the city, she barely spoke any Bengali. The Kerala nurses vouch for this.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.rt.com/news/409393-mother-teresa-bank-account/</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1534409351143#c8646022610238398842\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 16, 2018 at 2:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_32MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE DGP AND IG OF KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nWHY IS KERALA POLICE HOLDING UMBRELLA IN ONE HAND AND WALKIE TALKIE IN THE OTHER ?<br />\n<br />\nDONT THEY HAVE RAINCOATS?<br />\n<br />\nDONT THEY KNOW HOW TO PLACE A PLASTIC ENVELOPED WALKIE TALKIE ON THEIR COLLAR BONE ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">ARE WE HAVING HANDLESS POLICE WHO WORK WITH THEIR EYES AND MOUTH ?</span><br />\n<br />\nWILL YOU EVER SEE AN ARMY MAN THIS WAY ?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS ALL ABOUT ATTITUDES ! PEOPLE ARE WATCHING THE KERALA POLICE ON TV !<br />\n<br />\nPATHETIC!<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF-<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nHOME MINISTRY OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF POLICE<br />\nIG OF POLICE<br />\nPC OF DIFFERENT DISTRICTS<br />\nCENTRAL HOME MINISTRY<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>ED COUNTRY</b> \"</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE NEWSPAPER WAS FORCED TO APOLOGIZE&nbsp;BY MY WIFEs COUSIN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VFEDdSn7XpU/W3bbGBPIkmI/AAAAAAABdmM/3p9hPXa1Bc0uyO3b2JP3uvVRBdcI3ReDwCLcBGAs/s1600/IMG-20180817-WA0058%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1280\" data-original-width=\"768\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VFEDdSn7XpU/W3bbGBPIkmI/AAAAAAABdmM/3p9hPXa1Bc0uyO3b2JP3uvVRBdcI3ReDwCLcBGAs/s640/IMG-20180817-WA0058%2B%25281%2529.jpg\" width=\"384\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8250633692781631824\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_178M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12333354635999003839\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Sangeetha</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_16.html?showComment=1534540616341#c8250633692781631824\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 18, 2018 at 2:46 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_178MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain and readers,<br />\n<br />\nOnce again thank you for your good wishes and prayers. I want to clarify I was not in physical danger myself as I live abroad. I am sorry if I gave that impression. But my whole family was impacted. They are safe now. In fact everything went smooth for them compared to many people. I was doing God speed reiki numbers. I just came to know 700 people are waiting to be rescued in Oottupara of Kunnil Sridharmashasta temple in west kadungalloor and 1000 people waiting in Alangad Mosque. Lot of people are passed the info to various rescue groups, so I hope they will be rescued by morning. Rain has stopped for now and I heard water started receding. 8000 people were in UC college camp without food or water , now military trucks moved some of them to Kalamassery Cochin University camp. Kalamassery camp is run well. Navy is cooking and giving food. I am worried about all those people now. It is a humanitarian crisis.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nI want to share the most important lesson learnt. Height. Height from sea level. The government advised warning to people living within 500 meter of periyar. No warning at all to Kadungalloor people. My home was 6 km away. Yet my home was flooded before Thottakkattukara on periyar banks. All because of height. West Kadungalloor is 8 m from sea level and Thottakkattukara 11 meters. Because it is a gradual slope, it is not easy to perceive for people. We thought water will spread out from Aluva and drain to the paddy fields near us. But whole day water was being drained to the paddy fields near us through a small stream from Periyar. The paddy fields (no paddy now) get flooded in monsoon, so no one took it serious. Kadungalloor was a sitting duck , with eyes closed. They should have been in red alert. They should have been evacuated. The only alert was from the cats. (I hope they are safe). My sister told me cats are behaving abnormal. She was uneasy and considered moving out then itself. She did talk about a relatives house which is higher ground, but others ruled her out because that was nearer to river. (Eventually they had to vacate as well). Besides roads were flooded already. so we were afraid of being stranded in the road when the dam water hit Aluva. I feel so stupid that I did not google for heights then. Kalamassery is 28 meters high and just 6 km away. If someone in power checked a topographic map like the one below even after the water was released, there was plenty of time to evacuate Kadungalloor people to cochin university campus. At least some warning, they would have evacuated themselves.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://en-in.topographic-map.com/places/Bridge-Rd-Thottakkattukara-Aluva-Kerala-683101-India-4334492/<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThere was absolutely no help or advice or warning from government anytime before or during early stages of flood. Villagers arranged evacuation. I called all the control room numbers which were engaged. People moved wherever they could. I heard police boats later rescued stranded people when water currents were stronger and by night navy came for rescue. I dont blame government as they could have been busy with critical places compared to early stages. All I want to say is when someone says stay calm and wait for government instructions, that's suicide.<br />\n<br />\nHope all becomes fine soon. Prayers for all affected.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSorry MMR, I could not get information on your friends yet. Still trying.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_178BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_178b+seedCgOLD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_177T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_163TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_163TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_163TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_163TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_163TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_163TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_163TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_163TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_163B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7352925475100776160\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_163M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1534844148120#c7352925475100776160\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 21, 2018 at 3:05 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_163MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nChlorine inactivates a microorganism by damaging its cell membrane. Once the cell membrane is weakened, the chlorine can enter the cell and disrupt cell respiration and DNA activity (two processes that are necessary for cell survival).<br />\nLiquid chlorine is cheap and can eliminate an overload of pathogens relatively quickly.<br />\nChlorine effective against algae.. In swimming pools if you put bleaching powder instead of Chlorine algae which harbor pathogens build up..<br />\nChlorination is able to provide a residual to reduce the chance of pathogen regrowth in water.. Certain pathogens, namely protozoan cysts, are resistant to the effects of chlorine. In Kerala right now after massive floods this is irrelevant.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_164b+seedIP1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3596864806745046819\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_169M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_13M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1534899356477#c708375956938044693\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 22, 2018 at 6:25 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_13MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWE ASK THE CM OF KERALA..<br />\n<br />\nIMPROVE THE ELECTRICALS OF ALL FLOOD SUBMERGED AREAS..<br />\n<br />\nUSE UNDERGROUND CABLES AND INCREASE THE POWER FACTOR..<br />\n<br />\nPower factor is the cosine of angle between voltage and current. Inductive loads generate lagging current and power factor will be lagging. Capacitive loads generate leading current and leading power factor.<br />\n<br />\nMost of the loads are combination of resistive and inductive loads. So resultant power factor will be less than one and lagging which is not good of electrical system.<br />\n<br />\nTransformer output is reduced with reduced power factor. Same capacity load with less power factor requires more current to flow. Two methods are very common - using capacitors, synchronous condensers / motors and phase shifters.<br />\n<br />\nWATCH THE VIDEO BELOW--<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P5pFe-StdJw<br />\n<br />\nCAN ANYBODY ASK SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA STATE ELECTRICITY MINISTER ILLITERATE MM MANI WHAT IS POWER FACTOR ?....<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM OF KERALA PINARAYAI VIJAYAN<br />\nG0VERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nKSEB CHAIRMAN<br />\nALL COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nDGP KERALA<br />\nIG KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nALL MLAs/ MPs OF KERALA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; DO NOT RELEASE DAM WATERS TODAY DURING DAYLIGHT..<br />\n<br />\nUSE THE DAYLIGHT PERIOD FROM THURSDAY SUNRISE TO SUNSET FOR TAKING OUT ALL FLOOD WATER DAMP STUFF, TO WASH IT AND DRY IT--TO PREVENT FUNGUS AND MOSS.<br />\n<br />\nELECTRICAL MOTORS OF WELL SUBMERGED MUST BE DISCARDED AND NEW ONES FITTED.. THE OLD ONES CAN BE LATER OPENED UP, CLEANED WITH GAMLIN TYPE ELECTRICAL SOLVENTS , INSULATION RESISTANCE IMPROVED AND SOLD AS CHEAP RECONDITIONED MOTORS ..<br />\n<br />\nUSE THE DAY FOR DISEASE PREVENTION..AND ELECTRICAL CONSOLIDATION..<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT PAY COMPENSATION TO HOUSES BUILT ILLEGALLY IN PADDY LANDS AND RIVER BANKS.. THESE ARE PARTY CADRE WHO HAVE BEEN BRIBED WITH LANDS AND HOMES OF SUCCESSIVE CHRISTIAN/ MUSLIM/ COMMIE KERALA GOVTS..<br />\n<br />\nIDENTIFY FUTURE RELIEF CAMPS AND PLAN FOR MORE HYGENIC TOILETS..<br />\n<br />\nNO BURIAL YARDS FOR MUSLIMS/ CHRISTIANS MUST BE ALLOWED IN SUBMERGED AREAS..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\n<br />\nCM OF KERALA PINARAYAI VIJAYAN<br />\nG0VERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nALL COLLECTORS OF KERALA<br />\nDGP KERALA<br />\nIG KERALA<br />\nALL MINISTERS OF KERALA<br />\nALL MLAs/ MPs OF KERALA<br />\nMEDIA OF KERALA<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nALL CMs OF INDIA<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; As a result, these countries are becoming saddled with debt, leaving them even more firmly under China's thumb..<br />\n<br />\nDonor countries must empower nations, not place them under impossible debt burden.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">1) EL NINO</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">2) ADVERSE MONSOON WINDS BUILDING UP SEA WATER TO PREVENT RIVER WATERS TO DRAIN ,,</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS IS RIVER WATER PLUS SILT.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SILT IS NOT JUST MUD--- IT IS THE COLLOIDAL LIFE OF THE RIVER..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">GANGES WATER AT GAUMUKH ( SOURCE ) CONTAINS MASSIVE AMOUNT OF COLLOIDAL SILVER AND OTHER COLLOIDS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHIS WATER IS HIGHLY ALKALINE AND HAS AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF HYDROGEN WITH AN EXTRA ELECTRON TO NEUTRALIZE DAMAGING FREE RADICALS WHICH CAUSE DNA DAMAGE AND RAPID AGEING.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS LOW SURFACE TENSION WATER IS BIO-ENERGISED MIRACLE WATER..LESS THAN THE USUAL 73 DYNES..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MIRACLE WATER EASILY PENETRATES THE 75 TRILLION CELLS AND MITOCHONDRIAL MEMBRANES TO SUPPLY NUTRIENTS AND FLUSH WAY TOXINS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE OLYMPICS CERTAIN ATHLETES HAVE GOOD COACHES WHO TELL THEM WHAT TO DRINK BEFORE THE RACE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_16.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of_17.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI WAS AT SEA FOR 40 YEARS AND THUS MISSED FAMILY MARRIAGES--WHERE RELATIVES MEET EACH OTHER..<br />\n<br />\nI WENT TO KANNUR TO GIVE INVITATIONS FOR MY ELDER SONs WEDDING 3 YEARS AGO..<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF MY RELATIVES WERE SEEING ME AFTER HALF A CENTURY.. AND THEY ALL MADE SURE THAT I ATE WHATEVER NATIVE SWEETS THEY GAVE ME --IN ADDITION TO SWEET COLD DRINKS AND SWEET TEA..<br />\n<br />\nON THE DRIVE BACK FROM KANNUR TO CALICUT MY TOES AND FINGERS WENT HAYWIRE.. I BANGED INTO A MOTORCYCLIST AT A TRAFFIC LIGHT.. HE JUST LOOKED BACK AND ACTED AS IF NOTHING HAPPENED.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS UNABLE TO EVEN HOLD THE WHEEL LEAVE ALONE PRESS THE BRAKE.<br />\n<br />\nI IMMEDIATELY TOLD MY WIFE-- I WILL PARK AT THE NEAREST BAKERY-- MY BODY NEEDS SODIUM AND POTASSIUM IMMEDIATELY.. BUY A TIN OF SALTED CASHEW..BEFORE I GET BRAIN FOG..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS 2130 PM AND MOST STORES WERE SHUTTING..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE CAME RUNNING BACK WITH A HUGE TIN OF SALTED CASHEW--I GORGED ON IT AND DRANK LOT OF WATER...<br />\n<br />\nWITHIN THREE MINUTES I WAS OK--AND I DROVE THE NEXT ONE HOUR TO CALICUT AT FULL SPEED WITHOUT PROBLEM..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bPFKDdWlCg</span><br />\n<br />\nBONGS CANT GET HILSA FISH ANYMORE AFTER THE FARAKKA ARRAGE WAS BUILT SANS FISH LADDER.. HILSA FISH SWIMS HUNDREDS OF MILES UPRIVER TO SPAWN IN PURE SWEET WATER..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI WANTED TO INTERLINK INDIAN RIVERS.. HE THINKS RIVERS ARE GUTTERS FLOWING INTO THE SEA..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nAS LONG AS SARASWATI RIVER FLOWED, GANGES WITH ALL IT DIVINE MACROPHAGES HAD NO IMPORTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nSARASWATI RIVER HAD MORE DIVINE AXOLOTLS...WHICH COULD REGENERATE EVEN THE SPINAL CORD.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/mother-of-all-civilisations-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL --WHAT DO YOU KNOW ?<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT GANGA MINISTER UMA BHARATI TO KNOW ALL THIS ?<br />\n<br />\nHEY VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI-- WE HAD ENOUGH JAANKAARI FROM YOU ABOUT GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR .. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535293944264#c699675596539202339\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 26, 2018 at 8:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_77MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">EXCERPT FROM MY KARVA CHAUTH POST--</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">######################</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By the way, I saw some chutney Marys and Pickle Johns discussing in their blogs why my wife is such a silent poor lamb.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I got to know this true story from my wife\u2019s class mate who was with my wife right through school to college -- LKG to BA . She had come to my house at Calicut with her husband for a 2 day holiday .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This is what she told me.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">My wife was always a class leader and later on the school leader. Whenever the nuns at Auxilium convent, wanted to give a bad girl who was heading for hell , a good role model , it would be my wife.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">These nuns , due to sexual repression were very MEAN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They would NOT allow the girls to touch the walls, in as much as even while climbing the stairs they had to be in the middle with hands tucked in.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">So that had this school march past in Mumbai.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When they went for a dress rehearsal for this republic day parade , with dozens of other schools, some boys jeered loudly when the Auxilium contingent marched past.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This was put to a debate, with my wife mediating , not like Arnab Goswami , who will push his opinion ahead of others, even as a debate moderator. I wish I had a tete a tete with this man on national TV. I can cure his self obsession in just 5 minutes.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">One good lookin' Catholic girl ( most of the group were Catholics ) , cried copious tears and was disconsolate .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">She was of ze humble but firm opinion that all other girls from other schools were smartly turned out, while the Auxlium girls were NOT.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And to add to her woes hey boy friend was the leader of the hooting party.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When asked to be more objective\u2014the girl said , that other school girls wore miniskirts, while Auxilium convent girls, wore their bottom hems 2 inches below the mangy knees.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">So my wife took an instant decision.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Hundreds of safety pins would be procured- el pronto .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">As soon as the nuns left them alone , as the girls moved to the huge march past ground. Every girl would shorten the next girl\u2019s skirt by folding it inwards and pinning with six pins, to observe thigh display parity with other school girls.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They practiced it , so that they would do it in less than 2 minutes .</span></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, my wife was the leader with the school flag.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The same rowdy boys clapped and whistled in appreciation when the real march past took place.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And all including the chief guest were wondering , what the fu#k happened . They thought that the Auxilium contingent would be the prettiest, and indeed they were.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NUNS GOT WILD AND FROTHED FROM THEIR MOUSTACHED MOUTHS AND PROBABLY THEIR PANTILESS TWATS TOO, FOR GOOD MEASURE \u2014 SURELY THERE IS NO PLACE IN HEAVEN FOR SUCH WANTON GIRLS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Every girl was SEVERELY scolded , with my wife bearing the brunt , about how Jesus is so angry with them. They felt let down that my wife who was a graceful role model , was in cahoots .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All the girls were arbitrarily suspended from school and their parents had to come the next day.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parents had their own dress rehearsal. Some of them were IAS, some police, some lawyers, some even MLA s and media giants .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The parents decided to go for scorched earth tactics--on the advise of a high court lawyer .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">They would threaten to get the school shut down , by creating a stink in the media with demand for the PMS ridden head mistress nun to be sacked.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Needless to say, the nuns had weak hearts and less faith in their Lord, when the chips were down .</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The fall out was that my wife was sacked as the school leader - rather she declined the job .&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">But when the annual prize distribution came, my wife got the most thunderous ovation, pissing off the holy , but MEAN nuns.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Central government organisations are not custodians of dams in India. Not even recently created Cauvery Water Management Authority has been given any authority over dams in Cauvery basin.<br />\n<br />\n2. Even State government departments may not be having information on siltation.<br />\n<br />\n3. It needs periodical bathymetric studies. Even then it may not be possible to have regular information on 'Dam siltation' unlike storage level position. You may kindly make suggestions ( along with budget and manpower provisions) by writing to the decision makers.<br />\n<br />\nIs this bathymetric studies that determines Siltation level of Dam? ANY IDIOT WHO KNOWS UNDERGROUND RADAR MAPPING CAN DO THIS.. SILT HAS A SMOOTHER COMPOSITION THAN THE HARD GROUND IT STANDS OVER..<br />\n<br />\nIT CAN BE DONE BY SEVERAL MEANS- EVEN A HALF WIT CAN FIGURE THIS OUT. IF INDIA IS NOT INTELLIGENT ENOUGH TO DO THIS-- OUTSOURCE THIS JOB TO NETHERLANDS..<br />\n<br />\nWE INCLUDE STUPID \"LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES \" IN IMPORTANT INFRASTRUCTURE DECISIONS .. THIS IS A CRIME..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE: IF TAMIL NADU IS RUNNING MULLAPERIAR DAM INSIDE KERALA, IT IS THEIR JOB TO DO DE-SILTING...<br />\n<br />\nWHEN RESERVOIR VOLUME REDUCES 65% BY SILTING , THE JUDGES LIKE SOOTH SAYERS PARROTS IN A CAGE, RULE THAT RESERVOIR LEVEL CAN BE RAISED..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE ARE HIGHLY TECHNICAL DECISIONS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\nTHE POST ON GROUND WATER HAS BEEN SENT TO PM MODI AT LEAST 20 TIMES.. text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535325967587#c883203796410833733\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 27, 2018 at 4:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_104MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">MY READERS WANT ME TO PEN THE \"VADAKAYIL REPORT\" TO SUPERSEDE THE \"GADGIL REPORT\" AND THE \"KASTURIRANGAN REPORT\"..</span></div>\n<br />\nWELL PADMA BHUSHAN MADHAV GADGIL , PADMA VIBHUSHAN KRISHNASWAMI KASTURIRANGAN ARE STILL ALIVE AND THEY HAVE BEEN GIVING RIDICULOUS SOUND BYTES ON TV , ABOUT LANDSLIDES AND KERALA FLOODS ALONG WITH PADMA VIBHUSHAN MS SWAMINANTHAN..<br />\n<br />\nWELL FIRST LET ME DESCRIBE MS SWAMINATHAN , THE FATHER OF THE \"GREEN REVOLUTION\".. THIS DESH DROHI IS THE REASON WHY INDIA LOST ITS HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND LOST 90% OF LAKES ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAKES SURVIVED FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS IN PRISTINE CONDITON , AND WERE DECIMATED IN JUST 55 YEARS BY THE GREEN REVOLUTION WHICH GAVE US TOXIC ARTIFICIAL FERTILISERS AND PESTICIDES...<br />\n<br />\nMADHAV GADGIL BEHAVING LIKE AN OUTRAGES VIRGIN , MUST KNOW THAT QUARRYING HAS NOTING TO DO WITH LANDSLIDES..THERE HAS BEEN NO LANDSLIDES IN THE VICINITY OF QUARRIES IN KERALA DURING THESE RECENT FLOODS..<br />\n<br />\nAN AVALANCHE OF SNOW CAN BE SET OFF BY A MERE SONIC BOOM OF A FIGHTER JET FLYING OVER THE MOUNTAIN.<br />\nINDUCED SESMICITY CAUSED BY MAN MADE DAM RESERVOIRS ARE THE MAJOR REASON FOR LANDSLIDES IN KERALA\u2026 AND THE REASON WHY MANY DAM WALLS COLLAPSED WITH MAJOR LOSS OF LIFE ALL AROUND THE PLANET..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN MERCANTILE MARINE DEPT, THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OF SHIPPING AND SHIPPING MINISTER MUST KNOW THAT MANY IRON ORE SHIPS WHICH LOADED IRON ORE AT PARADIP HAVE SUNK AT SEA WITH TOTAL LOSS OF LIFE..<br />\n<br />\nPARADIP DOES NOT HAVE THE MEANS TO TRIM THE PILE OF IRON ORE WHICH IT LOADS INTO THE SHIPS HOLDS..THE ANGLE OF REPOSE WAS TOO HIGH AND THE ORE SHIFTED DURING ROLLING IN HEAVY SEAS..<br />\n<br />\nHUNDREDS OF ORE SHIPS CARRYING CONCENTRATES HAVE SUNK.. WHEN THE POWERS THAT BE GOVERNING SHIPPING MADE NO EFFORTS ,<br />\n<br />\nI AS A YOUNG CAPTAIN HAS MY OWN RULES FOR MY SHIP.. THIS IS NARRATED IN THE BLOGPOST BELOW\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/naive-sailor-transportable-moisture.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHERE THERE IS EXCESSIVE RAIN LIKE THE EL NINO POWERED RAINS WHICH CAUSED THE FLOODS IN KERALA CERTAIN SOILS HOLD TOO MUCH MOISTURE .. WHEN THE SOIL GETS SATURATED IT JUST FLOWS DOWN SLOPE LIKE A RIVER , WHICH IS CALLED LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS A YOUTUBE VIDEO OF SUCH A LANDSLIDE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=czVJ6MNgE8E</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE SLOPE DOES NOT HAVE TO BE TO STEEP IF DEEP ROOTED VEGETATION IS REMOVED WHICH BINDS COLLUVIUM TO BEDROCK.<br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS. AS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\nFOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DELCARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY. THERE WILL ALWAYS BE A TRIGGER LIKE RAIN WATER STURATION OR A SEISMIC TREMOR ( IN CASE THERE IS NO RAIN ). EVEN THUNDER CAN CAUSE A LANDSLIDE.<br />\n<br />\nIN KODUGU DISTRICT THIS BLOGSITE HAS WARNED OF GROUND WATER PRESSURE FROM UNDERNEATH TRIGGERING LAND SLIDES AND HAS ASKED PEOPLE TO RUN IF THEY SEE WATER FOUNTAINS ENAMANTING FROM THE GROUND.<br />\n<br />\nA THIXOTROPIC MATERIAL SUCH AS MUD CAN CHANGE INTO A GEL OR SOL BY ADDING WATER OR PRESSURE OR SHAKING . IT GOES FROM BEING STABLE ONE MINUTE TO FLUID THE NEXT MINUTE ( THE REASON WHY ORE CONCENTARE SHIPS SANK )<br />\n<br />\nI ASK \u2013WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO TELL ARE THESE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">DON\u2019T WE HAVE TRAINED AND INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN INDIA.. WHAT ARE OUR THINK TANKS WORTH..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_104BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_104b+seedERLcD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_103T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_183M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1535420216520#c2160380466037972725\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 28, 2018 at 7:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_183MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Juc6_of_A-s</span><br />\n<br />\nSHALLOW LANDSLIDES CAN HAPPEN IN AREAS THAT HAVE SLOPES WITH HIGH PERMEABLE SOILS ON TOP OF LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS.<br />\n<br />\nAS THE TOP PERMEABLE SOILS ARE SATURATED WITH WATER THEY BECOME HEAVY AND UNSTABLE , WHICH CAUSES THEM TO SLIDE OVER THE LOW PERMEABLE BOTTOM SOILS BY THE ACTION OF GRAVITY.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">FOR A LANDSLIDE TO HAPPEN , IT REQUIRES NO GREAT MENTAL ACUITY TO DECLARE THAT THERE HAS TO BE A SLOPE AND A FORCE OF GRAVITY.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWATER ACTS AS A LUBRICANT BETWEEN TWO LAYERS OF SOIL..<br />\n<br />\nHOUSES AND ARTERIAL ROADS CAN BE PROTECTED BY WATCHING THE VIDEO ABOVE..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I WILL BE PENNING A BLOG NAMED \" VADAKAYIL REPORT\" WHICH WILL SUPERCEDE THE GADGIL AND KASTURIRANGAN REPORTS...</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nTHE ABOVE COMMENT IS MOST CRITICAL.. They lost everything and haven't got any government help yet and they cant wait forever.<br />\n<br />\nBeyond everything, there is something nagging my mind. How all are confident rain will not happen again next week or next month or during Thulavarsham ? Well, you may know whether it will. But how about CM and KSEB and everyone ? margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_50M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535714446665#c8111759016671708497\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 31, 2018 at 4:50 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME --IF I HAVE BEEN A BIT HARSH WITH OUR PDAMA AWARD HEROES MADHAV GADGIL AND K KASTURIRANGAN.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN --- IF I GO HAMMER AND TONGS AFTER THE, THEY WILL BE COVERED WITH SHIT AND PEOPLE WILL THROW STONES AT THEM. ECOLOGISTS MUST NOT DEVELOP THE OSTRICH SYNDROME..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS--ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE?<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA AS A CHEMICAL TANKER SHIP CAPTAIN, IF I GO TO MY SHORE BOSSES WITH A PROBLEM WITHOUT AN ATTACHED SOLUTION, IT GOES AGAINST ME ..<br />\n<br />\nIF MY ATTACHED SOLUTION IS LATER PROVED TO BE HOGWASH I WILL NOT GET MY NEXT CONTRACT.<br />\n<br />\nIF I GO GHADI GHADI TO THEM WITH PROBLEMS ND ZERO ATTACHED SOLUTIONS --MY RELIEVER WILL LAND UP WITHOUT WARNING AT THE NEXT PORT..<br />\n<br />\nHAS OUR NGT EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE ?<br />\n<br />\nACCOUNTABLITY IS NOT ONLY WHAT WE DO , BUT ALSO WHAT WE DO NOT DO--FOR WHICH WE ARE ACCOUNTABLE.<br />\n<br />\nOUR GRUESOME TWOSOME MADHAV GADGIL AND K KARURIRANGAN HAS TURNED A NELSONs EYE TO THE BIGGEST ECOLOGICAL PROBEM IN KUTTANAD --THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nKUTTANAD WENT UNDER FLOODS ONLY BECAUSE OF RAMPANT LAND RECLAMATION OF VEMBABAND LAKE...THIS MASSIVE ENCROACHMENT STARTED DURING THE WHITE INVADERS RULE WITH HELP OF OF CHURCH FOR THE RICH LAND OWNING CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br />\n<br />\nCHRISTIAN CONVERT FISHERMEN WANTED TO CATCH NICE BRACKISH WATER FISH WITHOUT VENTURING INTO SEA, KEEPING THEIR ASSES SAFE IN PLACID WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAS THE GRUESOME TWOSOME NOT SAY A SINGLE WORD ABOUT THANEERUKKOM BUND AND THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY ?</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\">Over 1.7 million people live on the banks of the Vembanad lake and are directly or indirectly dependent on it for their livelihoods</span></div>\n<br />\nTHE THANNERMUKKOM BUND WAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE TIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS. THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">NETHERLANDS&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL .</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\nThe bund has caused deterioration of fish varieties in the region and the fishermen opposed to the bund.<br />\n<br />\nThe bund has also disrupted the harmony of the sea with the backwaters and has caused problems not foreseen before the bund like the omniprescence of the water weeds.<br />\n<br />\nEarlier the salt water tends to cleanse the backwaters but this does not happen any more leading to the pollution of the backwaters and the entire land near by.<br />\n<br />\nKuttanad region has the lowest altitude in India, and is one of the few places in the world where farming is carried around between four to ten feet below sea level. Rice grown in saline waters is not good for heath.<br />\n<br />\nThe history of FRESH WATER paddy cultivation in Kuttanad can be traced back for millenniums<br />\n<br />\nI will write in more detail later<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE ASK GADGIL BABY AND KASTURIRANGAN BABY--WHY IS KUTTANAD STILL UNDER WATER? PRAY --PRITHEE ?</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-weight: bold;\">IT DID NOT ACCOUNT FOR HIGHWATER SPRING TIDES, SEAWATER LEVEL RISE DUE TO ADVERSE WINDS OF LONG FETCH , EL NINO POWERED SEVERE RAINS , SUDDEN RELEASE OF DAM WATERS ETC&nbsp;</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html?showComment=1535871574594#c8318280190062080305\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 2, 2018 at 12:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_162MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN FUTURE NO MAJOR DAM MUST RELEASE WATER WITHOUT FILLING UP A RISK ASSESSMENT FORM , SIGNED , FILED AND SCAN SENT BY EMAIL TO PROPER AUTHORITIES ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/dynamic-risk-assessment-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">SUDDEN UNCONTROLLED RELEASE WITHOUT WARNING IS THE REASON WHY KERALA HAS SUFFERED MORE THAN 400 DEATHS AND 30,000 CRORES IN DAMAGES..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YET OUR RULERS PROTECT THE GUILTY\u2026. ARE WE MONKEYS OR HUMANS ?.. WHO DO WE PRETEND TO SLEEP AND EXPECT OTHERS TO WAKE US UP?...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE ALL SAW HOW SECOND STANDARD FAIL KERALA MINISTER MM MANI CAME ON TV TO GIVE RIDICULOUS AND FRIVOLOUS SOUND BYTES ABOUT CHERUTHONI DAM WATER RELEASE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DAMS MUST NOT OPERATE AS SILOS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM MUST CONTAIN THE WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS WHICH CAN FLOOD THE HINTERLAND .. IT MUST INDICATE IF THOSE NERBY DAM SHUTTERS ARE OPEN OR MAY BE OPENED IN AN IMMINENT MANNER .. THE RESERVOIR WATER LEVELS OF OTHER DAMS MUST BE WRITTEN DOWN IN THIS RISK ASSESSMENT FORM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE RISK ASSESSMENT FORM ( AND ATTACHED CHECK LIST ) MUST CONTAIN INFORMATION ABOUT HIGH WATER SPRING TIDES AND RISE OF SEA WATER LEVEL DUE TO LONG PERIODS OF SEA TO SHORE WINDS ( LONG FETCH ) WHICH RAISE THE SEA WATER LEVEL.PROBABILTY OF LONG PERIODS OF HEAVY RAIN DUE TO EL NINO..AS WHAT HAPPENED IN 1997 IN 2018 .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DURING EL NINO YEAR THERE WILL BE NO HURRICANES IN THE ATLANTIC OCEAN WHILE PACIFIC OCEAN HURRICANES INCREASE DRASTICALLY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/el-nino-and-la-nina-mariners-overview.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NO NEW DAM MUST BE CONSTRUCTED WITHOUT DESILTING FACILITIES\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE WANT A TRANSPARENT WEBSITE WHICH TELL US HOW MUCH MAJOR DAMS IN INDIA HAVE BEEN SILTED .. WHY RE WE HIDING THIS.. THERE MUST BE A NEW MINISTRY FORMED FOR THE SUBJECT OF \u201cDAM SILTATION\u201d ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CURRENTLY ALOST ALL DAM RESERVOIRS IN INDIA ARE SILTED TO MORE THAN 60% CAUSING LOSS OF WATER HOLDING VOLUME ..SUBSEQUENTLY THESE WATER LEVEL OF THESE RESERVOIRS HAVE BEEN RAISED INDUNDATING MORE LAND, INCREASING WATER SURFACE AREA , INCREASING EVAPORATION LOSSES IN A CRIMINAL MANNER ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED DAM WATER RELEASE IS DISASTROUS AS WHAT HAPPENED IN KERALA.. RISK WAS NOT ASSESSED..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">UNCONTROLLED EXPLOSION CAUSES LOSS OF LIVES ( BOMB ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTROLLED EXPLOSION HELPS MAN ( DIESEL ENGINE INTERNAL COMBUSTION ) ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WE DO NOT WANT ANY MORE DAMS IN ECOLOGICALLY SENSITIVE AREAS.. PATH OF NATURAL WATERWAYS MUST NOT BE BLOCKED ... ANCIENT FLOOD WATER DRAIN BASIS MUST NOT BE CONSTRUCTED OVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KERALA IS LUCKY THAT WE THE PEOPLE STOPPED ARANMULA AIRPORT CONSTRUCTION AGAINST THE WISHES OF VESTED FOREIGN CONTROLLED CHRISTIAN FORCES, TRYING TO STOP SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE BY KILLING THE PAMPA RIVER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MUCH BEFORE MADHAV GADGIL WROTE AGAINST THE ARANMULA AIRPORT, CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD WARNED -- \"DO NOT BLOCK NATURAL WATERWAYS \"..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/11/aranmula-airport-kerala-mindless-rape.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK CM PINARAYI VIJAYAN TO DO A FRESH STUDY OF KUTTANAD ( VEMBANAD LAKE ) WITH THE HELP OF EXPERTS FROM NETHERLANDS WHOSE LAND IS BELOW SEA LEVEL ..NETHERLANDS IS BELOW SEA LEVEL LIKE KUTTANAD AND THEY ARE DYKE EXPERTS..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THOTTAPALLY SPILLWAY IS ILL DESIGNED ..IT CANNOT CARRY EVEN 5% OF THE VOLUME ENVISAGED DUE TO WIDTH AND SAND BARS ..CAUSING KUTTANAD THE RICE BOWL OF KERALA TO GO UNDER WATER..</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold;\">THE THANNERMUKKOM BUND WAS FOR THE RICH CHRISTIAN CONVERT LANDOWNERS TO CULTIVATE PADDY CROPS THREE TIMES A YEAR INSTEAD OF TWO AND MAXIMISE PROFITS... THIS BUND HAS CREATED EXTREMELY SEVERE ENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-vadakayil-report-ecological.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">REMEMBER 17 LAKH PEOPLE LIVE ON THE BANKS OF THE VEMBANAD LAKE AND THEIR LIVES ARE DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY DEPENDENT ON IT FOR SURVIVAL AND LIVELIHOOD.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_162BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_162b+seedoAUD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_160T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; AND THEIR INFORMATION MUST BE GIVEN TO THE DUTCH TEAM..<br />\n<br />\nLOCAL EXPERTS ARE NOT BEAURAUCRATS --- THEY HAVE TO BE EXPERIENCED FARMERS WITH A STAKE ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nKERALA HAS LOST ALL HER WATER COLLECTION BASINS DUE TO CHRISTIAN , MUSLIM AND COMMIE POLITICAL PARTIES GIVING AWAY PADDY LANDS FOR PARTY CADRE TO BUILD HOUSES ILLEGALLY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DAM RIVERS EXCESSIVELY, NO RIVER WATER FLOWS TO THE SEA \u2013 LIKE CAUVERY IN TAMIL NADU.. THIS CAUSES SALT WATER INTRUSION INTO COASTAL AQUIFERS AND FISHERMEN TO SHAMELESSLY STEAL FISH FROM SRI LANKAN WATERS..<br />\n<br />\nALL THESE GREAT MAHAMERU ENVIRONMENTALISTS LIKE MADHAV GADGIL / K KASTURIRANGAN\u2014AND PATHETIC NGT -- ALL THEY ARE GOOD AT IS POINTING FINGERS..HAVE THEY EVER BEEN ACCOUNTABLE? ..<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">DO THESE SO CALLED EXPERTS EVEN KNOW OF THE TERM \u201c DAM RESERVOIR INDUCED SISEMCITY \u201c WHICH CAUSES LAND SLIDES?..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nDO THEY EVEN KNOW THE MEANING OF A SOLITION WAVE CAUSED BY A LANDSLIDE INTO A DAM RESERVOIR.. IN BANASURA SAGAR DAM RESERVOIR AND MULLAPERIAR YOU CAN SEE THE SIGNS OF PAST LANDSLIDES..<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO SACK ALL IN IMD AND INFUSE FRESH BLOOD WHO ARE TRAINED ABROAD IN WEATHER PREDICTIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECARED 2018 AS A EL NINO YEAR , A FULL WEEK BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS AND WARNED AGAINST LAST MINUTE EMERGENCY FLOOD WATER RELEASE.. THIS IS ON RECORD EVEN IN PMO..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/mullaperiar-dam-government-and-people.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWE MUST STOP THIS RIDICULOUS PRACTICE OF BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL AND BOTTOM OF THE LOSER LAWYERS POOL \u201cLAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES&nbsp; \u201d<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 16px;\"><b>SUPERIMPOSING THE BLUE PRINT OF THE CONSTITUTION ON TOP OF COMPLEX TECHNICAL CALCULATIONS \u2014WERE IS THE INTELLIGENCE IN THIS ?.</b></span>. ARE WE DONKEYS ?..<br />\n<br />\nMUCH BEFORE THE KERALA FLOODS I HAD DONE COMPLEX CALCULATIONS AND DEMANDED THAT MULLAPERIAR DAM WATER MUST NOT BE ALLOWED TO BUILD UP TO 141 FEET..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU BUILD EXCESSIVE DAMS ( POLITICIANS MAKING MONEY ) ON THE UPPER REACHES OF A RIVER , THE LOWER PART OF THE RIVER IS STARVED OF WATER..<br />\n<br />\nWATER FLOW IN LOWER PARTS OF A RIVER IS A MUST AS THEY RECHARGE AQUIFERS HUNDREDS OF MILES AWAY FROM THE RIVER BANKS..TODAY THESE UNDERGROUND RIVER CHANNELS ARE ALL BLOCKED DUE TO DISUSE..<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE HAVE MAIN STREAM MEDIA WHO ARE FIT ONLY TO TALK ABOUT POTHOLES? WHY DOES A BLOGGER HAVE TO DO THE JOB OF THE STUPID INDIAN MAIN STREAM MEDIA ?<br />\n<br />\nIMAGINE , PM MODI WANTED TO KILL BHARATMATA BY RIVER INTERLINKING AND THAT TOO USING HIS WHITE JEW MASTERS IN ISRAEL\u2014 ISRAEL HAS GOT THOUSANDS OF MIGHTY RIVERS , RIGHT? BRAAAYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">GANGES CANNOT BE CLEANED UNLESS THE RIVER WATER FLOWS ..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html</span><br />\nWE ASK VOTE KA BHOOKA PM MODI\u2014TAKE CARE OF BHARATMATA . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stephen Paddock was\ncontinuously paid through US government entities such as the Internal Revenue\nService and US Postal Service in order to maintain his \u201cdeep cover\u201d status\u2014and\nthat generously allowed him to purchase properties in Texas worth over $6\nmillion, and to maintain his private plane there too<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Australian Brian Hodge,\nwho was staying in the room next to Stephen Paddock on the 32nd floor of the\nMandalay, stated that there were multiple shooters inside the hotel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assertions were made by\nNevada law enforcement authorities that the gunman was Stephen Paddock, a\n64-year-old white male who apparently acted alone and without any political or\nideological motive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s a rare thing for\nan affluent older white man\u2014he was 64 and devoted to gambling in his retirement\nfrom accountancy\u2014without a criminal record to assemble a vast arsenal and\nunleash it on hundreds of people he had never met.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paddock was merely a\nfront for the \u201cDeep State\u201d..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My elder son and wife left Las Vegas just before the airport was shut down..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMERICA has used just\nabout every lever you can use, short of starving the people of North Korea to\ndeath, to change their behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who is USA to blackmail\nthe UNSC into punishing nations which do not bend to the empire\u2019s wishes?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even Russia and China\ncapitulated and went along with this literally genocidal program of sanctions\ncontained in this UNSC Resolution?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Russia and China\nknow that Washington\u2019s arguments against the DPRK are based on a web of lies.\nThat everything coming out of Washington is a lie, or untruth, or omission of\nfacts \u2013 is well known around the globe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;But in this case, where two ascending\nsuper-powers, Russia and China have the veto right to say NO to these illegal\nsanctions, it begs the question, why\u2019 didn\u2019t they use their veto?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
