HE WAS NEVER A FRIEND OF IMRAN KHAN..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN JEW IMRAN KHAN BEING SARCASTIC ON WATCHING THE SHENANIGANS OF SIDHU.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE DRUG PROBE IN PUNJAB IS THE FRUIT OF KHALISTANI/ PAKISTANI ISI NEXUS..</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rBFZgHno2eY</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_14b+seedCT_D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_14b+seedCT_D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President John F\nKennedy (JFK) warned citizens that we are living in \u201ca system which has\nconscripted vast human and material resources into the building of a tightly\nknit, highly efficient machine that combines military, diplomatic,\nintelligence, economic, scientific and political operations.\u201d He went on to\nstate that \u201cits preparations are concealed, not published. Its mistakes are\nburied, not headlined. Its dissenters are silenced, not praised. No expenditure\nis questioned, no rumour is printed, no secret is revealed.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even before former U.S.\nPresident Woodrow Wilson revealed:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cSince I entered politics,\nI have chiefly had men\u2019s views confided to me privately. Some of the biggest\nmen in the United States, in the field of commerce and manufacture, are afraid\nof somebody, are afraid of something. They know that there is a power somewhere\nso organized, so subtle, so watchful, so interlocked, so complete, so\npervasive, that they had better not speak above their breath when they speak in\ncondemnation of it. \u201c<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over a century ago, the\nCarnegie and Rockefeller foundations began to alter university medical\ncurricula to reflect a greater focus on pharmaceuticals so they could increase\ntheir profits. They put their money into drug-based research and made that the\nmain focus of modern day healthcare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since then, the\nRothchilds and the kosher banking elite have been able to control and profit\nfrom the drug industry.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0W_OBRmAz2Y/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0W_OBRmAz2Y?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cmost important\nfactor\u201d that drives prescription drug prices higher in the United States than\nanywhere else in the world is the existence of government-protected \u201cmonopoly\u201d\nrights for drug manufacturers..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Countries with national health programs have\ngovernment entities that either negotiate drug prices or decide not to cover\ndrugs whose prices they deem excessive. No similar negotiating happens in the\nU.S. Drug manufacturers in the U.S. set their own prices<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The AMA, ( American\nMedical Association )the largest association of physicians in the U.S.,\nenforces the drug-treatment paradigm by heavily lobbying Congress and\npublishing one of the most influential journals, JAMA (Journal of the American\nMedical Association),which is largely funded by pharmaceutical advertisers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JAMA is a peer-reviewed\nmedical journal published 48 times a year by AMA. It publishes original\nresearch, reviews, and editorials covering all aspects of the biomedical\nsciences.&nbsp; AMA&nbsp; is the largest association of physicians\u2014both\nMDs and DOs\u2014and medical students in the United States.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMA's stated mission is \"to bring\ntogether physicians and communities to improve the nation\u2019s health.. .&nbsp; AMA spends millions of USD on lobbyists,\nsecond only to the American Chamber of Commerce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1WUepm4hsMo/W3J-kKNZtVI/AAAAAAABddM/s7nF9ZvPblgZ6X4iki3XYo26OR8Og0CPgCLcBGAs/s1600/sbig-pharma-450.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"281\" data-original-width=\"450\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1WUepm4hsMo/W3J-kKNZtVI/AAAAAAABddM/s7nF9ZvPblgZ6X4iki3XYo26OR8Og0CPgCLcBGAs/s640/sbig-pharma-450.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S. has a patent\nsystem that allows drug manufacturers to remain the sole manufacturer of drugs\nthey\u2019ve patented for 20 years or more. The FDA also gives drug manufacturers\nexclusivity for certain products, including those that treat people with rare\ndiseases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kosher drug companies\ndeploy questionable strategies to maintain their monopolies. The tactics vary,\nbut they include slightly tweaking the nontherapeutic parts of drugs, such as\npill coatings, to game the patent system and paying large \u201cpay for delay\u201d\nsettlements to generics manufacturers who sue them over these patents. The FDA\ntakes a long time to approve generic drugs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Application backlogs at\nthe FDA have led to delays of three or four years before generic manufacturers\ncan win approval to make drugs not protected by patents.. Although drug\nmanufacturers often cite research and development costs when defending high\nprescription prices, the connection isn\u2019t exactly true<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conflict of interest\ndescribes a situation in which a person is or appears to be at risk of acting\nin a biased way because of personal interests.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe most important duty of doctors is to provide care that is in the\nbest interests of patients. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, in addition to\ncaring for patients, many doctors also participate in other activities. Doctors\noften teach medical students or supervise doctors in training. They may conduct\nresearch studies, and through their research, they may help develop or invent\nnew drugs or medical devices. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JnWhlH581Xk/W3J_C8YNTfI/AAAAAAABddU/jDJufBhrTfI-86D8Dn2DdElQb6fohoNDACLcBGAs/s1600/biharma-needs-regulation_0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"555\" data-original-width=\"720\" height=\"492\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JnWhlH581Xk/W3J_C8YNTfI/AAAAAAABddU/jDJufBhrTfI-86D8Dn2DdElQb6fohoNDACLcBGAs/s640/biharma-needs-regulation_0.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They may invest in drug\nor biotechnology companies, and they may also own testing facilities or\ntreatment centers that provide health care services. Doctors must also\nparticipate in educational activities in order to stay up to date with changes\nand advances in the field of medicine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Through these\nactivities, doctors often develop relationships with various people,\nbusinesses, and organizations. Although their underlying goals may be to\nimprove medicine and patient care, doctors may also benefit financially from\nsome of these relationships. For example, a doctor who is involved in\ndeveloping a new medical device may receive payment from the medical device\ncompany, or a doctor who has invested in a treatment center may profit when\npeople go there for treatments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN INDIA DOCTORS WHO\nPLAY KOSHER EVIL PHARMA BALL WITH RESPECT TO USING INDIANS AS GUINEA PIGS GET\nMONEY IN FOREIGN ACCOUNTS AND DEVIANT / PEDOPHILE SEXUAL JAUNTS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors\u2019 relationships\nwith drug companies (including any payments or gifts received from the\ncompanies) might affect how they report results of research studies, what they\nteach medical students about particular drugs, or what treatments they\nrecommend for patients. Furthermore, doctors who own testing facilities or\ntreatment centers may preferentially refer patients to these facilities for\ncare and may benefit financially from doing so.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High-profile advocacy\ngroups for individuals with cancer, Alzheimer\u2019s, HIV and other diseases almost\nalways accept funding from pharmaceutical firms, and many fail to report any\ncontributions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More than 86% of the\nUnited States\u2019 103 largest patient advocacy groups take contributions from the\ndrug, medical device and biotech industries, raising questions about whether\nthey consistently put patients first<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patients want cheaper\nmedicine; the pharmaceutical industry wants to maximize revenue.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Big KOSHER Pharma has\nclose ties to the DEEP STATE . Even though it\u2019s illegal for Big Pharma to\nadvertise drugs in other countries, it\u2019s completely legal in North America. The\nadvertisements are often misleading, overstating the benefits and completely\nomitting the risks or potential side effects (or simply putting them in tiny,\nillegible letters).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lobbying expenditures by the pharmaceutical industry have\nbeen increasing every year is more than one billion USD.. Big Pharma pressureS\nthe FDA to speed up their drug approval process in a covert manner<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6SsMz259Jqs/W3KBVtwmkDI/AAAAAAABdds/YZo71ABgnCMHM8njOZwogdMpSHoZ_dNRwCLcBGAs/s1600/1e752314_orig.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"618\" data-original-width=\"1100\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-6SsMz259Jqs/W3KBVtwmkDI/AAAAAAABdds/YZo71ABgnCMHM8njOZwogdMpSHoZ_dNRwCLcBGAs/s640/1e752314_orig.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/10/say-no-to-plastics-human-suffering-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-doctors-write-illegible.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/09/why-doctors-write-illegible.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/guinea-pigs-for-untested-medicines.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/guinea-pigs-for-untested-medicines.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The U.S. government\nalso holds strong ties to the meat and dairy industries. The government has\nhelped food providers become more dairy-based, and implemented milk education\ninto school programs. The BEEF lobby and A1 milk lobby ( humpless cows ) are\nthe biggest culpriits when it comes to global warming \u2013emitting potent\ngreenhouse gases Methane and Nitrous oxide.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The USDA has heavy ties to many\nadvertisements and campaigns encouraging consumers to purchase meat. The U.S.\ngovernment spends $41 billion annually to subsidize the meat and dairy\nindustries, in comparison to only 0.04% of that on fruits and vegetables.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The USDA Food Guide Pyramid states you should\neat 2-3 servings of milk, yogurt, and cheese, despite the fact that only 62% of\npeople can actually digest humpless cow A1 toxic milk properly, What the food\nguide doesn\u2019t mention is that numerous studies have proven that meat and dairy\nconsumption can cause cancer, heart disease, obesity, and many more health\ncomplications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-kDlXmbTZOoA/W3J_fw4TuUI/AAAAAAABddg/hKT547gQDEYH99j4rezOYdThCb-5rveGwCLcBGAs/s1600/IXEewLkB1iEo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; color: red; font-size: x-large;\">AWARENESS WILL KILL THE KOSHER DEEP STATE</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xloX_0LSLMk/W3KBsnZW7aI/AAAAAAABdd0/3nP6H84HgwY8JK2Mzpu9v8KybNXnqwpswCLcBGAs/s1600/iemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_25.html?showComment=1527320304009#c4422559943530061338\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 26, 2018 at 1:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_29MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HITLER DID PROPAGANDA THAT HE IS ARYAN AND NAZIS ARE ARYANS WITH HINDU SYMBOL OF SWASTIKA , THE KALA CHAKRA .. THIS WAS ROTHSCHILDs PROPAGANDA AS JEW HITLER WAS ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEWS OF EUROPE ( BASED FROM GEORGIA ) WERE MOSTLY LEFT HANDED HOMOSEXUALS , AND THEY ADOPTED THE SYMBOL OF SHIVA / SHAKTI MERGE , THE SIX POINTED STAR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARYANS ARE NOT BLUE EYED BLONDE EUROPEANS... ARYANS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WHO KNEW SANSKRIT AND VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE... THEY EXCELLED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY AND WERE VISITING PROFESSORS FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING ) TO TAXILA/NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR AND FOREIGN UNIVERSITIES LIKE ALEXANDRIA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE MATH KNOWINGCREAM OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( NAMBOODIRIPADS ) WERE BHATTATHIRIPADS .. ARYABHATTAs REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD ... ARYAN WAS A TITLE ( MAN OF KNOWLEDGE )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAMBOODIRIS WERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS OF KERALA...WHO WERE RULING CLASS. THIYYAS ARE DANAVAS... DANU IS THE MOTHER OF DANAVAS ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kashyapa's 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati. Danu, the Hindu primordial goddess, is mentioned in the Rigveda ( penned down 7000 years ago ) , as mother of the Danavas. Kashmir is named after Kashyapa..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAYA DANAVA is the creator of the MAYAN calendar.. He made the Indraprastha palace ..in which Duryodhana fell down in a pool of water in the hall of illusions ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kala [Time] created yonder heaven, and Kala made these realms of earth,</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By Kala, stirred to motion, both what is and what shall be, expand, (...).Kala created living things and first of all Prajapati,From Kala self-made KASHYAPA, from Kala Holy Fire was born.--\u2014\u2009</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">Atharvaveda, Book XIX, Hymns L51-53 ( 5000 BC )</b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ADITI is mentioned 81 times in Rig Veda..The Vedas went on oral rute for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago..Aditi is the mother of DEVAS ( example Indra ) and was also a wife of Kashyapa..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sons of Danu ( DANAVAS ) and sons of Aditi ( DEVAS ) were opposite forces .. In Samudra Manthan the DANAVAS held the head of Vasuki the snake and DEVAS held the tail to churn the comic ocean..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JERUSALEM AND BATUMI ( GEORGIA/ KHAZARIA ) WERE SEA PORTS FROM WHERE THE JEWS ( MIDDLE MEN OF SPICES ) TOOK CALICUT KINGs SPICES AFTER OVERLAND ROUTE JOURNEY --LOADED IT ON SHIPS AND TOOK IT TO EUROPE FOR SALE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FROM SALALAH ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT VIA MECCA OASIS TO PALESTINE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">FROM GWADAR ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT TO BATUMI GEORGIA AND CONSTANTINOPLE..</span></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE JEWS OF CONSTANTINOPLE WERE CRYPTO. THEY STILL ARE .. THE FIRST REAL DEEP STATE WAS IN TURKEY WITH CRYPTO JEWS CONTROLLING AND MUSLIMS RULING..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD NOT MARRY OR OWN LAND..WHILE THE ELDEST BROTHER COULD HAVE 4 WIVES AND OWN ALL FERTILE LAND..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MOHAMMADs FATHER WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO WAS PUJARI OF SHIVA TEMPLE ( KAABA )..WHEN MOHAMMAD MADE HIS NEW RELIGION THE FIRST THING HE DID WAS ALLOWING ALL YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS TO HAVE 4 WIVES...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE ORIGINAL JEWS OF PALESTINE ARE ALL IN KERALA , OR DEAD OR CONVERTED..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE ARE NO ORIGINAL JEWS IN KHAZARIA .. THESE ARE ALL A GANG OF CRIMINALS / HOMOSEXUALS ( WHITES ) WHO WERE WARNED TO ADOPT A RELIGION OR PERISH ..&nbsp; &nbsp;THESE ARE THE \"</span><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SEMITES</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\". THEIR DESCENDANTS ARE THE CURRENT JEWS OF ISRAEL-WHO HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH PALESTINE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VgT4rWV-KSY/W3KGgVGM_fI/AAAAAAABdeM/1ZczTpbdO_ER2VDdEqaCGoUVAqmwoHDkQCLcBGAs/s1600/rothZZschilds-timeIline-5-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"300\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VgT4rWV-KSY/W3KGgVGM_fI/AAAAAAABdeM/1ZczTpbdO_ER2VDdEqaCGoUVAqmwoHDkQCLcBGAs/s400/rothZZschilds-timeIline-5-638.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rvcpaDyvEHE/W3KIjhQkyUI/AAAAAAABdeY/791OptVRMswQBoCrkwM7wczBpQIrAuKZwCLcBGAs/s1600/kAhazaria-map.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"569\" data-original-width=\"652\" height=\"558\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rvcpaDyvEHE/W3KIjhQkyUI/AAAAAAABdeY/791OptVRMswQBoCrkwM7wczBpQIrAuKZwCLcBGAs/s640/kAhazaria-map.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shadow government and\ndeep state are both political terms in a sense, as they\u2019re used to define the\ngroups of people who control the. government.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nWe are not referring to the people within political parties that\nperceivably control the system \u2014 not the Presidents or Congress \u2014 but the\nindividuals and the companies who control the government and influence policies\nand decisions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very definition of the shadow government lies within the\nterm itself; it\u2019s the real government entity that hides within the shadows,\nmaking all of the important decisions in secret. Their political agenda and\ntrue motives are completely hidden from the public.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These aren\u2019t the people you\nsee on mainstream media, nor are they the people you vote for; they\u2019re the\nindividuals who lurk in the shadows, which is precisely how they\u2019re able to\nmaintain control over the population, feeding the illusion of democracy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term deep state\nrefers to \u201ca state within a state,\u201d a group of people who have so much control\ninside of a state that they don\u2019t actually have to abide by the same laws,\nlargely because they\u2019re the ones creating them. The deep state can even include\nelements of the government, including the Pentagon, which has acted immune to\nmany laws.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Up until this year, for instance, they had never been audited,\ndespite the fact that this is illegal and an astounding $10 trillion in tax\npayer money had gone completely unaccounted for since 1996.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to an\nin-depth report by journalist Mike Lofgren:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State does not\nconsist of the entire government. It is a hybrid of national security and law\nenforcement agencies: the Department of Defense, the Department of State, the\nDepartment of Homeland Security, the Central Intelligence Agency and the\nJustice Department. I also include the Department of the Treasury because of\nits jurisdiction over financial flows, its enforcement of international\nsanctions and its organic symbiosis with Wall Street.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John F. Hylan, former\nMayor of New York City, explained:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real menace of our\nRepublic is the invisible government, which like a giant octopus sprawls its\nslimy legs over our cities, states and nation . . .&nbsp; The little coterie of powerful international\nbankers virtually run the United States government for their own selfish\npurposes. They practically control both parties . . .&nbsp; [and] control the majority of the newspapers\nand magazines in this country. They use the columns of these papers to club\ninto submission or drive out of office public officials who refuse to do the\nbidding of the powerful corrupt cliques which compose the invisible government.\nIt operates under cover of a self-created screen [and] seizes our executive\nofficers, legislative bodies, schools, courts, newspapers and every agency\ncreated for the public protection.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; WHEN IT IS DIES IT FLOATS DOWN STREAM..</span><br />\n<br />\nAll of the stars \u201cappear\u201d to rotate in the sky due to the fact that the earth is rotating on its axis. Because the north pole is tilted towards Polaris, all of the stars in this part of the sky appear to rotate around this fixed point.<br />\n<br />\nNOW\u2014<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">WHEN THE FATHER DIES THE SON WALKS AROUND THE PYRE ( BEFORE LIGHTING ) ANTI-CLOCKWISE..</span><br />\nWhen the father dies , the eldest son is in the lead bare chested with untied kudumi .<br />\n<br />\nThe eldest son carries a pot of water on his left shoulder, using his right hand to hold the ganges water pot in place. He has to circumambulate (or go around) the body three times in an anti-clockwise direction, from left to right. The younger sons follow behind him.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWhen the eldest son circumambulates the body, the priest makes a hole in the pot so as to allow water to spout wetting his untied kudumi.<br />\n<br />\nWater holds memory.<br />\n<br />\nEach time he circumambulates ( 3 times ) , a new hole is made.<br />\n<br />\nIn the first circumambulation, the water that flows facilitates the departure of the soul from this world. During the second circumambulation, the water that flows is to purify the atmosphere. During the third circumambulation, the water that flows is to lead the soul to heaven.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAfter the third circumambulation, the son faces north and throws the pot over the shoulder southwards, over his back. ..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe elder son squeezes a few drops from his wet untied kudumi into his dead father\u2019s mouth. Remember his father had once done it , long ago, on the 16th day of his birth.<br />\n<br />\nThis is like a relay baton passing on. After this he is not to look back . The symbolizes the break of the father\u2019s soul , with planet earth.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_49b+seedT1HD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_49b+seedT1HD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7576792624864012597\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_24M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_12.html?showComment=1534126378622#c7576792624864012597\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 13, 2018 at 7:42 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_24MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://edition.cnn.com/2018/08/10/us/parker-solar-probe-launch-nasa/index.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE TRAITOR BENAMI MEDIA HAS STOPPED SHOUTING THAT HINDUSIM IS FULL OF SUPERSTITION, EVER SINCE THIS BLOGSITE HAS BECOME POPULAR WORLDWIDE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">714 MILLION</span></b> IS THE PROFILE VIEW..<br />\n<br />\nSO NOW THESE JUDASES ( WHO SOLD BHARATMATA FOR A PIECE OF KOSHER SILVER ) HAVE SHIFTRED TRACKS--THEY CONCENTRATE ON SHOUTING THAT HINDUS ARE VIOLENT..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS HARD TO CONVINCE ANYBODY THAT VEGETARIANS CAN BE VIOLENT...<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE SUN IS A TRANSFORMER..</span></b>&nbsp; ENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED OR DESTROYED AS PER THE VEDAS- IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED..<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS WENT ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE MILLIONS OF THESE VERSES WERE PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO..<br />\n<br />\nTRANSMISSION BY ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES IS THE GREATEST FEAT OF MANKIND.. IT COULD HAPPEN ONLY BECAUSE THESE VERSES HAD DIVINE MATH EMBEDDED.<br />\n<br />\nVEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC , ISOTOPE MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS WHY WE HINDUS INSIST THAT SRUTIS WERE DOWNLOADED FROM AKASHA.. THESE VERSES ARE NOT WRITTEN BY MAN.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">THE SUN CANNOT BE SEEN FROM OUTER SPACE ..BUT ITS ENERGY CAN BE DRAWN BY SOLAR PANELS OF SATELLITES.. THIS IS AN EXAMPLE OF MAYA MENTIONED IN RIG VEDA 72 TIMES AND 29 TIMES IN ATHARVA VEDA</span></b> .<br />\n<br />\nMAYA IS INVISIBLE- NO HUMAN CAN SEE BEYOND THE QUANTUM SCREEN.. OUR 5 SENSES ARE SQUELCHED FOR OUR OWN SURVIVAL.<br />\n<br />\nALL THE INITIAL QUANTUM PHYSICS SCIENTISTS DECLARED THAT WHEN SCIENCE CATCHES UP WITH VEDANTA , THE COSMOS WILL HAVE DISSOLUTION ( PRALAYA ).. SUCH IS THE WISDOM CONTAINED IN THE VEDAS.<br />\n<br />\nALL OF THEM PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE DOWN IN THEIR WILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED --NOT BURIED..<br />\n<br />\nTRANSFORMER ?<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">VISHNU IS A TRANSFORMER -- THOUGH I HAVE MENTIONED THAT VISHNU IS A MEDIATOR AND PRESERVER IN ALL MY POSTS SO FAR.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHAT WE SEE AS MATTER IS ACTUALLY VIBRATING ENERGY -- THIS WAS WRITTEN IN OUR VEDAS--LIFTED BY JEW ALBERT EINSTEIN AND PATENTED IN HIS NAME..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ENERGY CAN NEITHER BE CREATED BY BRAHMA OR DESTROYED BY SHIVA --IT CAN ONLY BE TRANSFORMED BY VISHNU.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nALL HINDU GODS ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES , EXCEPT VISHNUs MORTAL AVATARS VAMAMA, PARASHURAMA, RAMA, KRISHNA AND AYYAPPA.<br />\n<br />\nONLY VISHNU HAS MORTAL AVATARS --SHIVA AND BRAHMA CANNOT HAVE MORTAL AVATARS..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU LOOK INTO THE MIRROR WHAT YOU SEE IS NOT YOU-- YOU ARE ACTUALLY A BALL OF VIBRATING ENERGY INSIDE YOUR BODY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DIE YOUR SOUL WILL EXIT YOUR BODY..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE BODY IS CREMATED AND THE SKULL POPS A SOLITON WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WILL TAKE YOUR SOUL UP TO ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS WHICH ACCOMMODATES THAT PARTICULAR SOUL FREQUENCY.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU BURY A DEAD BODY , THE SOUL IS TRAPPED ON PLANET EARTH, UNHAPPY AND LOST FOREVER. SINCE BURIAL RELIGIONS CAME ON PLANET EARTH MAN HAS KNOWN NO PEACE..<br />\n<br />\nYOUR SOUL FREQUENCY IS TIED TO YOUR NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE. WHEN THE KARMIC BAGGAGE GETS LIGHTER , YOUR SOUL FREQUENCY INCREASES..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS CORRESPOND TO THE SEVEN HUMAN CHAKRAS.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO INSTANT KUNDALINI BUNGEE JUMP..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FIRST ASTRA LAYER IS FOR NON \u2013 CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE , FEW SEMI-CONSCIOUS FORMS OF LIFE WHICH CAN PASS THE MIRROR/ COLOUR TEST ( LIKE ELEPHANTS/ BONOBOS/ DOLPHINS ) , AND FULLY CONSCIOUS HUMANS WHO ARE CRIMINALS AND HOMSEXUALS WHOSE KUNDALINIS ARE STUCK IN THE LOWERMOST MOOLADHARA CHAKRA.<br />\n<br />\nCHAKRAS AND ASRAL LAYERS RISE FROM RED TO VIOLET ( RAINBOW VIBGYOR COLORS ).<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_24BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; MAN IS JUST A CHANNEL.<br />\n<br />\nTHE AIM OF A HINDU IS LIBERATION FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS-- SO THAT HIS SOUL CAN GO HOME AND MERGE WITH THE FIELD OF BRAHMAN...<br />\n<br />\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY WHEN THE SOUL FREQUENCY AND FREQUENCY OF THE MOTHER FIELD BRAHMAN ( MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD \u2013SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ) IS THE SAME.. WHEN THIS HAPPENS NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE IS ZERO AND THE HUMAN EGO IS ZERO.<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE JIVAN MUKTS ( ALIVE ON PLANET EARTH ) WHOSE EGO IS ZERO AND WHOSE SOULS HAVE MERGED WITH BRAHMAN WHOSE FIELD EXTENDS TILL EARTH.. THESE ARE THE COMPASSIONATE SAGES WE REFER TO IN OUR PURANAS . A JIVAN MUKT HAS HIS KUNDALINI RAISED TO SAHASRARA CHAKRA..<br />\n<br />\nROGUES GO TO HIMALAYAS PRETEND TO HAVE SEEN ROTHSCHIDs CREATION BABAJI AND CLAIM TO HAVE INSTANT KUNDALINI RAISE<br />\nYOU CANT LESSEN YOUR KARMIC BAGGAGE BY PRAYING TO GOD.. A HINDU CULTIVATES SHRADDHA --NOT BHAKTI UNLIKE SINGLE MESSIAH / SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDHA IS A POSTIVE ENERGY EMANATING FROM WITHIN WHICH FACTORS IN HUMAN CONSCIENCE.. THERE CANNOT BE SINGLE HOLY BOOK DOGMA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SHRADDHA CANNOT BE BLIND FAITH, IT IS ENLIGHTENED FAITH\u2014 SELF VERIFICATION IS INVOLVED IN EVERY INCH OF YOUR SPRIRITUAL PROGRESS.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSHRADDHA IMPIES SELF RELIANCE , AN INDEPENDENT SENSE OF RIGHT OR WRONG , RELIANCE ON OWN CONSCIENCE AND COURGAGE OF ONEs SOUL CONVICTIONS<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS IS WHY HINDUS CAN NEVER RUSH OUT OF TEMPLES ENMASSE AFTER FRIDAY NOON PRAYERS AND START KILLING PEOPLE OF OTHER RELIGIONS ENMASSE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nONLY SANATANA DHARMA AFFORDS THIS UNBRIDLED FREEDOM.<br />\n<br />\nA HINDU DOES NOT NEED TO BE SAVES BY ANY MESSIAH.. HE NEEDS NO ENTRY PERMISSION AT THE PEARLY GATES \u2013THERE IS NO HOUR OF JUDGEMENT . HIS SOUL IS SUBJECTED TO THE UNINERSAL LAWS OF QUANTUM PHYSICS..<br />\n<br />\nLIBERATION IS ONLY THOUGH KNOWLEDGE ..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">SANATANA DHARMA ASKS YOU TO WAKE UP, OTHER RELIGIONS ASK YOU TO REPENT..</span></b><br />\nSHRADDHA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.. BHAGWAD GITA WAS INJECTED WITH POISON REPLACING SHRADDHA WITH BHAKTI..<br />\n<br />\nYOU CANNOT GET INSTANT MOKSHA BY DIPPING IN GANGES . NO GURU CAN GIVE YOU DEEKSHA FOR MOKSHA<br />\n<br />\nWHEN A SON DOES SHRADDH FOR HIS DEAD FATHER , HE HELPS HIS FATHERs SOUL RISE BY ONE ASTRAL LAYER.. THIS IS A ONE TIME AFFAIR.<br />\n<br />\nMOKSHA CAN HAPPEN ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA\u2014AND ONLY TO MEN.<br />\nWOMEN ( CANNOT BE DEVOID OF EGO ) WHOSE SOULS ARE PARKED IN THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER HAVE TO TAKE RE-BIRTH AS MAN TO GET MOKSHA.<br />\n<br />\nKARMIC BAGGAGE CAN BE LESSENED ONLY BY GOOD DEEDS AND BEING CREATIVE --SO THAT YOU PROVE THAT YOU MADE A DIFFERENCE TO THIS PLANET FOR THE BETTER<br />\n<br />\n\"SOUL\" GIVES PERPETUAL MOTION TO YOUR HEART . YOUR SOUL WAS ONCE PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD .. IT YEARNS TO MERGE BACK --IT YEARNS FOR MOKSHA ( HOME COMING )<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU GET MOKSHA YOUR SOUL HAS MERGED WITH BRAHMAN ( MOTHER FIELD ) AND YOU ARE NOW FREE FROM ENDLESS REBIRTHS..<br />\n<br />\nYOUR SOUL GIVES FEEDBACK TO BRAHMAN OF YOUR LIFEs EXPERIENCES-- BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS IS SOUL EVOLUTION.. THERE IS NOTHING LIKE DARWINs EVOLUTION FROM MONEKY TO MAN.</span></b><br />\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS MIND IS TOO SHALLOW -- ONLY A MAD MAN CAN SAY THAT THE GIRAFFEs NECK BECAME LONGER BECAUSE LEAVES WENT HIGHER ON TREE BRANCHES.<br />\n<br />\nIN THIS DNA AGE, OUR NCERT BOOKS EACH OUR KIDS IN SCHOOL ABOUT DARWINs MISSING LINK..<br />\n<br />\nBURN ALL SCHOOL AND COLLEGE TEXT BOOKS IN INDIA WHICH TEACH MAD MAN CHARLES DARWINs EVOLUTION IN THIS DNA AGE.<br />\n<br />\nWE DEMAND THAT THIS BE SUBSTITUTED BY INTELLIGENT DESIGN BY BRAHMAN\u2014THE MORPHOGENETIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD<br />\n<br />\nIT IS THE SOUL WHICH EVOLVES ( from lowest frequency of unicelled fungus to highest moksha human Jivan Mukt frequency ) ACCORDING TO 400 CENTURY OLD VEDANTA..<br />\n<br />\nKARMA CONTROLS MOKSHA --WHICH MEANS YOUR SOUL GOES TO THE 7TH ASTRAL LAYER -- AND YOU ARE NOW GOD YOURSELF AS YOU ( SOUL ) MATCHES THE MOTHER FIELDS HIGHEST FREQUENCY -NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN BACK ON PLANET EARTH<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_20MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_20BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; THE INSTANT THIS FEEDBACK STOPS THERE WILL BE PRALAYA.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nSOULS GIVE FEED BACK TO BRAHMAN ABOUT THEIR EXPERIENCES ON EARTH--BRAHMAN KNOWS EVERYTHING<br />\n<br />\nNON-MOKSHA EVOLVING SOULS AREPARKED IN ONE OF THE SIX LOWER ASTAL LAYERS , AWAITING RE-INDUCTION .<br />\n<br />\nONCE YOU BECOME A HUMAN AND YOUR SOUL IS PARKED IN ASTRAL LAYERS TWO TO SIX\u2014YOU WILL NOT BE RE-INDUCTED AS A LOWER FORM OF LIFE LIKE ANIMAL.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER MEANT FOR SOULS WITH LOWEST FREQUENCY ( HIGH NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ) AND THE SIXTH ASTRAL HAVING PARKING SPACE FOR SOULS OF HIGHER FREQUENCY ( LOW NEGATIVE KARMIC BAGGAGE ).<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">YAMA IS IN CHARGE OF LAYERS TWO TO SIX..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nALL SOULS IN FIRST TO SIXTH ASTRAL LAYERS --AWAIT RE-BIRTH.<br />\n<br />\nONLY SOULS CAN ENTER ALL SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS --NOT THE PHYSICAL BODY ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE 5 PANDAVA BROTHERS AND DRAUPADI DECIDE TO CLIMB MOUNT MERU --IT IS AN ALLEGORY FOR DEATH AND SOULS PARKING AT ONE OF THE SEVEN ASTRAL LAYERS<br />\n<br />\nYAMA ( DHARMA ) IN THE FORM OF A DOG JOINS THIS GROUP ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMA USHERS IN --<br />\nDRAUPADI INTO THE SECOND ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nNAKULA INTO THE THIRD ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nSAHADEVA INTO THE FOURTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nBHIMA INTO THE FIFTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\nARJUNA INTO THE SIXTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\nAND THEN YUDHISTRA LOOKS BACK AND SEES THE DOG.. HE KNOWS THAT NO DOG CAN GET PAST THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER --AND HE IS PUZZLED..<br />\n<br />\nTHE DOG REPRESENTED DHARMA ( YAMA ) \u2014 YUDHISHTRA WAS \u201cSON OF DHARMA \u201c..<br />\nAT THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER ( EQUIVALENT OF HEAVEN ) YUDDHISTRA SEES ALL HUNDRED KAURAVAS ALREADY THERE -- ALONG WITH THE STALWARTS LIKE BHISHMA/ DRONA /KARNA ETC<br />\n<br />\nHE IS SHOCKED AND ANGRY<br />\n<br />\nAT THAT TIME YAMA ( THE DOORKEEPER OF ASTRAL LAYERS 2 TO 6 ) DECLARES THAT HE IS YUDDHISTRAs FATHER WITH KUNTI .. AND THAT YUDDHISTRA STILL HAS SEEDS OF EGO WITHIN HIMS WHICH MAKES HIM UNFIT FOR MOKSHA ..<br />\n<br />\nYAMAs EXPLANATION: WHOEVER KRISHNA KILLED --ALL GOT MOKSHA .. KRISHNA HAD THE UNWRITTEN TASK OF KILLING ALL 100 TEST TUBE KAURAVA BABIES-- HE DID IT AND HOW..<br />\n<br />\nPANDAVAS WOULD HAVE HAD ALBINO BLOOD OF MOTHER KUNTI HAS SEX WITH PANDU ( AN ALBINO )--AND IN THAT CASE KRISHNA WOULD HAVE KILLED ALL 5 PANDAVAS TOO..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER READING THE MAHABHARATA EPIC -- ALL WONDERED WHY KRISHNA PLAYED FOUL--<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU REALLY LOOK AT IT DISPASSIONATELY -- HE GAVE ALL 100 TEST TUBE BABIES MOKSHA-- THE ULTIMATE GIFT FROM VISHNUs AVATAR ..<br />\n<br />\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT\u2014 BRAHMAN DOES NOT ALLOW STAGNATION.. IN SANATANA DHARMA THERE ARE NO CIRCLES\u2014ONLY SPIRALS.<br />\n<br />\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH --THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE DECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS \"PURGATORY\"<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR ANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES -- IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF \"GRATITUDE\"<br />\nIT IS THE LAWS OF KARMA THAT COMPELS HINDUS TO BEHAVE RIGHTEOUSLY AS PER THE UNIVERSAL MORAL ORDER OR LAWS OF DHARMA..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE HINDU KNOWS THAT KARMA IS IN HIS OWN HANDS .. THIS IS WHY A HINDU IS THE SAME OUTSIDE DOORS AND WITHIN DOORS.. A HINDU WOMAN DOES NOT NEED TO CONFESS IN CHURCH TO A STRANGER MALE SEXUAL PREDATOR.</span></b><br />\nTHE RASCAL SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV TOLD ON NDTV THAT MEN CAN HAVE ANAL SEX BEHIND CLOSED DOORS.. MODI GAVE THIS FAKE GURU A PADMA VIBHUSHAN..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_21MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_21BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_21B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c993881140161790291\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_12.html?showComment=1534126676268#c993881140161790291\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 13, 2018 at 7:47 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nTHE OTHER FAKE GURU AND RASCAL SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TOLD ON NDTV THAT SANATANA DHARMA ALOWS HOMOSEXUALITY . HAVE YOU HEARD THE VOICE OF THIS PATHETIC FELLOW-- HAVE YOU SEEN HIS FINGERS ? MODI GAVE HIM TOO A PADMA VIBHUSHAN..<br />\n<br />\nMOKSHA IS PURELY KARMA BASED. THERE IS NO SHORT CUT OR JUGAAD POSSIBLE-- LIKE ROTHSCHILDs CREATION BABAJI ( OR SOME RASCAL LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR ) GIVING YOU DEEKSHA .<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER WE ARE ALL IMMORTAL. WE ALL WERE BORN WITH THE STARS .<br />\n<br />\nYOU , YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER AND YOU WOULD BE GREAT GRANDSON WERE ALL BORN AT THE SAME SPLIT SECOND.<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU AVATARS WERE NOT BORN WITH THE STARS LIKE YOU AND ME . THEIR SOULS WERE CREATED AND SENT DOWN FOR A PURPOSE ON EARTH.<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THEIR MISSION ON EARTH WAS OVER , THEIR SOULS MERGED BACK TO BRAHMAN ON SEVENTH ASTRA LAYER ( VAIKUNTA ).<br />\n<br />\nIT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR CON-MEN TO CLAIM THAT THEY ARE DESCENDANTS OF RAMA OR KRISHNA..<br />\n<br />\nALL MORTALS ON EARTH LIKE YOU AND ME --WERE BORN WITH THE STARS--THE SAME SPLIT SECOND<br />\n<br />\nTHIS MEANS YOUR GREAT GRANDFATHER, YOU AND YOUR GREATGRANSON WAS BORN AT THE SAME SPILT SECOND.<br />\nWE WERE ALL PART OF THE MOTHER FIELD NAMED BRAHMAN ON THE SEVENTH ASTRAL LAYER<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">THIS IS WHY HINDUS DO NAMASTE\u2014WE HONOUR THE PIECE OF BRAHMAN WITHIN THE OTHER PERSON.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE GOD OF SANATANA DHARMA IS A \"MORHOGENETEIC CONSCIOUSNESS FIELD- BRAHMAN \" WHICH CANNOT HE PICKED UP BY THE 5 SENSES--ON MICRO AND MACRO SCALE.<br />\n<br />\nON MICRO SCALE THIS EMPTY SPACE ( INTELLIGENT FIELD ) PROVIDES PERPETUAL MOTION WITHIN AN ATOM.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html</span><br />\nON MACRO SCALE IT IS AKASHA ( ETHER ) WHERE THE ENTIRE COSMOS HOLDS THEIR POSITIONS<br />\nIn Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<br />\n<br />\n7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<br />\n<br />\nOne cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<br />\n<br />\nIf the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<br />\n<br />\nAs for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<br />\n<br />\nThese two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<br />\n<br />\nBalance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<br />\n<br />\nTHE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_22MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_22B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_23B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4050790976314033433\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_12.html?showComment=1534126731771#c4050790976314033433\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 13, 2018 at 7:48 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 4--<br />\n<br />\nThis is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<br />\n<br />\nEach of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThrough uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<br />\n<br />\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<br />\n<br />\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<br />\n<br />\nPrakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<br />\n<br />\nThe eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<br />\n<br />\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<br />\n<br />\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<br />\n<br />\nSamkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<br />\n<br />\nThe union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death.<br />\n<br />\nDO YOU THINK IDIOTS LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV CAN EVER UNDERSTAND THIS\u2014THEIR PADMA VIBHUSHAN MINDS ARE TOO SMALL AND THINKING PROCESS TOO PETTY<br />\n<br />\nREAD ALL <span style=\"color: blue;\">102 PARTS</span> OF THE UNFINISHED POST BELOW-<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_24b+seed0yjD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_24b+seed0yjD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2051210438265446251\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_27M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534063449317#c6342733295400532677\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 12, 2018 at 2:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_171MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>RUSH RUSH RUSH..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WARNING--.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A SCARE IN KERALA THAT THERE ARE EARTH QUAKE TREMORS , CAUSING CRACKS ON HOME WALLS AND COMPOUND WALLS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE CRACKS ( WHEN FAR AWAY FROM A DAM ) HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH EARTH QUAKES ..IT HAS TO DO WITH INSUFFICIENT FOUNDATION OF THE STRUCTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">I WARN THE KERALA CM -- DO NOT ALLOW IDUKKI DAM RESERVOIR TO GO BEYOND 2402 FEET HEIGHT\u2026 TAKE THIS FROM A MAN WHO IS AN EXPERT ON WATER..</span><br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS BEEN BUILT WITH INBUILT DE-SILTING FACILITIES..<br />\n<br />\nAS A RESULT WHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED, THE STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGES INCREASE THE WATER LEVEL ARBITRARILY, LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT MULLAPERIAR.. ALL THEY DELIBERATE ON IS IF THE DAM WALL S STRONG ENOUGH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO TAKE TECHNICAL DECISIONS ( PIL BASED ) ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN WATER LEVEL IS RAISED , IMMEDIATELY WATER SURFACE AREA IN THE SILTED RESERVOIR INCREASES --INUNDATING MORE LAND AROUND.. MORE SURFACE AREA MEANS MORE EVAPORATION OF WATER HELD BY THE DAM .<br />\n<br />\nTHE MORE DANGEROUS THING IS THIS CAN CAUSE LANDSLIDES AND SOLITION WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WHICH CAN CRASH INTO THE DAM WALL BREACHING IT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">CRITICAL MESSAGE --- NOW ABOUT TREMORS NEAR DAMS ..</span><br />\n<br />\nGOD NEVER INTENDED MAN TO BUILD DAMS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN HUGE DAMS ARE BUILT WITH HIGH WATER LEVELS IN THE RESERVOIR IT CAUSE GEOPATHIC STRESS WHICH MAKES THE AREA TREMOR PRONE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">RESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED RIS ( RESERVOIR INDUCED SEISMICITY)...THIS SUBJECTS HAS BEEN STUDIES AS POST DISASTER REACTIONS \u2013 AND NEVER PROACTIVELY BEFORE BUILDING A DAM..<br /><br />80% OF INDIAs LARGE DAMS ARE PRONE TO RIS \u2013 AS THEY HAVE BEEN BUILT WITHOUT PROPER GEOLOGICAL STUDIES ON UNSUITABLE AREAS \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nReservoirs can both increase the frequency of earthquakes in areas of already high seismic activity and cause earthquakes to happen in areas previously thought to be seismically inactive.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA---<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nThe 1979 MORVI DAM BURST ( rajkot , gujarat ) is in the Guinness book of world records.<br />\n<br />\nHas India ever investigated the reason for 26,000 deaths at Morvi due to induced seismicity ?<br />\n<br />\nHas India investigates the 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir.<br />\n<br />\nIn dam water reservoirs, the crushing weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">God has made huge NATURAL lakes in safe areas --unlike man's ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.</span><br />\nSignificant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake. When dam reservoirs are filled or drained, induced seismicity can occur immediately or with a small time lag.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; IT IS A TOKEN THAN THE MOTHER OF THE BOY HAS ACCEPTED THE GIRL ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS RITUAL HOLDS MORE STRENGTH THAT EVERYTHING EXCEPT THE WEARING OF MANGALSUTRA AND THE PHERAS ROUND THE FIRE..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS KANGAN ( BANGLE ) IS USUALLY PLAIN .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">AFTER THE MOTHER-IN-LAW HAS PASSED AWAY, IF THE DAUGHTER IN LAW HOLDS THE BANGLE WITH GRATITUDE , IT CAN WORK WONDERS..<br /><br />ALL THE DAUGHTER-IN -LAW HAS TO DO IS TO INTEND..<br /><br />THE BANGLE CAN HEAL IF HELD OVER THE BODY SPOT WHICH REQUIRES HEALING --THERE IS NO NEED FOR REIKI INITIATION.</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS KANGAN IS PASSED DOWN GENERATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nIT DEVELOPS POWER IF SHRADDH IS DONE ..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE GAVE A KANGAN TO MY SONs WIFE BEFORE MARRIAGE..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.17 %</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/05/marriage-sans-fights-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\ncapt ait vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">All glories to Lord Narasimhadeva! All glories to Lord Narasimhadeva, who is the Lord of Prahlada Maharaja and, like the honeybee, is always engaged in beholding the lotuslike face of the goddess of fortune.</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">Narasimha Pranama</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">namas te narasimhaya, prahladahlada-dayine</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">hiranyakasipor vakshah, sila-tanka-nakhalaye</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">\u201cI offer my respectful obeisances unto You, Lord Narasimhadeva. You are the giver of pleasure to Maharaja Prahlada, and Your nails cut the chest of Hiranyakashipu like a chisel cutting stone.\u201d</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">ito nrsimhah parato nrsimho, yato yato yami tato nrsimhah</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">bahir nrsimho hrdaye nrsimho, nrsimham adim saranam prapadye</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">\u201cLord Narasimhadeva is here, and He is also there on the opposite side. Wherever I go, there I see Lord Narasimhadeva. He is outside and within my heart. Therefore I take shelter of Lord Narasimhadeva, the original Supreme Personality of Godhead.\u201d</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">tava kara-kamala-vare nakham adbhuta-shrngam</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">dalita-hiranyakashipu-tanu-bhrngam</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">keshava dhrta-narahari-rupa jaya jagadisa hare</span><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\">\u201cO my Lord, Your hands are very beautiful, like the lotus flower, but with Your long nails You have ripped apart the wasp Hiranyakashipu. Unto You, Lord of the universe, I offer my humble obeisance.\u201d</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 32, BELOW--</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
