font-size: 17.6px;\" />\n<b style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS&nbsp; POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 29, BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State seeks to\nfrustrate radical and progressive change, so as to preserve their own power,\nand that of the establishment in general. In contrast to overtly authoritarian\nrule, Deep States must operate more or less secretly, like terrorist groups, so\npreserving secrecy is a high priority. Control of the commercially-controlled\nmedia is essential to the effective preservation of secrecy need for the deep\nstate to work effectively. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the U.S., this is\naffected through deep state control of the CIA. With the apparatus of nation\nstates under their control, their subterfuges can be elaborate and complex. The\nDeep States of the world have a natural common interest in hiding their\nexistence, which predisposes them to mutual assistance<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is quite obvious the\nDeep State has declared war on those who wish to oppose the establishment order\nthat is progressing to a world government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State and\ntheir propped up current administration appear to have succeeded in developing\nways to heighten suggestibility and subservience. The network media is crucial\nin creating a narrative that is full of fear and mistrust, using key words and\nphrases that trigger fears in people to the point of an angry or compulsive\nresponse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State elements\nthat profited from the neocon agenda were confident that Hillary\u2019s victory\nwould guarantee another eight years of globalist intervention. Her loss means\nthey are now on the defensive and are creating a straw man argument against\nRussia<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wars in Yugoslavia\nthroughout the 1990s served as a justification for the continued existence of\nNATO in the world, and to expand American imperial interests in Eastern Europe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The plan is for the\nUnited States to rule the world. The overt theme is unilateralism, but it is\nultimately a story of domination. It calls for the United States to maintain\nits overwhelming superiority and prevent new rivals from rising up to challenge\nit on the world stage. It calls for dominion over friends and enemies alike. It\nsays not that the United States must be more powerful, or most powerful, but\nthat it must be absolutely powerful.\"-- Vice-President Dick Cheney - West\nPoint lecture, June 2002<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The goal of the\nwars is to enable the economy to be kept going for the benefit of the High, its\nmilitary, and its bureaucracy and control personnel, but at the same time to\nassure that any excess production capacity is prevented from producing consumer\ngoods for the lower classes. That excess capacity is instead directed to\nproducing excess military goods which will ultimately rust away or be destroyed\nin warfare; that is, the excess capacity is deliberately wasted in order to\nturn it away from the production of goods which would result in added leisure\nor well-being for the lower classes. Those classes are instead continually\nforced into group activities expressing hatred toward the current enemy and\ndependency upon and love toward their benevolent rulers for protecting them\nfrom that enemy. They are thereby led to accept the consumer shortages, the\npoverty, and the other privations to which they are subjected. Their economic\nstatus is kept at the subsistence level, forcing their priorities to be focused\non simply acquiring basic food, clothing, and shelter. They are thus denied\neither the time or the inclination to question the fairness or permanence of\ntheir societal condition, or to otherwise evolve into a threat to the\nestablished hierarchy.\"--George Orwell in his book \"1984\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Our government\nhas kept us in a perpetual state of fear - kept us in a continuous stampede of\npatriotic fervor - with the cry of grave national emergency. Always there has\nbeen some terrible evil at home or some monstrous foreign power that was going\nto gobble us up if we did not blindly rally behind it by furnishing the\nexorbitant funds demanded. Yet, in retrospect, these disasters seem never to\nhave happened, seem never to have been quite real.\"--General Douglas\nMacArthur, 1957<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"It is the\nfunction of the CIA to keep the world unstable, and to propagandize and teach\nthe American people to hate, so we will let the Establishment spend any amount\nof money on arms.\"-John Stockwell, CIA official in the 1960s and 1970s<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 1960's, the\nAmerican Joint Chiefs of Staff signed off on a plan [Operation Northwoods] to\nblow up American airplanes, and to commit terrorist acts on American soil, and\nthen to blame it on the Cubans in order to justify an invasion of Cuba.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real reason that\nthe drug problem is not eradicated is because it is being run by the highest\nfamilies in the entire world as part of a coordinated gigantic money-making\nmachine in cahoots with DEEP STATE rulers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The plutocracy controlling British banks held\nthe purse strings and then, as now, put up a most respectable facade to cover\ntheir true business. No one ever caught them with dirtied hands. They always\nhad front men, even as they do today, willing to take the blame if things went\nawry. Then as now the connections with the drug trade were tenuous at best. No\none was ever able to lay a finger on the respectable and \"noble\"\nbanking families ( Rotshchild and his agents ) of Britain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drug profits are secured\nthrough the ability of the drug cartels to launder and transfer billions of\ndollars through the US banking system. They even created KOSHER Ismaic banks to\npull the wool over the eyes of the denizens of this planet..The scale and scope\nof the US banking-drug cartel alliance surpasses any other economic activity of\nthe US private banking system<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Real power is\nunelected. Politicians change, but the power structure does not. The Network (a\nglobal Anglophile financial elite power structure) operates behind the scenes,\nfor its own benefit, without ever consulting those who are affected by its\ndecisions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The planet\u2019s richest\nman Rothschild\u2019s name does NOT exist in the Fortune 500 list.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/worth-more-than-sum-total-of-entire.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/worth-more-than-sum-total-of-entire.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Network is composed\nof individuals who prefer anonymity. They are \"satisfied to possess the\nreality rather than the appearance of power. This approach of secretly\nexercising power is common throughout history because it protects the\nconspirators from the consequences of their actions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A primary tactic for\ndirecting public opinion and \"government\" policy is to place willing\nservants in leadership positions of trusted institutions (media, universities,\ngovernment, foundations, etc.). If there is ever a major backlash against a\ngiven policy, the servant can be replaced. This leaves both the institution and\nthe individuals who actually direct its power unharmed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the center of\noligarchy is the idea that certain families are born to rule as an arbitrary\nelite, while the vast majority of any given population is condemned to\noppression, serfdom, or slavery. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of these\nELITE&nbsp; WHITE SKINNED BRAHMINS are\nex-opium drug running Freemason agents of Jew Rothschild..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oligarchs identify\nwealth purely in money terms, and practice usury, monetarism, and looting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The essence of\noligarchism is summed up in the idea of the empire, in which an elite\nidentifying itself as a master race rules over a degraded mass of slaves or\nother oppressed victims. If oligarchical methods are allowed to dominate human\naffairs, they always create a breakdown crisis of civilization, with economic\ndepression, war, famine, plague, and pestilence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pillar of the oligarchical\nsystem is the family fortune. The continuity of the family fortune which earns\nmoney through usury and looting is often more important than the biological\ncontinuity across generations of the family that owns the fortune.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\ntransnational ruling class, a \"Superclass\", that agrees on\nestablishing a world government.. The goal of the Superclass is not to lose their\nwealth and power to a transnational middle class, but rather to extinguish the\nnotion of a middle class, and transnationalize a lower, uneducated, labor\noriented class, through which they will secure ultimate wealth and power.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bill and Melinda\nGates Foundation created the GAVI alliance to push vaccinations on the poorest<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gavi, the Vaccine\nAlliance&nbsp; is a public\u2013private global\nhealth partnership committed to increasing access to immunisation in poor\ncountries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gavi brings together\ndeveloping country and donor governments, the World Health Organization,\nUNICEF, the World Bank, the vaccine industry in both industrialised and\ndeveloping countries, research and technical agencies, civil society, the Bill\n&amp; AND SHE ASKS US WHY LOVE SHOULD BE PUNISHED..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">PIG SORPOTEL HAS AFFECTED HER THINKING PROCESS SO MUCH THAT FAYE BABY DOES NOT KNOW THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN BASE ANIMAL LUST AND DIVINE LOVE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">We have arranged marriages in Hinduism because we know that people mistake LUST for LOVE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>LUST</b></span>&nbsp;is just temporary commitment that last only long enough to fulfill the base desire. After a gay pervert has ejaculated on the same gender boy in a crowded bus, the first thing he tries to do is to escape at the next bus stop. For lust is only interested is self pleasure as it is basically sexual greed -- far away from romantic love. Lust produces NO deep emotional bonding, what you feel when you love a person. Gay lust does NOT last and they look for multiple partners, often two timing and three timing them. Lust is like going to the loo. LUST is that quick satisfying feeling that quickly goes away after all is said and done. Something akin to\u2014you were feeling PEEYUSH , so you peed and now you are fine and out of the toilet. But mind you , he needs a new pee pot at regular intervals. Whereas if you are in lust the attitude of your heart will be one of selfishness, with yourself as the focus. Lust is a strong initial sexual attraction usually based on physical appearance. Once that physical desire ends, your interest in them usually ends. Lust is a physical emotion that we act upon in the \"heat of the moment.\" Lust is brought on by surges of sex hormones, such as testosterone and estrogen. These induce an indiscriminate scramble for base physical gratification.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>LOVE</b></span>&nbsp;is long haul. Love is an intense feeling of affection and care towards another person. Love involves personal sacrifice.. When you are in love with someone, you see a future with the other person and your partner is included in your life plans . Love and romance are connected to trust, loyalty and an deep and magic emotional attachment, where time stands still. If your partner is the first person that you think about when you want to share your innermost thoughts, then you are in love. There is a great willingness to make sacrifices for another and working at settling differences. There is this ability to compromise so that either both win or at least give the other person's opinion a chance. Love creates commitment to another and intentions are genuine intentions. You don\u2019t make an ass out of a person you love. Love fosters security, peace, inner happiness and a stable , solid partnership which can provide the ideal atmosphere to raise confident, content and secure children. Love is unconditional and the real deal. When you talk to a person you love , you get lost in your conversations, and the hours pass like minutes. You're more than willing to listen to her when she goes on and on about her day. All you want to do is to be with her, whether you're having sex or not. If at all you have sex with such a person you love, it is mind blowing literally an explosion of divine passion. Love sees a bright future together . There is this feeling that your life would be totally empty without her. You want to introduce her to your family You include her in all your plans . She makes you happy, and you'd do anything to make her happy. Real love brings out the best in people. Love accepts things as it is . The woman does NOT see the need to wear make up or put plastic in her tits or upper lip to hold on to her man. Love is when you want to do all you can for someone not expecting anything in return at all.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">99.5% HOMOSEXUALS ARE PEDOPHILES.. TO MACAU FOR HOLIDAYS ? ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY HAS JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED SEAMLESS BORDERS IN THE EU ?<br />\n<br />\nMacau Is a Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China, - part of what makes them special is that they are great places to launder cash.<br />\n<br />\nMacau is the casino capital of the world, With SEVEN TIMES more gaming revenue than Las Vegas and Hong Kong is home to plenty of compliant banks and other intermediaries , willing to transfer funds anywhere in the world without asking too many questions for a fee !.<br />\n<br />\nLet's say you live or work in China and want to hide a massive bribe.<br />\n<br />\nFirst, you must convert it from yuan into another currency without the government knowing.<br />\n<br />\nThe easiest way to do this is to contact a junket, an agent in mainland China who will give you casino chips for your cash, minus fees of up to 20%.<br />\n<br />\nTake the chips to a friendly, cooperative casino, where you can gamble with them, cash them in for Hong Kong or US dollars to then spend as you see fit, or deposit in a Hong Kong bank branch.<br />\n<br />\nOr, for extra safety, take them to a lawyer specializing in offshore laundering.<br />\n<br />\nMeanwhile, the casino will mix your chips with those from legitimate gamblers, and its accountants will book your $1 million as paid-out winnings.<br />\n<br />\nYour bank or lawyer must wire-transfer the funds in such a way that the money crosses multiple borders, to frustrate detection or confiscation.<br />\n<br />\nFor instance, the money might end up in a US trust managed by a shell company in Grand Cayman, owned by another trust in Guernsey with an account in Luxembourg managed by a Swiss or Singaporean or Caribbean banker who doesn't know who the owner is.<br />\n<br />\nThe smurf will then deposit small amounts of your cash into an account every day for weeks or months - or years , avoiding watchful eyes by keeping the numbers small.<br />\n<br />\nAlong the way, you can ask your smurf to withdraw some cash - which has since been rendered untraceable , for a shopping spree.<br />\n<br />\nThe rest have a bank wire-transfer the money to your offshore accomplices or your shell companies.<br />\n<br />\nThe REAL BIG FISH, don't bother with casinos, crooked bank managers, junkets, or smurfs.<br />\n<br />\nThey manage to transfer millions, or billions, without handling cash or involving banks at all, instead funneling their money through corporate deals , (bribes, kickbacks, and embezzlement schemes), which are exempt from currency controls.<br />\n<br />\nLet's say you're a government official or corporate executive, and you want to receive a $1 million bribe or kickback for giving a lucrative and excessively priced contract to a foreign or local business.<br />\n<br />\nYou approve the contract, and its payment, and pad the consideration by a few million, which includes $1 million for yourself.<br />\n<br />\nThe client puts your $1 million overpayment into a shell company in an offshore jurisdiction, where your ownership can remain anonymous.<br />\n<br />\nYou are then free to invest or spend the money.<br />\n<br />\nThe business writes it off as an expense, paid out to an offshore consultant.<br />\n<br />\nOr perhaps you'd prefer that your $1 million be used to buy an asset offshore for you, or that it be paid out gradually in salaries or fees to family members, either way, you're good to go.<br />\n<br />\nUnder invoicing is the same thing in reverse.<br />\n<br />\nSimply sell your goods or services to a business at a price that is less than the goods or services are worth.<br />\n<br />\nThen, out of the embezzled funds, you get $1 million directly from the company that got the bargain, these funds can be placed directly into anonymous offshore account or into an asset of your choice.<br />\n<br />\nSO SO SO<br />\n<br />\nA DIAMONDS IS A GIRLs BEST FRIEND ?<br />\n<br class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_115b+seedbn6D\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_113TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_113TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_113TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_115b+seedbn6D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_113B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7238453290548985463\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_113M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534003570669#c7238453290548985463\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 11, 2018 at 9:36 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_113MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nPerhaps the most surprising thing of all is that establishing a shell corporation \u2014 at least by itself \u2014 doesn't technically violate any law.<br />\n<br />\nThis MUST change.<br />\n<br />\nIn other words, it's not having a secret shell corporation that can get you in trouble. It's how you use it, rather how you leave your tracks behind.<br />\n<br />\nHundreds, perhaps thousands of firms, offer help setting up shell companies, often as part of a set of financial and legal services, and many are located in the United States.<br />\n<br />\nMost of these firms don't actually process the transaction themselves but farm it out to a much larger firm that specializes in them, such as Mossack Fonseca. The Panamanian law firm is considered one of the largest of such firms in the world.<br />\n<br />\nThe forms filled out when a company is created are often the only public proof of a phantom firm\u2019s existence, and they rarely ask for enough information to track down the individuals controlling it.<br />\n<br />\nEven where they do, this information can be misleading. The only way out is the COMPULSORY recording of AADHAR card details .!.<br />\n<br />\nCompanies can list \u201cnominee\u201d shareholders or board members with no visible relation to the actual owner, for instance, a lawyer or a distant relative, or people that can be hired specifically to allow their names to fill in the blanks on these forms.<br />\n<br />\nThey can also list other anonymous companies or trusts in order to make it more difficult to track down the actual owner. The true owners, or people in control of the company, are often known to no one in the outside world other than\u2014possibly\u2014a law firm or incorporation agent.<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN, DEMONETIZATION WITHOUT BANNING SHELL COMPANIES - IS A FUTILE &amp; EXCEPTIONALLY IGNORANT EXERCISE.<br />\n<br />\nNO PAIN NO GAIN<br />\n<br />\nHERE WE WENT THOUGH HAJAAR PAIN , WITHOUT ANY GAIN<br />\n<br />\nShell corporations are companies that serve no economic purpose and don\u2019t conduct any real business.<br />\n<br />\nAs such, why do we allow Shell companies ?<br />\n<br />\nWhere is the logic ?<br />\n<br />\nRather, they exist primarily to hold legal title to bank accounts, real estate, or other assets, often obscuring the true human owners.<br />\n<br />\nEvery year, over two million corporations, LLCs, and other business entities are formed in the United States.<br />\n<br />\nThanks to the Jewish controlled SHADOW GOVT which runs the USA, almost every state collects less information from the individuals forming these entities than from people applying for a driver\u2019s license or registering to vote.<br />\n<br />\nAnonymous shell companies can open a bank account or buy a yacht.<br />\n<br />\nThey can wire money and transact business like any other company, making them an attractive method for hiding, moving, and using money or other assets.<br />\n<br />\nAs a result, anonymous shell companies are often misused for illegal activities, including laundering money from the trafficking of drugs, weapons, or human beings, financing terrorist activities, skirting sanctions, hiding the proceeds of government corruption, and evading taxes.<br />\n<br />\nCriminals often create webs of nested anonymous corporations (with one owning another and so on), rendering it practically impossible for law enforcement officials to figure out who is directing the companies\u2019 activities, i.e., the identity of the real criminal.<br />\n<br />\nSuch companies are also used to SUBVERT civil and judicial processes, through making anonymous donations to election campaigns, defrauding immigration and customs authorities, hiding assets from courts, or fraudulently pursuing government contracts, grants, or Medicare reimbursements.<br />\n<br />\nThe Incorporation 'Transparency and Law Enforcement Assistance Act' , was created to fight the use of anonymous American shell companies by requiring states to collect information about the \u201cbeneficial owner(s)\u201d of a corporation or LLC.<br />\n<br />\nThe Incorporation Transparency and Law Enforcement Assistance Act would direct states to require applicants forming corporations and limited liability companies to include basic information about the actual human beings who own the companies.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_113MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_113BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_113B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_114B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1767572078978872935\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_114M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534003653419#c1767572078978872935\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 11, 2018 at 9:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_114MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nThis information will be readily available to law enforcement, allowing officials to track illicit funds and activities much more efficiently and effectively.<br />\n<br />\nThere\u2019s another reason the United States has become so popular for shell corporations.<br />\n<br />\nCurrently, none of the fifty states requires the disclosure of the \u201cbeneficial owners,\u201d the real human beings who own the companies.<br />\n<br />\nInstead, corporate records can identify the \u201cowner\u201d as another faceless corporation or a professional agent paid to sign the needed forms and never speak of them again. Behind this easy-to-establish veil of secrecy, criminals can\u2014and do\u2014use these corporations to open bank accounts, transfer funds, and even to hide the ownership of expensive assets.<br />\n<br />\nA Mexican drug cartel using an Oklahoma corporation to launder money through a horse farm; a crime syndicate setting up a web of corporations in eight states as part of a $100 million Medicare fraud scheme; and human traffickers based in Moldova hiding their crimes behind anonymous corporations in Kansas, Missouri, and Ohio.<br />\n<br />\nSHELL COMPANIES , HAVE BEEN RUINING THE INDIAN ECONOMY , SINCE INDEPENDENCE !!!.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GOVT ONLY WOKE UP TO THIS , IN 2017 !!!<br />\n<br />\nBRRRRRRRAAAAAYYYYYYYYYY !<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD , MANAGES THE SHELL COMPANIES OF THE QUEEN<br />\n<br />\nWHAT DOES A \"FINANCIAL ADVISER\" OR A \"FINANCIAL CONSULTANT\" OR AN \"ASSET MANAGER\" DO ? HE ARRANGES THE SHELL COMPANIES , AND THE MONEY ROUTING<br />\n<br />\nALMOST ALL TOP INDIAN BILLIONAIRES USE ROTHSCHILD AS A CONSULTANT, I HAVE THEIR PHOTOS TOGETHER<br />\n<br />\nMacau and Hong Kong are considered Special Administrative Regions of the People's Republic of China, and part of what makes them special is that they are great places to launder cash.<br />\n<br />\nMacau is the casino capital of the world, with seven times more gaming revenue than Las Vegas, and Hong Kong is home to plenty of compliant ROTHSCHILDs banks and other intermediaries willing to transfer funds anywhere in the world without asking too many questions, for a fee.<br />\n<br />\nGambling tourism is Macau's biggest source of revenue, making up about 52% of the economy. Macau, a special administrative region like Hong Kong, is the only place in China where casinos are legal.<br />\n<br />\nJEW Stanley Ho , the richest man of Macau has been nicknamed \"The King of Gambling\", reflecting the government-granted monopoly he held on the Macau gambling industry for 40 years.<br />\n<br />\nCasinos are money laundering machines..<br />\n<br />\nMore than 300 billion USD in \"ill-gotten funds are channeled through Macau each year. Money which is funneled into Macau casinos are mostly bribes , embezzelments and kickbacks ..<br />\n<br />\nWinnings in gambling are taken in USD to invest it in property or offshore tax havens. SHELL company agents of the Chinese mafia TRIAD do everything \u2013all logistics .. They help arrange for visas and accommodations, including VIP rooms.<br />\n<br />\nThey also collect gambling debts and make sure police and judiciary don\u2019t bother you.. Triads arrange for drugs and underage girls too.<br />\n<br />\nIllicit money finds its way to Macau's casinos is through pawn shops. Visitors buy goods from a pawn shops with a debit card and then sell it back for cash.<br />\n<br />\nSenator John McCain raised concerns about illicit money from Macau making its way into the American political sphere by pointing out that CEO of Las Vegas Sands Corporation, Sheldon Adelson, got his profits from Macau.<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK SUSHMA SWARAJ\u2014 IF YOU ARE DONE WITH SAVING PAKISTANI MUSLIM, DO YOUR JOB !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_115b+seedbn6D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_115b+seedbn6D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2074313660278833893\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_124M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">July 24, 2018 at 6:39 PM</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WE ASK NORTH KOREA NOT TO DISMANTLE NUKES TILL THERE IS A PROPER TREATY SIGNED TO OFFICIALLY END THE KOREAN WAR..</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PUT A FINAL END TO THE ARMISTRICE AGREEMENT.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\n</span></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">The current armistice is however only a cease-fire between military forces, rather than an agreement between governments. No peace treaty was signed which means that the Korean War has not officially ended. The US secretary of state, John Foster Dulles, did NOT allow a proper peace treaty should be implemented on the Korean peninsula.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Korean Armistice Agreement brought about a complete cessation of hostilities of the Korean War. It was signed by U.S. Army Lieutenant General William Harrison, Jr. representing the United Nations Command (UNC), North Korean General Nam Il representing the Korean People's Army (KPA), and the Chinese People's Volunteer Army (PVA).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Armistice was signed on July 27, 1953, and was designed to \"ensure a complete cessation of hostilities and of all acts of armed force in Korea until a final peaceful settlement is achieved.\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Even in 2018, 65 years after the signing of the Armistice Agreement, and despite a meeting of North Korean ruler Kim with US President Trump, these issues have not been settled; there is no peace agreement; and American troops are still based in South Korea.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In 2016, when North Korea proposed formal peace talks, the U.S. adjusted its position from a pre-condition that North Korea should have already taken \"irreversible steps toward denuclearization\", to the negotiations including curbing the nuclear program. The discussions did not take place.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NORTH KOREA MUST NOT DE-NUCLEARISE TILL 100% US SANCTIONS HAVE BEEN WITHDRAWN AND PEOPLE OF NORTH KOREA FEEL THE BENEFITS FOR A FULL YEAR..</span></b></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THERE IS NO IMMINENT NEED AS NORTH KOREA HAS THE SUPPORT OF RUSSIA ( MILITARY MIGHT) , CHINA ( ECONOMIC MIGHT ) AND INDIA ( MORAL MIGHT </b></span>) .</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_10.html?showComment=1534063449317#c6342733295400532677\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 12, 2018 at 2:14 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_171MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>RUSH RUSH RUSH..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WARNING--.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS A SCARE IN KERALA THAT THERE ARE EARTH QUAKE TREMORS , CAUSING CRACKS ON HOME WALLS AND COMPOUND WALLS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE CRACKS ( WHEN FAR AWAY FROM A DAM ) HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH EARTH QUAKES ..IT HAS TO DO WITH INSUFFICIENT FOUNDATION OF THE STRUCTURE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">I WARN THE KERALA CM -- DO NOT ALLOW IDUKKI DAM RESERVOIR TO GO BEYOND 2402 FEET HEIGHT\u2026 TAKE THIS FROM A MAN WHO IS AN EXPERT ON WATER..</span><br />\n<br />\nNOT A SINGLE DAM IN INDIA HAS BEEN BUILT WITH INBUILT DE-SILTING FACILITIES..<br />\n<br />\nAS A RESULT WHEN DAM RESERVOIRS GET SILTED, THE STUPID COLLEGIUM JUDGES INCREASE THE WATER LEVEL ARBITRARILY, LIKE WHAT HAPPENED AT MULLAPERIAR.. ALL THEY DELIBERATE ON IS IF THE DAM WALL S STRONG ENOUGH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES WHO TAKE TECHNICAL DECISIONS ( PIL BASED ) ARE THE BOTTOM DREGS OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN WATER LEVEL IS RAISED , IMMEDIATELY WATER SURFACE AREA IN THE SILTED RESERVOIR INCREASES --INUNDATING MORE LAND AROUND.. MORE SURFACE AREA MEANS MORE EVAPORATION OF WATER HELD BY THE DAM .<br />\n<br />\nTHE MORE DANGEROUS THING IS THIS CAN CAUSE LANDSLIDES AND SOLITION WAVE ( TSUNAMI ) WHICH CAN CRASH INTO THE DAM WALL BREACHING IT..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">CRITICAL MESSAGE --- NOW ABOUT TREMORS NEAR DAMS ..</span><br />\n<br />\nGOD NEVER INTENDED MAN TO BUILD DAMS..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">WHEN HUGE DAMS ARE BUILT WITH HIGH WATER LEVELS IN THE RESERVOIR IT CAUSE GEOPATHIC STRESS WHICH MAKES THE AREA TREMOR PRONE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">RESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED RIS ( RESERVOIR INDUCED SEISMICITY)...THIS SUBJECTS HAS BEEN STUDIES AS POST DISASTER REACTIONS \u2013 AND NEVER PROACTIVELY BEFORE BUILDING A DAM..<br /><br />80% OF INDIAs LARGE DAMS ARE PRONE TO RIS \u2013 AS THEY HAVE BEEN BUILT WITHOUT PROPER GEOLOGICAL STUDIES ON UNSUITABLE AREAS \u2026</span></b><br />\n<br />\nReservoirs can both increase the frequency of earthquakes in areas of already high seismic activity and cause earthquakes to happen in areas previously thought to be seismically inactive.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA---<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nThe 1979 MORVI DAM BURST ( rajkot , gujarat ) is in the Guinness book of world records.<br />\n<br />\nHas India ever investigated the reason for 26,000 deaths at Morvi due to induced seismicity ?<br />\n<br />\nHas India investigates the 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir.<br />\n<br />\nIn dam water reservoirs, the crushing weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">God has made huge NATURAL lakes in safe areas --unlike man's ARTIFICIAL DAM RESERVOIRS.</span><br />\nSignificant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake. When dam reservoirs are filled or drained, induced seismicity can occur immediately or with a small time lag.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_171BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY IS PORTUGAL A BEGGAR NATION?..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><b>EU FOOLED THEM INTO CULTIVATING JATROPA WHICH IS A MAGNET FOR ANTS, PESTS AND RODENTS ..</b></span><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS RAPED THEIR TOP SOIL, RENDERING IT TOXIC AND DEPLETED OF NUTRIENTS..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODI HAS BEEN FOOLED BY WHITE JEWS TO SAVE THE PLANET BY REDUCING GREENHOUSE EMISSIONS BY CUTTING DOWN FOSSIL FUELS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT MODI DOES NOT KNOW IS THAT FERTILISERS USED FOR JATHROPA CAUSES MORE EMISSION OF GREENHOUSE GASES LIKE NITROUS OXIDE. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">BIODIESEL POWERED ENGINE EMISSIONS ARE HIGH IN NITROUS OXIDE AND NOx, UNLIKE ETHANOL .. READ THIS PARA A TRILLION TIMES..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MODI HAS KILLED ALL WATER BODIES WHEREVER JATROPHA HAS BEEN CULTIVATED IN INDIA\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CARBON DI OXIDE EMITTED BY BURNING COAL IS A GOOD GAS..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">If the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">FOSSIL FUELS BURN CLEAN INSIDE ENGINES. . BIODIESELS SCREW UP THE ENGINES AND ITS LIFE. BIOFUELS CLOG THE ENGINE FILTERS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIA HAS THE HIGHEST POPULATION ON THE PALENT AT 1350 MILLION.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the past two\ncenturies when the peoples of the world were gradually winning their political\nfreedom from the dynastic monarchies, the major banking families of Europe and\nAmerica were actually reversing the trend by setting up new dynasties of\npolitical control through the formation of international financial combines. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These kosher banking\ndynasties had learned that all governments must have sources of revenue from\nwhich to borrow in times of emergency. They had also learned that by providing\nsuch funds from their own private resources, they could make both kings and\ndemocratic leaders tremendously subservient to their will.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild-controlled\nbanks bankrolled the Chinese opium and African slave trades. It financed the\nLouisiana Purchase. The House of Rothschild financed the Prussian War, the\nCrimean War and the British attempt to seize the Suez Canal from the French. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nathan Rothschild made\na huge financial bet on Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo, while also funding\nthe Duke of Wellington's peninsular campaign against Napoleon. Both the Mexican\nWar and the Civil War were gold mines for the family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The Pope is more worried about the reputation of the church..<br />\n<br />\nONCE AS A YOUNG MAN 38 YEARS AGO, I STAYED IN VATICAN FOR 3 DAYS IN A SEMINARY - CASA PAOLTTI BY THE BANKS OF THE RIVER TIBER . MY GOAN PURSER WHOSE BROTHER WAS A PRIEST IN VATICAN, HE WAS WITH ME.. SO I DONT HAVE A GUILTY CONSCIENCE ABOUT THIS.. MY DECISION TO START BLOGGING TO EXHUME BURIED TRUTHS HAS A ROOT IN THIS UNFORTUNATE NUN..<br />\n<br />\nSHE TOLD ME THAT BISHOPS ARE CHOSEN BY POPE IN KERALA TO SNUFF OUT ANY WHISTLE BLOWERS BY CASH/ LAND OR FEAR .. IT WAS A WATER TIGHT SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\nThe Vatican instructed Catholic bishops around the world to cover up cases of sexual abuse or risk being thrown out of the Church.<br />\n<br />\nIt focuses on sexual abuse initiated as part of the confessional relationship between a priest and a member of his congregation. But the instructions also cover what it calls the 'worst crime', described as an obscene act perpetrated by a cleric with 'youths of either sex<br />\n<br />\nThe 69-page Latin document bearing the seal of Pope John XXIII was sent to every bishop in the world. The instructions outline a policy of 'strictest' secrecy in dealing with allegations of sexual abuse and threatens those who speak out with excommunication.<br />\n<br />\nThey also call for the victim to take an oath of secrecy at the time of making a complaint to Church officials. It states that the instructions are to 'be diligently stored in the secret archives of the Curia [Vatican] as strictly confidential. Nor is it to be published nor added to with any commentaries.'<br />\n<br />\nI DONT NEED TO PROVE ANYTHING --BUT MY PHOTO INSIDE THE COLOSSEUM ( WEARING WRANGLER JACKET , LEVI JEANS AND YASHICA CAMERA ) WAS TAKEN THE SAME DAY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW, YOU CAN SEE MY PHOTO ON THE STEPS OF ST PETERs CATHEDRAL VATICAN ON THE SAME DAY. THE TALL MAN WITH ME IS SECOND ENGINEER, A HINDU MALAYALI FROM CALICUT.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe pope has set guidelines for removing bishops who have been \u201cnegligent\u201d in addressing cases of abuse. This is all charade..<br />\n<br />\nThere has been a long history of protecting highly placed Catholic leaders from charges of sexual abuse.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html?showComment=1533686521119#c5270560851422573945\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2018 at 5:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nWhen reports surfaced in 1995 that Austrian Cardinal Hans Hermann Groer had molested monks and schoolboys, the sexual abuse was dismissed by Bishop Kurt Krenn as \u201cboyish pranks.\u201d It was proved that parents of child victims were paid \u201chush money\u201d to buy their silence. The allegations of sexual abuse against Cardinal Groer proved to be true.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN , ABOVE IS JUST ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF CASES..<br />\n<br />\nIn another case from the late 1940s, Marcial Maciel, the Mexican founder of a religious order, The Legionaries of Christ, was a sexual abuser multiple times over. When allegations against Maciel were initially raised, John Paul II ignored them.<br />\n<br />\nJoseph Ratzinger, John Paul II\u2019s confident and later successor, remarked: \u201cOne can\u2019t put on trial such a close friend of the pope.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nMaciel avoided prosecution until his death in 2008.<br />\n<br />\nThe hierarchical structure of the church made it difficult to bring high-ranking figures to justice.<br />\n<br />\nSuperiors are given nearly absolute obedience, which makes the threshold for acting against them high. By the same token, superiors can often protect offending priests.<br />\n<br />\nIt is a terrible sin for a bishop to commit or cover up a terrible crime such as rape or sexual abuse. You see, the Catholic Church is a divine institution necessary for salvation, then there are those who will protect its reputation at all costs.<br />\n<br />\nASRAMA BAPU HAS BEEN FRAMED TO PROVE THAT SUCH THINGS HAPPEN IN HINDUISM TOO. ALMOST ALL HIS ROOTLESS VULNERABLE FOLLOWERS ARE NOW CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThere is a tipping point, however. The key moment leading to the resignation of Cardinal Law was a letter, signed by 58 priests, asking him to resign.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the priest that Cardinal Law protected, John Geoghan, was convicted of his crimes \u2013 and later killed in prison \u2013 Bernard Law himself never faced a court of justice.<br />\n<br />\nIn fact, he was effectively promoted to a venerable position as head of one of Catholicism\u2019s most famous churches, Santa Maria Maggiore in Rome.<br />\n<br />\nFor victims of sexual abuse that occurred under his tenure, Cardinal Law only offered only a general apology and a vague reference to his own \u201cshortcomings.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE KERALA BISHOP MADE LOT OF HOOO HAAA ABOUT NCW WANTING TO STOP CONFESSIONS IN CHURCH..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/kerala-nun-rape-audio-clip-of-priest-trying-to-bribe-nun-surfaces-case-registered/story-46dy2OsB6YSIYJoyuuur0L.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThere is an international conspiracy by the Church to hush up sexual abuse issues. It is a devious attempt to conceal criminal conduct and is a blueprint for deception and concealment.<br />\n<br />\nThreatening excommunication to anybody who speaks out shows the lengths the most senior figures in the Vatican were prepared to go to prevent the information getting out to the public domain<br />\n<br />\nTHREE BILLION USD PAY OUT IN THE POST BELOW IS GROSS UNDER ESTIMATION.. AND HENCE REQUIRES A MIDDLEMAN BETWEEN THE DEVOTEE AND HIS GOD..<br />\n<br />\nPROTESTANT BELIEVE THAT ONLY GOD CAN FORGIVE--NOT A BROKER POPE OF PADRE..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</span><br />\nTHERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO REFERENCE IN THE BIBLE OLD OR NEW ABOUT CONFESSING TO A MIDDLEMAN PRIEST WITHIN THE CONFINED OF A CONFESSION BOX INSIDE THE CHURCH..<br />\n<br />\nBIBLE WANTS SINNERS TO CONFESS TO GOD DIRECT IN REPENTANCE..<br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness. 1 john 1.9\u2014UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_28MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_28B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_29B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6260624235427538576\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_29M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. This was more of a political ploy..<br />\n<br />\nUTRIUSQUE SEXUS MEANS HERMAPHRODITE.. A PERSON WITH PENIS ( WITHOUT BALLS ) AND VAGINA ..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE UNFORTUNATE PEOPLE WERE THEN BLACKMAILED FOR SEX BY CATHOLIC ELITES WHO ENGAGED IN SUCH DEVIANT PLEASURES ..<br />\n<br />\nCONFESSIONS WERE 100% SEXUAL IN NATURE AND WEALTHY GAY CLIENTSS USED TO WAIT OUTSIDE THE CHURCH..<br />\n<br />\nTHE SEXUAL ORIENTATION OF THIS HERMAPHRODITE WAS WHAT WAS CONFESSED AS SOMETIME IT COULD SATISFY AN ANAL SEX HUMPING GAY-- OR EVEN A PERVERTED STRAIGHT AS IT HAD A VAGINA.. .<br />\n<br />\nLATER THIS CONFESSION WAS EXTENDED TO BOTH MALE AND FEMALE GENDERS.. WHY SHOULD A WOMAN CONFESS TO A STRANGER MALE PRIEST ?<br />\n<br />\nJESUS WAS FIRST DEPICTED ON A CROSS ONLY 1148 YEARS AGO.. margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"328\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-EcCGlNq6mQk/W2qzI2PjnHI/AAAAAAABdVg/nHuZ5dB8aN4au6q44SFtfpMMTJbKmSK2ACLcBGAs/s640/imRages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zJq-wI54Its/W2q1L2u0HXI/AAAAAAABdV8/kWUN__-KRpst6fTLF4XpTWA-zSfACHCRACLcBGAs/s1600/4C3414-pmiueejfwi-1476367546.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"538\" data-original-width=\"1200\" height=\"286\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zJq-wI54Its/W2q1L2u0HXI/AAAAAAABdV8/kWUN__-KRpst6fTLF4XpTWA-zSfACHCRACLcBGAs/s640/4C3414-pmiueejfwi-1476367546.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">BELOW: COMMIE DEEP STATE HISTORIAN RAMCHANDRA GUHA..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">EVR PERIYAR DECLARED 15TH AUG 1947 AS A DAY OF MOURNUNG..&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;CN ANNADURAI SPLIT FROM EVR PERIYAR AT THAT VERY MINUTE</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Jh_C1ohJzv0/W2q9BgYWqsI/AAAAAAABdWI/U8S-UlgG2qQ25jkNb9Gijv8tyyQq_fr8QCLcBGAs/s1600/main-qimg-795f4b478a33444c340cb8ade720004b1545-c.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"169\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Jh_C1ohJzv0/W2q9BgYWqsI/AAAAAAABdWI/U8S-UlgG2qQ25jkNb9Gijv8tyyQq_fr8QCLcBGAs/s640/main-qimg-795f4b478a33444c340cb8ade720004b1545-c.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The member of Dravida\nKazhagam requested C.N. Annadurai to abandon his aloofness and take a decision\non the future of the Dravida Kazhagam,&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">According to their wishes and his capacity\nas the general secretary, he convened the working committee on 17 September\n1949 C.N.Annadurai and his supporters met in Madras and passed a no confidence\nmotion on EVR Periyar's leadership.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The next day, under Annadurai's leadership,\na new political party, Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam ( </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">DMK</span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\"> ) was formed .<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BELOW: KARUNANIDHI IS 10TH STANDARD FAIL .. HIS STUDENTS UNION \"TAMIL MANAVAR MANDRAM WAS CREATED BY EVR PERIYAR..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">EVR Periyar appointed young\nKarunanidhi as the editor of their Dravidar Kazhagam party magazine,\nKudiyarasu, while allowing him to continue working part-time in theatre\ndialogue writing. Karunanidhi helped Annadurai form DMK in 1949. He also served\nas its first treasurer. By early 1950s, he graduated from theater to cinemas\nand his scripts produced a few blockbusters, most famous of all is 'Prasakthi.'\nM. Karunanidhi was known as 'Kalaignar'(artist).</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karunanidhi admitted in\nthe state assembley that Rajathahi Ammal is the mother of his daughter Kanimozhi,\nwhen his second wife is still married to him and alive.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Karunanidhi referred to\nDayalu ammal as manaivi (wife) and Rajathi ammal as thunaivi (companion).</span></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-50ZRyTxO0YU/W2rAk1tMaxI/AAAAAAABdWU/g_hHk8bWmMkcwQaBzkB2hER-exywgugowCLcBGAs/s1600/33Ec09b5a9f3aadea66dfd69f457dd8af.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"450\" height=\"568\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-50ZRyTxO0YU/W2rAk1tMaxI/AAAAAAABdWU/g_hHk8bWmMkcwQaBzkB2hER-exywgugowCLcBGAs/s640/33Ec09b5a9f3aadea66dfd69f457dd8af.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2K6zJIk5XsM/W2rvlyZH2xI/AAAAAAABdWw/TEDaBduQHHoDdGdvrFPZQRI1NqwvyOCKQCLcBGAs/s1600/Karssunanithi_family.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"479\" data-original-width=\"783\" height=\"390\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2K6zJIk5XsM/W2rvlyZH2xI/AAAAAAABdWw/TEDaBduQHHoDdGdvrFPZQRI1NqwvyOCKQCLcBGAs/s640/Karssunanithi_family.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">In 1972, three years\nafter Annadurai's death, MGR ( a honest man ) accused Karunanidhi of corruption\nand left the DMK, then led by Karunanidhi . MGR formed his own party\u2014the All\nIndia Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK). &nbsp;&nbsp;He routed &nbsp;DMK in the next elections... &nbsp;As long as MGR was alive Karunanidhi would\nnever be a darling of the Tamils\u2014he was ousted from power.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW ROTHSCHILD\nCONTROLLED THE PRO-HINDI AND ANTI-HINDI AGITATIONS LED BY C RAJAGOPALACHARI AND\nEVR PERIYAR IN 1937\u2014IT WAS A PLOY TO DIVIDE AND RULE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild created\nthe Justice Party, ( South Indian Liberal Federation ) in &nbsp;November 20, 1916 in Victoria Memorial Hall in\nMadras to flare up communal tensions between Brahmins ( Kanchi mutt ) and\nnon-Brahmins <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1944, Rothschilds\nagent EVR Periyar transformed the Justice Party into the social organisation\nDravidar Kazhagam.. Its mistrust of the Brahmin\u2013dominated Congress ( all agents\nof Rothschild ) led it to adopt a hostile stance toward the Indian independence\nmovement.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Justice Party and\nthe Dravidar Kazhagam are the ideological predecessors of present-day Dravidian\nparties like the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam and the All-India Anna Dravida\nMunnetra Kazhagam, which have ruled Tamil Nadu (one of the successor states to\nMadras Presidency) continuously since 1967.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 1963, DMK\ndropped its secessionist demand in the wake of the Sino-Indian War and the passage\nof the anti-secessionist 16th Amendment to the Indian Constitution.. The Bill\nwas introduced in Parliament on 21 January 1963. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN BETWEEN CHRISTIAN\nEVANGELISTS CONVINCES TAMIL PRIDE THAT TAMIL IS OLDER THAN SANSKRIT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Opposition to the Bill\ncame from DMK members who objected to the usage of the word \"may\"\ninstead of \"shall\" in section 3 of the Bill. That section read:\n\"the English language may...continue to be used in addition to\nHindi\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DMK argued was that\nthe term \"may\" could be interpreted as \"may not\" by future\nadministrations. On 22 April, Nehru assured the parliamentarians that, for that\nparticular case \"may\" had the same meaning as \"shall\". The\nDMK then demanded, if that was the case why \"shall\" was not used\ninstead of \"may\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Leading the opposition to the Bill was\nAnnadurai (then a Member of the Rajya Sabha). He pleaded for an indefinite\ncontinuation of the status quo and argued that continued use of English as\nofficial language would \"distribute advantages or disadvantages\nevenly\" among Hindi and non-Hindi speakers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bill was passed on\n27 April without any change in the wording. As he had warned earlier, Annadurai\nlaunched statewide protests against Hindi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In November 1963, Annadurai was arrested along\nwith 500 DMK members for burning part XVII of the Constitution at an anti-Hindi\nConference. He was sentenced to six months in prison. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The anti-Hindi\nimposition agitations ensured the passage of the Official Languages Act of 1963\nand its amendment in 1967, thus ensuring the continued use of English as an\nofficial language of India.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"content clearfix\" style=\"color: #14171a; font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin-left: 58px;\">\n<div class=\"permalink-header\" style=\"align-items: center; display: flex; height: 48px;\">\n<a class=\"account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav\" data-user-id=\"2574072036\" href=\"https://twitter.com/ShekharGupta\" style=\"background-attachment: initial; letter-spacing: 0.01em; line-height: 32px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word;\">\nDenying Karunanidhi the resting place of his choice isn\u2019t just stupid &amp; cussed in the extreme, it\u2019s politically suicidal. BJP should make TN govt fall in line, or Kalaignar\u2019s ghost will haunt it and its puppet ADMK</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"js-tweet-details-fixer tweet-details-fixer\" style=\"color: #14171a; font-family: &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dear Captain<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
