Patterson said the\ngovernor 'had very little comment to make; he was just listening to what was\nbeing said.'\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1982 A DEA report\nuncovered by Ambrose Evans-Pritchard would cite an informant claiming that a\nkey Arkansas figure and backer of Clinton \"smuggles cocaine from Colombia,\nSouth America, inside race horses to Hot Springs.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1984 Clinton backer\nMochtar Riady bought a banking firm and change its name to Worthern Bank with\nRiady's 28-year-old son James as president. Other Worthen co-owners would\neventually include <span style=\"background-color: white;\">BCCI</span> investor Abdullah Taha Bakhish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1986, Journalist\nEvans-Pritchard will describe the Arkansas of this period as a \"major\npoint for the transshipment of drugs\" and \"perilously close to\nbecoming a 'narco-republic' -- a sort of mini-Columbia within the borders of\nthe United States.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Whitewater scandal\n(also known as the Whitewater controversy, or simply Whitewater) began with an investigation\ninto the real estate investments of Bill and Hillary Clinton in the Whitewater\nDevelopment Corporation, a failed business venture in the 1970s and 1980s.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A March 1992, New York\nTimes article published during the U.S. presidential campaign reported that the\nClintons, then governor and first lady of Arkansas, had invested and lost money\nin the Whitewater Development Corporation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1987, the Whitewater\nfiles are transferred to the Clintons. In the 1992 campaign, the Clintons would\nLIE say they can not find the records.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On January 26, 1996,\nHillary Clinton testified before a grand jury concerning her investments in\nWhitewater. This was the first time in American history that a first lady had\nbeen subpoenaed to testify before a grand jury.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to journalist\nPhilip Weiss, \"In 1988, SCREW MASTER Bill Clinton chose not to run for the\npresidency, in part out of fear of personal disclosure about his sex life. The\nstory goes--and now we are into rumor/recollection, but it's persuasive--that\nHillary Clinton was angry that he had bowed out and wanted a divorce. She\ncompiled a divorce file with her friend, lawyer Vince Foster, involving a\nnumber of women in Arkansas. Ultimately she dropped the plan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A story, in the Globe,\ncharges that Bill Clinton had a relationship with a woman who claimed that\nClinton was the father of her child. The woman also claims she attended group\nsex sessions with Clinton.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former Miss Arkansas\nSally Perdue goes on the Sally Jesse Raphael Show and says she had an affair with\nBill Clinton. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She will later tell the\nLondon Sunday Telegraph that state troopers often dropped Clinton off at her\nplace in his jogging gear: \"He saw my Steinway grand piano and went\nstraight over to it and asked me to play. . . When I see him now, president of\nthe United States, meeting world leaders, I can't believe it. . . I still have\nthis picture of him wearing my black nightgown, playing the sax badly. . . this\nguy tiptoeing across the park and getting caught on the fence. How do you\nexpect me to take him seriously?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary Clinton\nattempts to conceal the fact that she had $120,000 of editorial help in\npreparing her book-like substance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hillary Clinton\nBULLSHITS to a&nbsp; New Zealand television\nthat she was named after Sir Edmund Hillary. Methven whose official cover was\nembassy political officer. Methven became the CIA station chief in Kinshasa,\nZaire in 1974 from where he launched the CIA\u2019s covert war against the\ngovernment of Angola.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From January 1970 to\nAugust 1972, Dunham Soetoro was an executive at the Institute of Management\nEducation and Development (IMED) in Jakarta, a continuation of her CIA flexible\ncover employment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1972 to 1975, Dunham\nSoetoro double-dipped, returning to the University of Hawaii to obtain her\nMasters of Arts in anthropology from the University of Hawaii, under a grant\nfrom the CIA-funded Asia Foundation, while continuing to serve under contract\nIMED in Jakarta. The CIA\u2019s liaison for various USAID programs in Jakarta was\nVicent Michael Shields who operated under official cover as the embassy\u2019s\neconomic and commercial attache.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1975, the year\nIndonesia invaded East Timor with the support of the CIA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In May 1978, Dunham\nSoetoro returned to Jakarta and consulted with Rothschild controlled\nInternational Labor Organization to develop recommendations on village\nindustries for the Suharto regime\u2019s third five-year plan, REPELITA III. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On November 24, 1980,\nDunham divorced Lolo Soetoro. From 1977 to 1980, the CIA station chief in\nJakarta was Carl Edward Gebhardt. Case officers at the CIA station during this\ntime frame were economics section officer James D. Anders, Jr.; Ronald M. Cinal,\nwhose previous posting was Nairobi, Kenya; and William H. Wright, who worked in\n1977 at the consulate in Surabaya \u2014 while Dunham Soetoro was working in the\nSurabaya CIA station city of responsibility Yogyakarta \u2014 and who was\ntransferred in 1979 to Jakarta.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The time period that\nPresident Obama\u2019s mother, Stanley Ann Dunham Soetoro/Sutoro, worked for various\nIndonesian and Pakistani operations associated with the US Agency for\nInternational Development (USAID) was during a time frame when USAID was composed\nalmost entirely of CIA official and non-official cover agents who worked\nthroughout Indonesia and Southeast and South Asia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before he was sacked as\nCIA director in 1976 and replaced by George H. W. Bush, William E. Colby\ncommissioned a study of the agency\u2019s priorities in a five-year plan. The Secret\nNOFORN plan, titled \u201cDirector of Central Intelligence: Perspectives for\nIntelligence 1976-1981,\u201d described the importance of agencies like USAID in the\nCIA\u2019s operations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The report states:\n\u201cContributions of such agencies as State, Defense, Treasury, USAID, USIA,\nAgriculture, and Commerce can be enhanced substantially by more effective\napproaches to information gathering and in the reporting aspects of their\nactivities. We need particularly, gains in the interrelationships between overt\nand clandestine and technical and human sources. We must establish more direct\nlines between our human collectors and our technical collectors.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Classified CIA\ndocuments from the late 1970s, while Dunham Soetoro was working for USAID, the\nCIA-linked Development Alternatives, Inc. and East-West Center of the\nUniversity of Hawaii, describe in great detail the type of deep agent \u201cflexible\ncover\u201d under which she worked for the CIA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Secret paper written\nby C.D. Edbrook as a basic text for CIA agent training and titled \u201cPrinciples\nof Deep Cover,\u201d describes the environment in which Obama\u2019s mother worked in\nboth Indonesia and later, Pakistan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Edbrook defines\n\u201cflexible cover\u201d as \u201ca logical reason for interest in diversified local groups\u201d\nand \u201cmobility.\u201d Dunham Soetoro\u2019s varied employers in Indonesia suggest that her\ncareer met the definition of a \u201cflexible agent,\u201d either a non-official cover\n(NOC) employee of the CIA or a career contract agent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The latter became\nhighly favored in the late 1970s after CIA director Stansfield Turner sacked a\nnumber of career clandestine services officers. On career contract agents,\nEdbrook clearly favored their use in stating: \u201cmany of the problems of deep\ncover are avoided when a service can recruit suitable agents already embarked\non legitimate careers.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From January 1968 to\nDecember 1969, Dunham Soetoro worked for the Indonesia-America Friendship\nInstitute in Jakarta, a suspected CIA front. Dunham was also co-founder of the\nIndonesian Heritage Society at the National Museum in Jakarta. She worked at\nthe Society as a volunteer from 1968 to 1972.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1969, the CIA\nJakarta CIA station chief was Stuart E. Methven whose official cover was\nembassy political officer. Methven became the CIA station chief in Kinshasa,\nZaire in 1974 from where he launched the CIA\u2019s covert war against the\ngovernment of Angola.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From January 1970 to\nAugust 1972, Dunham Soetoro was an executive at the Institute ofManagement\nEducation and Development (IMED) in Jakarta, likely a continuation of her CIA\nflexible cover employment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1972 to 1975,\nDunham Soetoro double-dipped, returning to the University of Hawaii to obtain\nher Masters of Arts in anthropology from the University of Hawaii, under a\ngrant from the CIA-funded Asia Foundation, while continuing to serve under\ncontract IMED in Jakarta. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CIA\u2019s liaison for\nvarious USAID programs in Jakarta was Vicent Michael Shields who operated under\nofficial cover as the embassy\u2019s economic and commercial attache.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1972 to 1975,\nDunham Soetoro taught Indonesian crafts at the Bishop Museum in Honolulu,\nfurther developing her \u201cflexible cover\u201d credentials. In 1975, the year\nIndonesia invaded East Timor with the support of the CIA, Dunham Soetoro\nreturned to conduct \u201canthropological field work\u201d on Java. Dunham Soetoro worked\nin Jakarta in 1975 and moved to work in Yogyakarta in 1976.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 1977, Dunham\nSoetoro taught a course under Professor Leon Mears at the Faculty of Economics\nof the University of Indonesia in Jakarta. The course was designed for the\nstaff of the Indonesian National Development Planning Agency (BAPPENAS). From June\n1977 to September 1978, Dunham Soetoro returned to Yogyakarta and researched\nsmall village industries under a grant from the CIA-linked East-West Center.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In May 1978, Dunham\nSoetoro returned to Jakarta and consulted with the International Labor Organization\nto develop recommendations on village industries for the Suharto regime\u2019s third\nfive-year plan, REPELITA III. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On November 24, 1980, DEEP\nSTATE operative Barack Obama\u2019s mother JEWESS Ann Dunham divorced Lolo Soetoro.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); AND SHE ASKS US WHY LOVE SHOULD BE PUNISHED..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">PIG SORPOTEL HAS AFFECTED HER THINKING PROCESS SO MUCH THAT FAYE BABY DOES NOT KNOW THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN BASE ANIMAL LUST AND DIVINE LOVE..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">We have arranged marriages in Hinduism because we know that people mistake LUST for LOVE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>LUST</b></span> is just temporary commitment that last only long enough to fulfill the base desire. After a gay pervert has ejaculated on the same gender boy in a crowded bus, the first thing he tries to do is to escape at the next bus stop. For lust is only interested is self pleasure as it is basically sexual greed -- far away from romantic love. Lust produces NO deep emotional bonding, what you feel when you love a person. Gay lust does NOT last and they look for multiple partners, often two timing and three timing them. Lust is like going to the loo. LUST is that quick satisfying feeling that quickly goes away after all is said and done. Something akin to\u2014you were feeling PEEYUSH , so you peed and now you are fine and out of the toilet. But mind you , he needs a new pee pot at regular intervals. Whereas if you are in lust the attitude of your heart will be one of selfishness, with yourself as the focus. Lust is a strong initial sexual attraction usually based on physical appearance. Once that physical desire ends, your interest in them usually ends. Lust is a physical emotion that we act upon in the \"heat of the moment.\" Lust is brought on by surges of sex hormones, such as testosterone and estrogen. These induce an indiscriminate scramble for base physical gratification.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>LOVE</b></span> is long haul. Love is an intense feeling of affection and care towards another person. Love involves personal sacrifice.. When you are in love with someone, you see a future with the other person and your partner is included in your life plans . Love and romance are connected to trust, loyalty and an deep and magic emotional attachment, where time stands still. If your partner is the first person that you think about when you want to share your innermost thoughts, then you are in love. There is a great willingness to make sacrifices for another and working at settling differences. There is this ability to compromise so that either both win or at least give the other person's opinion a chance. Love creates commitment to another and intentions are genuine intentions. You don\u2019t make an ass out of a person you love. Love fosters security, peace, inner happiness and a stable , solid partnership which can provide the ideal atmosphere to raise confident, content and secure children. Love is unconditional and the real deal. When you talk to a person you love , you get lost in your conversations, and the hours pass like minutes. You're more than willing to listen to her when she goes on and on about her day. All you want to do is to be with her, whether you're having sex or not. If at all you have sex with such a person you love, it is mind blowing literally an explosion of divine passion. Love sees a bright future together . There is this feeling that your life would be totally empty without her. You want to introduce her to your family You include her in all your plans . She makes you happy, and you'd do anything to make her happy. Real love brings out the best in people. Love accepts things as it is . The woman does NOT see the need to wear make up or put plastic in her tits or upper lip to hold on to her man. Love is when you want to do all you can for someone not expecting anything in return at all.<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">99.5% HOMOSEXUALS ARE PEDOPHILES.. R DOES NOT WALK ON DARK STREETS WITHOUT SNIPER PROTECTION ..</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6sCioKnpHdY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6sCioKnpHdY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4701566289991795707\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">August 5, 2018 at 11:24 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/venezuelas-maduro-drone-attack-was-attempt-to-kill-him/articleshow/65277022.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAD PREDICTED THAT THE DEEP STATE WOULD TRY REGIME CHANGE IN VENEZUELA..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHY?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">VENEZUELA HAS THE PLANETs LARGEST PROVEN RESERVES OF OIL..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IF THEY HAD ONLY BANANAS , WHO DEEP STATE WOULD NOT CARE..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE PLAN IS TO MURDER PRESIDENT MADURO AND INSTALL A JEW DAVID SMOLANSKY WHO IS HIDING IN USA.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JEW DAVID SMOLANSKY WAS BEING GROOMED BY THE US DEEP STATE FOR TAKING OVER VENEZUELA FOR THE PAST COUPLE OF YEARS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PSt_pYjd5bM/W2aZ7iOg4eI/AAAAAAABdRA/4PMTKcsnu8gpXchNHZBqL1TxZWRBPYXMACLcBGAs/s1600/sdimages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"190\" data-original-width=\"266\" height=\"456\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PSt_pYjd5bM/W2aZ7iOg4eI/AAAAAAABdRA/4PMTKcsnu8gpXchNHZBqL1TxZWRBPYXMACLcBGAs/s640/sdimages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-so8-C3ucNM4/W2ac18FeKHI/AAAAAAABdRM/vIr-wXyLtiMMB9WwE7l6C8B4ZLX-mSxkwCLcBGAs/s1600/xx20170918_swap.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"935\" data-original-width=\"1281\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-so8-C3ucNM4/W2ac18FeKHI/AAAAAAABdRM/vIr-wXyLtiMMB9WwE7l6C8B4ZLX-mSxkwCLcBGAs/s1600/xx20170918_swap.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State does not\nconsist of the entire government. It is a hybrid of national security and law\nenforcement agencies: the Department of Defense, the Department of State, the\nDepartment of Homeland Security, the Central Intelligence Agency and the\nJustice Department.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can also include the Department of the Treasury because of\nits jurisdiction over financial flows, its enforcement of international sanctions\nand its organic symbiosis with Wall Street.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All these agencies are coordinated\nby the Executive Office of the President via the National Security Council.\nCertain key areas of the judiciary belong to the Deep State, such as the\nForeign Intelligence Surveillance Court, whose actions are mysterious even to\nmost members of Congress.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State does not\nconsist only of government agencies. What is euphemistically called \u201cprivate\nenterprise\u201d is an integral part of its operations. There are now 854,000 contract\npersonnel with top-secret clearances \u2014 a number greater than that of\ntop-secret-cleared civilian employees of the government.:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since 9/11, 33 facilities for top-secret\nintelligence have been built or are under construction. Combined, they occupy\nthe floor space of almost three Pentagons \u2014 about 17 million square feet.\nSeventy percent of the intelligence community\u2019s budget goes to paying\ncontracts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And the membrane between government and industry is highly\npermeable: DEEP STATE operative James R. Clapper, is a former executive of Booz\nAllen Hamilton, one of the government\u2019s largest intelligence contractors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">James Clapper a retired\nlieutenant general in the United States Air Force and is the former Director of\nNational Intelligence. Clapper has held several key positions within the United\nStates Intelligence Community. He served as director of the Defense\nIntelligence Agency (DIA) from 1992 until 1995. He was the first director of\ndefense intelligence within the Office of the Director of National Intelligence\nand simultaneously the Under Secretary of Defense for Intelligence.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He served\nas the director of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency (NGA) from\nSeptember 2001 until June 2006. Clapper resigned as director of national\nintelligence, effective at the end of President Obama's term. In May 2017, he\njoined the Washington, D.C.\u2013based think tank the Center for a New American\nSecurity (CNAS) as a Distinguished Senior Fellow for Intelligence and National\nSecurity..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In an August 2017 interview, Clapper stated that U.S. President\nDonald Trump having access to the nuclear codes is \"pretty damn\nscary\" and he questioned his fitness to be in office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The executives of the\nkosher financial giants &nbsp;have de facto\ncriminal immunity. On March 6, 2013, testifying before the Senate Judiciary\nCommittee, Attorney General Eric Holder stated the following:&nbsp; &nbsp;\u201cI am\nconcerned that the size of some of these institutions becomes so large that it\ndoes become difficult for us to prosecute them when we are hit with indications\nthat if you do prosecute, if you do bring a criminal charge, it will have a\nnegative impact on the national economy, perhaps even the world economy.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This, from the chief law enforcement officer\nof a justice system that has practically abolished the constitutional right to\ntrial for poorer defendants charged with certain crimes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It does not require too much mental acuity to\nconsclude that Wall Street may be the ultimate owner of the Deep State and its\nstrategies, if for no other reason than that it has the money to reward\ngovernment operatives with a second career that is lucrative beyond the dreams\nof avarice \u2014 certainly beyond the dreams of a salaried government employee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Internationally, they\nespouse 21st-century \u201cAmerican Exceptionalism\u201d: the right and duty of the\nUnited States to meddle in every region of the world with coercive diplomacy\nand boots on the ground and to ignore painfully won international norms of\ncivilized behavior.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Edward Snowden\u2019s\nrevelations about the extent and depth of surveillance by the National Security\nAgency, it has become publicly evident that Silicon Valley is a vital node of\nthe Deep State as well..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Silicon Valley has long been tracking for commercial\npurposes the activities of every person who uses an electronic device, so it is\nhardly surprising that the Deep State should emulate the Valley and do the same\nfor its own purposes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Owing to secrecy and\nobfuscation, it is hard to know how much of the NSA\u2019s relationship with the\nValley is based on voluntary cooperation, how much is legal compulsion through\nFISA warrants and how much is a matter of the NSA surreptitiously breaking into\ntechnology companies\u2019 systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That the Deep State is\nso heavily entrenched, so well protected by surveillance, firepower, money and\nits ability to co-opt resistance that it is almost impervious to change.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the KOSHER wedge between USA and Russia is\nremoved\u2014 this will make NATO redundant and will spell the death knell for the\nDEEP STATE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; SHE GETS MONEY TO DO THIS..</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">RUCHIRA GUPTA WAS THE INDIAN CONTACT FOR </span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>CIA AGENT AND DEEP STATE OPERATIVE JEWESS GLORIA STEINHEM.</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T NEED THIS DESH DROHI TO SAVE INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nRUCHIRA GUPTA WAS IN USA ALONG WITH BARKHA DUTT PUSHING FOR HILLARY CLINTON TO BECOME PRESIDENT.<br />\n<br />\nRUCHIRA GUPTA IS SPONSORED BY US DEEP STATE.. WE KNOW HOW THIS COMMIE GOT ADMISSION IN COMMIE UNIVERSITY UC BERKELEY..<br />\n<br />\nFRENCH ROTHSCHILD GAVE HER FRENCH CHEVALIER LEGION DE HONNEUR AWARD..<br />\n<br />\nDEEP STATE OPERATIVE HILLARY CLINTON GAVE HER CLINTON GLOBAL CITIZEN AWARD.. SHE IS A MEMBER OF CGI LEAD.<br />\n<br />\nSHE TEACHES IN NEW YORK UNIVERSITY..<br />\n<br />\nUN USES RUCHIRA GUPTA AND HER FOREIGN FUNDED NGO APNE AAP. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/defence/washingtons-waiver-india-inches-closer-to-nsg-membership/articleshow/65268120.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The NSG was founded in response to the Indian nuclear test in May 1974 and first met in November 1975.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The test demonstrated that certain non-weapons specific nuclear technology could be readily turned to weapons development.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nations already signatories of the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT) saw the need to further limit the export of nuclear equipment, materials or technology.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">During a state visit to India in November 2010, U.S. President Barack Obama announced U.S. support for India's participation in the Nuclear Suppliers Group..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">China didn't approve of India's membership to NSG.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NPT was signed in 1968 to prevent spread of nuclear materials, tech and weapons and to devp co-op among the nations. It was signed by a total of 191 countries except for India, South Sudan, Israel &amp; Pakistan.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Being a member of the NSG will mean that India will have access to US Uranium. We can get Uranium from Namibia..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Despite of India not being a signatory to NPT, Australia has agreed to export Uranium to us because of India\u2019s responsible nuclear behaviour-- THE REAL REASON is to find a lucrative market for its huge Uranium reserves.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Technically India is buying uranium from Russia and Kazakhstan just to ensure that the 14 reactors under IAEA safeguards have enough fuels to run on.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WHAT IS BEING KEPT AS A GREAT SECRET IS THAT INDIA HAS SUFFICIENT RESERVES OF URANIUM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Tummalapalle Mine is a uranium mine in Tumalapalli village located in Kadapa of Andhra Pradesh has the planets largest Uranium reserve..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">INDIA MUST GO FOR THORIUM..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1775047922983490740\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_107M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_4.html?showComment=1533544271998#c1775047922983490740\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2018 at 2:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_107MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-45070498</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I HAD WARNED SEVERAL TIMES --</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DO NOT FUCK AROUND WITH THE FLOW OF THE GULF STREAM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">USA IS THE CULPRIT FOR THE MASSIVE HEAT WAVE IN EUROPE</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">METHANE LADEN GULF STREAM HAS SLOWED DOWN AND IS NOW 20% WEAKER THAT THE PRE-OIL FRACKING ERA ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GULF STREAM IS A CRITICAL COMPONENT OF THE AMOC ( Atlantic meridional overturning circulation )..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The AMOC is an important component of the Earth\u2019s climate system-- and it is dangerous if it slows down further..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">the Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (Amoc), carries warm water northwards towards the north pole. There it cools, becomes denser and sinks, and then flows back southwards.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE DEEP STATE ENSURED THAT CARBON DI OXIDE IS THE CULPRIT AT PARIS COP21 --SO THAT THEY CAN MAKE MONEY FROM CARBON TAXES.. THE GANG OF BIG BROTHER KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARCTIC AND GREENLAND ICE MELTING HAS CAUSED WEAKENING OF AMOC..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation (AMOC) is one part of the larger global thermohaline circulation. The circulation is powered by regional differences in the temperature and salinity of the ocean, with water flowing to try to balance out these difference.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A large addition of cold fresh water from melting Greenland ice sheets to the warm salty surface water typically found in the North Atlantic would cancel out some of these differences, weakening the strength of the circulation.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The effect of Greenland ice melt has not been widely included in previous studies of the AMOC because ice melt predictions are generally not included in climate models.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Scientists don\u2019t fully understand the AMOC itself and how it might respond to not only an influx of fresh water, but also to shifting winds, rising sea levels, and changes in atmospheric and ocean temperatures.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">A catastrophic collapse of the AMOC can cause a stratification of the ocean with cold water on top and warm water on the bottom. a PARADOX..</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE NORTHWARD FLOWING GULF STREAM ( EAST COAST USA ) CONTAINS METHANE DUE TO FRACKING LEAKS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE WARM GULF STREAM HAS SLOWED DOWN..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE THERMOHALINE OCEAN CIRCULATION HAS NOW GONE HAYWIRE\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">JET STREAM IS JUMPING LIKE A MONKEY AND HAS COME CLOSER TO THE EQUATOR FOR THE FIRST TIME SINCE MAN CAME ON EARTH..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARCTIC WILL LOSE ALMOST ALL SEA ICE SOON, WHILE THE ANTARCTIC ICE IS BUILDING UP\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONDITIONS ARE RIPE FOR A PLANET AXIS TILT WOBBLE\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">This will trigger massive earthquakes that will destabilize methane hydrates and result in huge amounts of methane abruptly entering the atmosphere-- this was how dinosaurs disappeared..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AGAIN, THE GULF STREAM CURRENT HAS BECOME WARMER DUE TO METHANE IN THE WATER... WE ALL KNOW OF FRACKING IN USA AND DEEPWATER HORIZON OIL SPILL .</span></b>..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN--THE BLAME IS ON INDIA-- INDIA MUST MOTH BALL COAL-- AND WE HAVE ROTHSCHILDs APCO BRANDED NARENDRA DAMODARDAS MODI PLAYING BALL..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_107BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedGDWD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_106T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_106TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedGDWD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_106B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4459411171110684722\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_106M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_4.html?showComment=1533544331021#c4459411171110684722\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2018 at 2:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_106MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nINDIA DID NOT HAVE A VOICE IN PARIS COP 21 -- WE WERE SILENT ABOUT METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE EMISSIONS BY THE WEST . . CHITPAVAN PRAKASH JAVEDEKAR WAS GRINNING LIKE A CHESHIRE CAT WHENEVER HE SAW A WHITE JEW..<br />\n<br />\nBetween Norway and Greenland in the western Eurasian basin, Atlantic currents flow into the Arctic at a depth of 200 to 250 meters, about 4\u00b0C warmer than the surface water. In winter, cold air cools surface waters until they fall and mix with the warm waters below. ..<br />\n<br />\nThat creates an overall warmer, well-mixed ocean over the top 250 meters, and one with little sea ice\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOn the eastern side of the basin, however, the warm Atlantic waters were kept at bay\u2014until recently. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe currents lurked at a depth of about 150 meters, but they didn\u2019t mix much with surface layers, because of a barrier called the cold halocline layer (CHL)\u2014a boundary between salty deep waters and fresher water on top. Summer ice, as it forms, rejects salt, leading to the creation of dense, salty waters just below the ice. .<br />\n<br />\nThose waters are heavier, and as they fall they create a highly stratified ocean\u2026<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_107b+seedGDWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State is not\nsimply \u2018the intelligence community..&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">It is</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">the tendency of the state to enter into\nactivity outside of the state\u2019s own rule of law.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">America\u2019s historic role\nas the principal shaper of global capitalism means that the globalization of\ncapitalism enabled the emergence and expansion of a US-dominated transnational\nDeep System\u200a\u2014\u200awithin this global Deep System, a US-dominated transnational financial\nelite has become inherently entangled with criminal networks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Globalization was tied\ndirectly to military interventions in over 70 developing nations designed to\ncreate the political conditions conducive to markets that would be \u2018open\u2019 to\nwestern capital penetration ( READ AS FOR WHITE JEWS TO STEAL ), and thus\ndomination of local resources and labour.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The logic of \u2018deep politics\u2019 required\nthat much of this criminal political violence in foreign theatres be suppressed\nfrom public consciousness, or otherwise justified in different ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The number of people\nthat died in the course of this forcible integration of former colonies across\nAsia, Africa, South America and the Middle East into the orbit of an emerging\nUS-UK dominated global economy, is astonishing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his book, Unpeople\n(2004), British historian Mark Curtis offers a detailed breakdown of the death\ntoll at approximately 10 million\u200a\u2014\u200aa conservative under-estimate, he qualifies.\nAmerican economist Dr JW Smith, in his Economic Democracy (2005), argues that <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Globalization was\nresponsible for violently killing more than 15 million people since WW II and\ncausing the death of hundreds of millions more as their economies were\ndestroyed or those countries were denied the right to restructure to care for\ntheir people\u2026 that is the record of the Western imperial centers of capital for\n50 years after WW2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the back of this\ndeep, transnational political violence\u200a\u2014\u200awhich remains obscured in mainstream\nmedia and history education\u200a\u2014\u200athe US and UK erected a global financial\narchitecture to serve the interests of their most powerful corporate and\nbanking institutions ( agents of JEW Rothschild ) , which hold overwhelming\nsway over the political class.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">State power was\ndeployed to integrate the resources, raw materials, fossil fuel energy\nreserves, and cheap labour from these vast areas of the world into a global\neconomy dominated by KOSHER transnational elite interests based largely in the\nUS, UK and Western Europe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This, opened the way\nfor new forms of criminalization of state power.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Financial deregulation\npursued by successive US governments paved the way for different armed and\nterror groups to link up with each other and with organized crime, generating\nan overall criminal economy valued at more than 2 trillion USD.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">illegal capital flights, profits from\ncriminal enterprises, drug trading, smuggling, legal businesses, and so on ,\nmost of which is recycled into Western economies through money laundering via\nmainstream financial institutions--It is a vital element of the cash flow of\nthese economies.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">As the primary medium\nof exchange for this criminal economy is the US dollar, the latter\u2019s role as\nthe world reserve currency has cemented a structural situation in which the\neconomic power of the US Treasury has become conditional on the economic\nimmunity of transnational criminal kosher networks, who systematically use US\ndollars for criminal transactions: The greater the stock of dollars held\nabroad, the greater the source of revenue for the US Treasury.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The US Deep State\noperates as the chief regulator of a global Deep System, in which seemingly\nlegitimate international financial flows have become increasingly enmeshed with\ntransnational organized crime, powerful corporate interests who control the\nworld\u2019s fossil fuel and raw materials resources, and the privatization of the\nmilitary-industrial complex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today, 4.4 billion\npeople\u200a\u2014\u200a&nbsp; more than two-thirds of the\nglobal population\u200a\u2014\u200alive on less than $5 a day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a shadowy group\nof KOSHER Plutocrats running multinational corporations, controlling the media\nnarrative, manipulating the money supply, influencing governments, generating\nchaos, and provoking wars in order to further their agendas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; They operate in the shadows, safely out of the\nlight of public scrutiny. Better to rule from the shadows where your identity and intentions\nare unknown.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Or at least the\nrules do not apply to them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/monsanto-and-farmer-suicides-in-india.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their plan is to change\nsociety in every country in a way that provides them a reason to impose a world\ngovernment. The creation of a world central bank and an electronic world\ncurrency, in conjunction with the elimination of cash, would allow them\ncomplete control to dictate financial policy around the globe.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their policies\nwould be enforced by their world army, and a micro-chipped population would\nlive in fear of having their electronic currency deleted if they ever crossed\nthe world government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS WHY INDIA MUST\nNEVER EVER BE A COMPLETELY CASHLESS SOCIETY.. WE MUST CONTINUE WITH LOWER\nDENOMINATIONS OF LESS THAN 200 RUPEES. ALL CHITRAGUPTA TEMPLES IN INDIA WERE BUILT BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWE NEVER HEARD OF CHITRAGUPTA ( AND MISSING LINK KAYASTHAS ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA THERE ARE NO KAYASTHAS OR CHITRAGUPTA TEMPLES.<br />\n<br />\nMANY KAYASTHA LEADERS WERE TRAITORS DURING ROTHSCHILDs RULE OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILD GAVE THE BULLSHIT THAT CHITRAGUPTA ( PATRON DEITY OF KAYASTHAS ) DECIDES IF YOU MUST GO TO HEAVEN OF HELL..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">SORRY THERE IS NO HEAVEN OR HELL IN SANATANA DHARMA..WE HAVE A CONCEPT OF REINCARNATION. IN SANATANA DHARMA IT IS NOT YOUR CURRENT BIRTH WHICH DECIDES YOUR FATE-- ALL THE EXTRA BAGGAGE OF YOUR PAST LIVES ADD UP</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">KAYASTHAS EAT MEAT..&nbsp; &nbsp;DURING MOGHUL RULE THEY CONVERTED TO ISLAM..&nbsp; &nbsp;MOST WERE LOW CASTE HINDU ACCOUNTANTS AND GIVEN HIGH POSTS WITH LAND AND PERKS...IN BENGAL THEY WERE CALLED PIR ALI MUSLIMS.<br /><br />AFTER MUGHAL EMPIRE WAS TAKEN OVER BY JEW ROTHSCHILD , THESE KAYASHTAS CONVERTED BACK TO HINDUISM..&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">AND ROTHSCHILD MADE KAYASTHAS THE MISSING LINK-- BETWEEN BRAHMINS AND KSHATRIYAS. SINCE THESE OPPORTUNISTS WERE OF LOW MORAL FIBRE THEY WERE USED AS TRAITORS.</span></b><br />\n100 YEARS AGO BENGALI KAYASTHAS ( ORIGINALLY PIR ALI MUSLIMS ) HELD 53% OF LAND IN BENGAL. THEY WERE CALLED BHADRALOK ( ELITE GENTRY-- BOSE/ BASU/ GUHA/ GHOSH / MITRA/ DATTA etc )<br />\n<br />\nCHITRA GUPTA FOLLOWERS ARE HAPPILY EATING BEEF -- A LOOP HOLE PROVIDED BY ROTHSCHILD FOR THESE OPPORTUNISTS WHO HAD TO SACRIFICE BEEF WHEN THEY RECONVERTED BACK FROM ISLAM TO HINDUSIM...<br />\n<br />\nBENGAL HAS PRODUCED MORE TRAITORS THAN FREEDOM FIGHTERS.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS OPIUM FUNDED UNIVERSITIES LIKE UC BERKELEY, COLUMBIA , CAMBRIDGE ECT TO PROP UP THESE FAKE KAYASTHAS.. THEY WERE ALMOST LIKE THE KNIGHTED SIRs ..<br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE OF TWO TRAITOR PIR ALIS ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/opium-drug-running-tagore-family-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSome Kayastha surnames are : Srivastava, Gaur, Saxena, Mathur, Nigam , Bhatnagar, Asthana, Kulshreshtha etc<br />\n<br />\nKAYASTHA PRESIDENT RAJEDRA PRASAD AND NEHRU SCREWED INDIA WITH SEC 35A IN KASHMIR..<br />\n<br />\nNehru propagated Chayavaad poetry only because of Teji Bachchan's husband KAYASTHA Harvansh Rai Bachchan who he personally sponsored --we know why !<br />\n<br />\nWe had poems in our NCERT books ( DURGAM PATH KE RAHI ) of the bullshit FAB FOUR.. Jaishankar Prasad, Suryakant Tripathi 'Nirala', Sumitranandan Pant and Mahadevi Varma--<br />\n<br />\nIN SANATANA DHARMA , THERE IS NO PEARLY GATE -- NO PURGATORY-- NO DAY OF JUDGEMENT-- NO CHITRAGUPTA ( OF KAYASTHA SHIT ) .<br />\n<br />\nIn the FAKE Garud Purana, Chitragupta is hailed as the first man to give the script.\u201cChitragupta namastubhyam vedaksaradatre\u201d(Obeisance to Chitragupta, the giver of letters)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html</span><br />\n<br />\nHERE IS POISON INJECTED INTO RIG VEDA\u2026 this invocation to FAKE Chitragupta never existed .\u201cOm tat purushaya vidmahe Chitragupta dhimahi tena lekha prachodayata.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWHO KNOWS VERY SOON WE WILL HAVE INVOCATION TO SHIRDI SAI BABA ( WHO DIED 99 YEARS AGO ) TOO IN THE RIG VEDA..THE WAY THINGS ARE GOING IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE BULLSHIT OF DEVDUTT PATTANAIK--90% OF WHAT HE HS WRITTEN OR SPOKEN ARE FOUL LIES..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.mid-day.com/articles/devdutt-pattanaik-descendants-of-chitragupta/19083152</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Rothschild sent children of TRAITOR Kayasthas to England, they later became civil servants, tax officers, junior administrators, teachers, legal helpers and barristers. They rose to the highest positions accessible to natives in British India.</span></div>\n<br />\nNETAJI SUBHASH CHANDRA BOSE WITH A HONEY POT GERMAN JEWESS WIFE WAS A KAYASTHA..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/netaji-subhash-chandra-bose-untold.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 16px;\"><b>ROTHSCHILDs AGENT AND FREEMASON SWAMI VIVEKANANDA ( PIR ALI MUSLIM DATTA ) WHO PROPAGATED HEAVEN AND HELL WAS A KAYASTHA..</b></span><br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_129MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_129BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_129B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_130B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3678869080345711692\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_130M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. HINDUISM IS THE ONLY RELIGION WITHOUT HEAVEN/ HELL CONCEPT. THESE ARE BASICS..<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ THE WORKS OF VIVEKANDANDA\u2014<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA SUPPORTED THE HEAVEN- HELL THEORY, PROPPED UP ALL FAKE DASAS/ RADHA / RAM KICKING PREGNANT SITA TO THE FOREST / 16000 GOPIKA LOVERS/ BHAKTI MOVEMENT/ ANIMAL SACRIFICE IN TEMPLES/ DEVADASI TEMPLE WHORES/ SATI/ AGHORIS / BIGOT MANU LIES/ KAMASUTRA SEX/ BRAHMACHARYA SEMEN/ ASHWAMEDHA HORSE SACRIFICE/ FAKE EMPEROR ASHOKA/ FAKE ROTHSCHILDs MUTTS/ ISLAMIC CONVERSION OF HINDU MONUMENTS LIKE QUTAB MINAR-TAJ MAHAL- BABRI MASJID ETC.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA DID NOT KNOW THAT HINDU GODS ( EXCEPT VISHNU MORTAL AVATARS PARASHURAMA/ RAMA/ KRISHNA/ AYYAPPA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES .<br />\n<br />\nI want my readers to know that Vivekananda was part of the Brahmo Samaj which-<br />\n<br />\nRejected the Vedas<br />\nRejected Vishnu avatars Krishna and Rama<br />\nRejected temple worship of Shiva, Vishnu and Devi<br />\nRejected Karma , be-birth and Moksha theory.<br />\n<br />\nThe Brahmo Samaj was founded by two Opium drug running agents of Jew Rothschild\u2014 Dwaraknath Tagore and Raja Ram Mohan Roy\u2014both Pir Ali Muslims . The theology of the Brahmo Samaj was called \"neo-Vedanta\" by Christian commentators.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s agent Keshub Chandra Sen, a Christian convert controlled his nephew Vivekananda and had him enrolled in his Nava Vidhan ( Nobobidhan ).<br />\n<br />\nKeshab Chandra Sen and Vivekananda incorporated Christian theology within the framework of Hindu thought.<br />\n<br />\nKeshab Chandra Sen was Secretary to the Goodwill Fraternity, Masonic lodge associated with the Unitarian Rev.Charles Dall and a Christian missionary Rev. James Long .<br />\n<br />\nWith them Sen establish a TRAITOR \"British Indian Association\" filled with Bhadaraloks , Pir Ali \u201cbrahmins\u201d , white people and Anglo Indians ( RAPE PRODUCTS OF WHITE MAN AND THEIR MAID SERVANTS ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1866 Sen delivered an address on Jesus Christ, Europe and Asia, in which he proclaimed that \"India would be for Christ alone who already stalks the land\"<br />\n<br />\nVivekananda was a member of a Freemasonry lodge in 1883.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild published ( 1896 ) and propagated Vivekananda\u2019s book Raja Yoga.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893.<br />\n<br />\nFor the next three years Vivekananda would be shown to several western doctors in USA , England and Europe to treat his terrible diseases\u2014and all the while he lectured too.<br />\nRothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.<br />\n<br />\nCOMMIE AGNIVESH IS ALSO SWAMI.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA IS GUILTY OF ALLOWING HINDUISM TO BE BRANDED AS FULL OF SUPERSTITION \u2014 WHEN THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SUPERSTITION , OTHER THAN WHAT HIS MASTER ROTHSCHILD INJECTED- USING HIS FAKE CREATIONS AND FAKE MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs MEDIA PROPPED HIM UP<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA HAD VERY LITTLE PRANA WITHIN AND SUFFERED FROM 33 MAJOR ILLNESSES. SO BALLS TO HIS BULLSHIT BRAHMACHARYA / OJAS THEORY..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD SEND HIS FREEMASON AGENT VIVEKANANDA TO CHICAGO.<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS HE SPOKE FIRST 3 WORDS ( BROTHERS AND SISTERS OF AMERICA ) A PAID AUDIENCE WAS KEPT TO CLAP LIKE THERE IS NO TOMORROW , AND ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA COVERED IT - -AND MADE ALL CURIOUS.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD MAKE NIKOLA TESLA MEET VIVEKANANDA AT JEWESS SARAH BENDHARTS PARTY.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA DID EXTENSIVE MEDICAL TESTS IN USA.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA USED TO GIVE BULL TO ALL AND SUNDRY THAT HE PRESERVED HIS SEMEN FOR 12 YEARS --AND THAT IS WHY HE IS SO BRAINY AND HEALTHY<br />\n<br />\nHE WENT TO VIVEKANDA ROCK ( KANYA KUMARI ) NOT TO MEDITATE FOR WORLD PEACE--<br />\n<br />\nHE WAS SENT THERE BY KOTTAKKAL ARYA VAIDYA SALA IN KERALA TO INCREASE HIS PRANA BY TAKING IN NEGATIVE IONS ( SALT SEA SPRAY ) AT THE VIVEKANADA ROCK MIDSEA OFF RAMESHAWARAM.<br />\n<br />\nAN AYURVEDA DOCTOR FROM KOTTAKKAL ACCOMPANIED HIM-- TO SHOW HIM THE CORRECT WAY TO DO SURYA NAMASKAR FOR INCREASING PRANA<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; WHY?&nbsp; BECAUSE\n&nbsp;NATURAL JUSTICE ( DHARMA ) IS IN THE\nREALM OF THE SUBJECTIVE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT WAS\nKOSHER BIG BROTHER WHO INTRODUCED THE CONCEPT OF \u201cJUSTICE IS BLIND\u201d.. &nbsp;IT SUITED HIS VESTED AGENDA.. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">PERCEPTION\nMUST BE RULED BY CONTEXT WHICH IS SUBJECTIVE..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS\nIS WHY PAST JUDGMENTS CANNOT BE TIED UP TO THE CONSTITUTION LIKE A LANGOT\u2014THE WAY\nSALVE, SOLI AND &nbsp;FALI &nbsp;WANTS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
