IT MUST BE SUBJECTIVE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">FAKE ASHTAVAKRA\nGITA ( POTTED PLANT ) COOKED UP BY JEW ROTHSCHILD IS OBJECTIVE.. &nbsp;BHAGAWAD GITA ( THE DEEP JUNGLE ) IS\nSUBJECTIVE.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">SPIRITUALITY\nCAN NEVER BE OBJECTIVE.. font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">1 + 5 x 6 - 3 + (4 - 2)... ... what\npart should you calculate first?..... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calculate them in the wrong order, and you\nwill get a wrong answer !... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; AS- Addition and Subtraction (left-to-right)..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">MOST\nOF OUR JUDGES ARE ENGAGED IN MERE ACTIVITY TRAPS\u2026WHAT IS ALL THIS TAREEQ PEH\nTAREEQ PEH TAREEQ .. A GOOD GENERAL WILL LOSE THE SMALLER BATTLES AS A WAR TACTIC. THIS IS NO CHESS BOARD LOGIC..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A GOOD GENERAL WILL CREATE HIS OWN FINAL DECISIVE FIELD OF BATTLE --SO SAID CHANAKYA--AND LATER BY SUN TZU. .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A SKILLED GENERAL WILL NOT BE DRAWN INTO HIS ENEMYs CHOICE OF THE BATTLE FIELD.. HIS WAR IS WON BEFORE IT IS EVEN FOUGHT..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b>A GENERAL DOES NOT CARE FOR A+ FOR EFFORT-- HE CARES ONLY FOR THE FINAL OUTCOME..WHAT HE MUST ACCOMPLISH..HE KNOWS THE MEANING OF SUCCESS...</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A BATTLE CAN NEVER BE A MINDLESS ACTIVITY TRAP --LIKE WHAT HAPPENED IN WW1 AND WW2 CONDUCTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL. ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WERE THERE NO INTELLIGENT MEN TO ASK WHAT THE F#CK IS GOING ON ?.. WAS IS ALL THIS MADNESS -- WHO IS GAINING BY SUCH FIGHTING ALL OVER THE GLOBE ?</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ROTHSCHILD CONTROLLED BOTH SIDE PANDAVAS/ KAURAVAS- AND ALSO THE NEUTRAL NATIONS.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAPOLEONs WAS TACTICS INCLUDED LOSING BATTLES DELIBERATELY-- TO DRAW AWAY THE MAIN ENEMY FORCES, AND BOTTLE THEM UP..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AGAIN I REPEAT-- IF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAS COMMANDED THE KARGIL WAR --NOT ONE SINGLE SOLDIER WOULD HAVE BEEN SACRIFICED..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b>EVEN PAKISTANIS WERE SURPRISED- WHAT TYPE OF INDIANS ARE THESE --RUNNING UP HILLOCKS INTO A HAIL OF GUNFIRE..CERTAIN DEATH--TO CAPTURE SOME CHOOTIYA ROCKY HILLOCK ?&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b>WAS IT THE EGO OF THE GENERAL--OR DID HE WANT MEDALS FOR EVERY HILLOCK HE CAPTURED ?</b></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b>WAS HE MISSING THE BUS? WAS A TIME BOMB SET TO EXPLODE ON BHARATMATAs FACE?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GEN PATTON FAMOUSLY SAID-- \"DONT DIE FOR YOUR COUNTRY--LET THE ENEMY BASTARD DIE FOR HIS COUNTRY..\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONLY THOSE WHO UNDERSTAND STRATEGY WILL SURVIVE A WAR.. THE ESSENCE OF STRATEGY IS KNOWING WHAT NOT TO GO..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">TACTIC IS FOR THE OBJECTIVE MIND, STRATEGY IS FOR THE SUBJECTIVE MIND.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Tactics are the actual means used to gain an OBJECTIVE , while strategy is the overall SUBJECTIVE campaign plan, which may involve complex operational patterns, activity, and decision-making that govern tactical execution\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><b>TACTICS WITHOUT STRATEGY IS THE NOISE CLUTTER BEFORE SURE CRUSHING DEFEAT.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>TACTIC IS KNOWING WHAT TO DO WHEN THERE IS SOMETHING TO DO.. STRATEGY IS KNOWING WHAT TO DO WHEN THERE IS NOTHING TO DO..</b></span>&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THAT IS WHY A GOOD GENERAL WILL NOT FIGHT LIKE RAMBO \u2014HE MUST STAY AT A VANTAGE POINT AND THINK CLEARLY.. HIS SUBJECTIVE DECISION ON HIS OWN TERMS ( NOT ENEMYs TERMS ) SAVES HIS COUNTRY..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">AT KARGIL WE WERE FIGHTING ON PAKISTANs TERMS.</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A WEAK ARMY CAN SUBDUE THE STRONG ARMY WITHOUT FIGHTING.. MAKE THE ENEMY BELIEVE THAT YOU ARE NEAR , IN A WRONG DIRECTION, WHEN ACTUALLY YOU ARE FAR AWAY.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOW DID MIGHTY GENERAL NAPOLOEN LOSE THE BATTLE OF WATERLOO? ROTHSCHILD TARGETTED HIS CHRONS LADEN ASSH0LE.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/napoleon-unknown-side-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">OUR INDIAN MILITARY OFFICER COLLEGES ARE USELESS .. WE CHURN OUT MINDLESS ROBOTS\u2026</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS COMMENT IS FOR THE LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1151223150001050471\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_54M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html?showComment=1533287475769#c8327609241420723580\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 3, 2018 at 2:41 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_75MC\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME-<br />\n<br />\nYOU SAID LAWYERS MUST PRESENT OBJECTIVE ARGUMANETS \u2013BUT JUDGES MUST DELIVER SUBJECTIVE JUSTICE<br />\n<br />\nHE ASKED --WHAT IS A SUBJECTIVE ARGUMENT? HE WANTED ME TO GO ONE NOTCH ABOVE THE \u201cLOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR\u201d<br />\n<br />\nOBJECTIVE arguments are often those that have to do with logos, that is, reason, evidence and logic, generally dealing with material questions (things that can be sensed or measured and have to do with the real outside world, outside of oneself).<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECTIVE arguments are most often those dealing with the personal situation, feelings or experiences of a particular individual, family or group, and are usually arguments from ethos or pathos (though material subjective factors may involve arguments from logos as well).<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/06/ethos-logos-pathos-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN JEW ROTHSCHILD RULED INDIA HE SAID \u2013 OBJECTIVE JUDGEMENTS WILL PREVAIL ..<br />\n<br />\nHE DID NOT WANT DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) TO PREVAIL.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE HE WANTED TO EQUATE A FREEDOM FIGHTER WITH A TERRORIST ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAW PROTECTED SLAVE MASTERS.<br />\n<br />\nWHITHER JUSTICE WITHOUT FAIRNESS?&nbsp; &nbsp;CAN FAIRNESS EVER BE BLIND ?<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA I WAS A FAIR CAPTAIN \u2013 AND MY CREW LOVED ME FOR MY BALLS !!<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION HAS A PREAMBLE\u2014 IT CLEARLY SAYS \u201c POWER IS VESTED IN THE HANDS OF WE THE PEOPLE\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nIT MEANS THAT THE CONSTITUTION CANNOT BE FORCED OR IMPOSED ON \u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d AS A STRAIT JACKET. . IT EMPHASIZES THAT THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION IS FOUNDED ON THE AUTHORITY OF WE THE PEOPLE \u2013 IN WHOM IS VESTED THE ULTIMATE SOVEREIGNTY.<br />\n<br />\nIT FOLLOWS THAT \u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d CAN MAKE THE CONSTITUTION A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT BASED&nbsp; ON THE NEEDS OF THE TIMES WE LIVE IN.<br />\n<br />\nNOW WHEN EX-PRESIDENT PRANAB MUKHERJEE WANTS INDIANS TO BE PATRIOTIC TO THE CONSTITUTION, ( RSS NAGPUR CONCLAVE SPEECH ) NOT THE WATAN, WE KNOW WHAT THIS WEE FELLOW IS WORTH!<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">THE PREAMBLE IS BOTH THE SPIRIT AND THE SPINE OF OUR CONSTITUTION.&nbsp; &nbsp;IT IS THE LIFE BREATH OF THE CONSTITUTION ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_75MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">THE PREAMBLE IS A RESOLVE NOT A RESOLUTION.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">RESOLVE LEADS TO CHANGE ..&nbsp; OUR CONSTITUTION IS NOT A POTTED PLANT..&nbsp;</b></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"></b></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><b>RESOLVE MAKES US FREE.</b></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><b><br /></b></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n</b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ONE NOTCH ABOVE THE LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR\u2014 IT ENDS HERE .. ANY HIGHER NOBODY IN INDIA HAS THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO UNDERSTAND IT..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_75MC\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nNO POINT IN WINKING AT A GIRL IN THE DARK OR SINGING TO A DONKEY TO SERENADE IT.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html?showComment=1533299984592#c2533960398794038189\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 3, 2018 at 6:09 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_89MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME- WHY DO YOU SUPPORT THE KHAP SYSTEM OF JUSTICE.<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN ..<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA I NEVER PUNISHED SOMEONE FOR ONE BAD EVENT. AND MY SHORE BOSSES TOOK UMBRAGE\u2014 I TOLD THEM TO F#CK OFF.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE KHAPS WHO SIT UNDER THE BANYAN TREE WERE WISE OLD MEN WHO HAD THE RESPECT OF THE VILLAGERS.<br /><br />THEY KNEW THE HISTORY OF EVERY BODY IN THE VILLAGE FROM BIRTH.. THEY HAVE WATCHED THEM GROWNG UP.&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY KNOW WHO PROVOKES AND WHO REACTS.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\nMEANING IS CONTEXT BOUND.....<br />\n<b><br /><span style=\"color: purple;\">IT WAS JEW ROTHSCHILD WHO CREATED THE LEGEND THAT LADY </span><span style=\"color: red;\">JUSTICE IS BLIND</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">.......&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: purple;\">THIS WAS TO SHOW THAT THE CROWN PRINCE AND A OLD DYING LEPER ON THE STREET WILL GET SAME IMPARTIAL JUSTICE..&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN DUE COURSE THIS FINE CONCEPT WAS HIJACKED IN A CUNNING MANNER TO A FOUL \u201c WE DON\u2019T CARE WHY YOU DID A CRIME \u201d\u2014 MIND YOU, IT COULD BE FOR SHEER SURVIVAL OR TO BREAK CHAINS OF SLAVERY \u2026</span></b>\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nJUSTICE MUST NEVER EVER BE BLIND , AS IT KILLS DHARMA OR NATURAL JUSTICE WHICH IS ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION .....<br />\n<br />\nTHE RICHEST LAWYERS IN SUPREME COURT ARE THE ONES WHO HAVE A \u201cSETTING \u201c OR NEXUS WITH THE COLLEGIUM JUDGE AND THE OPPOSITE CAMP LAWYER\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSAB MIL BHAANTKE KHAATE HEIN\u2026. WE KNOW THESE BASTARDS.. WE HAVE PROFILED THEM.. WE KNOW THEIR SHELL COMPANIES.. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/objective-arguments-but-subjective.html?showComment=1533181920660#c1630832457233793694\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 2, 2018 at 9:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nAs a junior officer , once I saw my usually cheerful colleague moping around-- in deep depression. He had neglected his watch and made critical mistakes which could affect safety of life on the ship.<br />\n<br />\nSo I asked him , whatever happened maaan ?.<br />\n<br />\nHe wept and said \" Captain's 11 year old daughter told me today morning -- give me chocolates or I will tell daddy that you pulled down my knickers. Now who is gonna believe me - everybody will believe her. She looks so angelic and cute. , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In June 12, 1975 verdict of the Allahabad High Court convicting then Prime Minister Indira Gandhi of electoral malpractices and debarring her from holding any elected post..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The verdict delivered by Justice Jagmohanlal Sinha, led to imposition of Emergency in India on June 25, 1975.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Justice Jagmohal Lal is infamous for his 1975 ruling in the State of Uttar Pradesh v. Raj Narain lawsuit in which he invalidated the election of Prime Minister Indira Gandhi.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The petition challenged her election to the Lok Sabha in 1971 from the Rae Bareli parliamentary constituency in Uttar Pradesh, which MAD CAP Raj Narain had also contested..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The judgement in itself ran to 259 pages.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Indira Gandhi was declared guilty of corrupt practices and her election to the Lok Sabha was declared null and void. She was charged under Section 123(7) of the Representation of the People Act. She was also disqualified from contesting elections for six years.. The whole affair was rigged by KOSHER foreign forces, who wanted India to be under the umbrella of CIA/ MOSSAD.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">INDIRA GANDHI HAD NATIONALIZED ALL JEW ROTHSCHILDs BANKS IN INDIA.. AS A REWARD SHANTI BHUSHAN WAS MADE INDIAs LAW MINISTER BY THE KOSHER DEEP STATE.</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Judge Jagmohan Lal ( who defied the UP Chief Justice DS Mathur ) looked at the crowd and rapidly read the operative order. He began: \u201cIn view of my findings on Issue No. 3 and Issue No. 1 read with additional issue No. 1, additional issue No. 2 and additional issue No. 3, the petition is allowed and the election of Smt. Indira Nehru Gandhi, respondent No. 1, to the Loksabha is declared void.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The judge read the rest of the order quickly in a rambling manner and left the courtroom. No body heard him. The crowd was raising loud cheers of \u201cRaj Narain Ki Jai,\u201d \u201cShanti Bhushan Ki Jai.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild's BENAMI mouth piece THE STATESMAN had headlines ready-- \u201cBy not resigning, she will be guilty of far more than any violation of an electoral law.\u201d</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_67MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_67BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_67B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_68B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3684976911442703663\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_28.html?showComment=1538288514327#c3684976911442703663\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 30, 2018 at 11:51 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nAsked if Justice Sinha\u2019s verdict changed the course of India\u2019s history, senior advocate Shanti Bhushan - who represented Raj Narain \u2013 said: \u201cYes indeed the emergency as well as Indira losing the 1977 election was the direct result of Justice Jagmohanlal Sinha\u2019s judgment.\u201d</div>\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE ENTIRE WESTERN WORLD AND ROTHSCHILDs KOSHER MEDIA APPLAUDED -- THEY FELT THAT THEY SCREWED RUSSIA..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nOn an appeal filed by Indira Gandhi, Justice VR Krishna Iyer \u2013 a vacation judge of the Supreme Court - on June 24, 1975 granted a conditional stay on Justice Sinha\u2019s verdict allowing her to continue as Prime Minister. However, she was debarred from taking part in parliamentary proceedings and draw salary as an MP.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the Emergency was in force, the Supreme Court later overturned her conviction on November 7, 1975.<br />\n<br />\nThe moment Emergency was declared , Indira Gandhi got Raj Narain arrested and imprisoned on the same day along with several leading opposition leaders including J.P. Narayan, Morarji Desai, Satyendra Narayan Sinha, Charan Singh and Atal Bihari Vajpayee ..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SWAMY, MODI, GEORGE FERNANDES ETC WERE ALL SIKHS IN DISGUISE..EVADING ARREST..</span></b></div>\n<br />\nAS HEALTH MINISTER MAD CAP RAJ NARAIN WENT ON A INDIAN NAVY SHIP --AND ADDRESSED A GATHERING OF HIGH RANKING ADMIRALS , COMMODORES , CAPTAINS..&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">\" ITNA BADA JAHAAZ , SAMUDRA KE SHANTI KE OOPAR ? YEH SAB BHAGWAN KE LEELA HAI\"&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN THE VIDEO..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATION ( POLITICAL ) , NOW CAUSES THE PERCENTAGE TO JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.28 %</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_69b+seedC93-D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gVZ0g3Pq0mc/W2KGIaeHq_I/AAAAAAABdPU/ZPyigztDGIgbb-hTIkJ4C_dQjyDwxiwLQCLcBGAs/s1600/20180731_201310.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1600\" data-original-width=\"631\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gVZ0g3Pq0mc/W2KGIaeHq_I/AAAAAAABdPU/ZPyigztDGIgbb-hTIkJ4C_dQjyDwxiwLQCLcBGAs/s640/20180731_201310.jpg\" width=\"252\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Read this line twice.If the judiciary DELIBERATELY undermines with national security the judiciary can be punished .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn 1989, after the Centre dismissed the SR Bommai government in Karnataka, SC had said the validity of a proclamation for President\u2019s rule can be subjected to judicial review.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE HAVE DEEP STATE OUTETS LIKE THE WIRE ( SIDDHARTH VARADARAJAN ) AND THEPRINT ( SHEKAR GUPTA/ BARKHA DUTT ) SPREADING DISINFORMATION USING LAWYERS LIKE SANJAY HEGDE / PRASHANT BHUSHAN ETC REGULARLY.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://thewire.in/law/the-judiciary-can-stop-the-misuse-of-article-356-if-it-chooses-to-act</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>THE PRESIDENT IS NOT A RUBBER STAMP AS BEEN MADE OUT BY COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND BENAMI MEDIA..</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE PRESIDENT IS EXPECTED TO SUSTAIN DHARMA AND HOLD VETO POWERS WHEN IT COMES TO SECURITY OF THE WATAN..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS IS WHY PRESIDENT IS SUPREME COMMANDER OF OUR ARMED FORCES. THIS IS WHY THE PRESIDENT IF AFFORDED&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIndian President is not a ceremonial head, unlike many other countries. The President is the head of Indian State with SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS , while Prime Minister is the head of Indian Government.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAll important decisions regarding the country are taken in the name of Indian President, though most of these will be based on the binding advice given by Council of Ministers(CoM), as per Article 74 of Indian Constitution. But there are certain exceptions, like NATIONAL SECURITY where he can use his discretionary powers.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nUnder article 78 the President enjoys the right to seek information from the PM regarding the administration of the affairs of the union.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTraditionally, the structure of government has been divided into three components:--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n(1) the legislature to make laws;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n(2) the executive to implement laws and</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n(3) the judiciary to interpret laws and administer justice.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">JUDGES CANNOT PLAY GOD USING PIL ROUTE AS IS HAPPENING IN INDIA ..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Preamble of our Constitution clearly articulates India as a republic. Being a republic there is no hereditary monarch but the President, as the head of the State. The office of the President of India is created by Article 52 of the Constitution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Indian Constitution has only two vesting clauses i.e. Article 53 and Article 154. This project is concerned about Article 53 which clearly states that \u201cthe executive power of the Union shall be vested in the President\u2026\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVested interests using Benami media and DEEP STATE collegium judges have converted the Indian President as a mere figure head, titular head, rubber stamp or golden zero.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President can remove any minister from the Council of ministers of the Parliament, the Governor of any state, the judges of the Supreme Court, High Courts, Election Commissioners, the members of the U.P.S.C.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">The President is the supreme commander-in-chief of the defense force. It is his duty to refrain the state from foreign aggression \u2014and this includes SPONSORED ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION BY STATE GOVERNMENTS TO BOOST THEIR VOTE BANKS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President is the head to maintain foreign relations. The negotiation of all treaties and agreements are made in the name of the President.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_161BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; position: relative;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_157MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe authority and status of the President depends upon the powers he can exercise and the functions he can perform under and within the express provisions of the Constitution and not by what is now practiced by the President.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">We cannot say that President is a figure head when vast SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS are afforded to him by the constitution.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe preserver, protector and defender of the Constitution ( OATH ) cannot be a mere figure head.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI will devote myself to the service and well-being of the people of Republic of India.\u201d But how can a person who is dependent upon the Council of Ministers, devote himself?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPresident can exercise his functions directly without the advice of the council of ministers or others, which is otherwise known as SUBJECTIVE discretionary power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President is independent in performing his functions.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President can only be impeached on one ground i.e. when he acts unconstitutionally. The Procedure for it is very difficult. Two-third majorities of both houses of total membership of Parliament are required to impeach him.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe question here is if the President has no role to play then why should he be impeached? If the President is not responsible to preserve, protect and defend the Constitution and his only job is to sign the bill, how can he be impeached for signing an illegal Bill, which is sent by the Parliament?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAs in America, the President is totally free to exercise his executive powers, but he cannot make laws, i.e. legislative powers are not vested in him.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN INDIA THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WHO CAN ONLY INTERPRET LAWS ( AND THAT TOO WHEN INVITED ) IS PLAYING GOD. THE PRESIDENT CAN PUNISH THE JUDICIARY.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President can issue ordinances when the assembly is not in session.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn America, the President cannot hold officebeyond the period of eight years, but there is no such condition in Indian Constitution. A President can be re-elected after second term in India. The President of America has not been given the power to dissolvethe Congress, but Art. 85 (2) (b) of Indian Constitution gives the power to Indian President to dissolve the House of People.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe King of England reigns but does not rule. ( MOTHERLAND )..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nROTHSCHILD INTRODUCED DEMOCRACY TO THE WHOLE PLANET AFTER WW2 . ALL DEMOCRACIES INCLUDING INDIA HAD RULERS SWEARING OATHS TO \u201cPROTECT THE CONSITUTION\u201d. WHILE IN HIS OWN LAND PRESIDENT/ PM/ JUDGES ETC PLEDGED TO \u201c PROTECT THE WATAN\u201d \u2014THE PROMOSED LANDOF ISRAEL..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">LOYALTY TO THE LITTLE RED BOOK OF MAO IS WHAT CAUSED INDIAN COMMIES TO BE ON THE SIDE OF CHINA DURING THE WAR IN 1962..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">LOYALTY TO THE KORAN IS WHAT CAUSES INDIAN MUSLIMS TO AGITATE AND CRY THAT WE MUST ALLOW ILLEGAL BURMESE ROHINGYAS INTO INDIA.. SOME EVEN WANTED NIGERIAN STREET DRUG RUNNING MUSLIMS ( WHO HAVE BURNT THEIR OWN PASSPORTS ) TO BE GIVEN REPRESENTATION IN RAJYA SABHA..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE THE PEOPLE ASK PEA BRAINED POT HOLE JOURNALIST FAYE DSOUZA (MIRROR NOW TV ) , WE HAD ENOUGH OF OUR \u201cYOU FIRST \u201c\u2014WHICH INCLUDES DESH DROHIS FIRST\u2026 LEARN THE CONCEPT OF \u201cWATAN FRST\u201d.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE WARN THE MODI GOVT\u2014DESH DROHI FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs SHOULD NOT BE LEFT OFF WITH A MERE FINE.. INCARCERATION FOR SEDITION / TREASON IS A MUST..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE THE PEOPLE ASK THE PRESIDENT, REVIEW THE PERFORMANCE OF CM OF WEST BENGAL AND PUNISH HER AS PER YOUR POWERS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nLUTYENS DEEP STATE OPERATIVES COULD NOT BE EVICTED FROM THEIR BUNGLOWS IN THE PAST AS THEY HAD THE JUDGES IN THEIR POCKETS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIF DESH BHAKTS PROTECTING BHARATMATA HAVE TO BE BRANDED EVIL HINDU TROLLS --SO BE IT..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJUDGES RECENTY OVER RULED THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR ONCE HE HAS EXERCISED HIS DISCRETION AS PER THE CONSTITUTION..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGOVERNOR HAS THE DISCRETION NOT TO ALLOW UNHOLY AND OPPORTUNISTIC POST POLL ALLIANCES TO HIJACK VOTERS FREEWILL AND CHOICE.. DEEP STATE JUDGES ARMTWISTED BY BENAMI MEDIA ( PEABRAINED CREATURES ) AND DESH DROHI FORCES CANNOT DECIDE WHAT A GOVERNOR MUST DO OR NOT DO\u2026..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nGOVERNOR HAS BEEN AFFORDED VAST DISCRETION POWERS TO PRESERVE DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ) -- HE NEED NOT DO ANY NUMBER CRUNCHING LIKE A NON-CONSCIOUS COMPUTER..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNO JDS MLA OR KARNATAKA VOTER WANTS THE ITALIANS TO RULE OVER THEM...YET TODAY IT IS HAPPENING.. CONGRESS AND JDS COULD NOT HAVE A PRINCIPLED PRE POLL ALLIANCE AS JDS KARNATAKA VOTERS WOULD NEVER VOTE FOR \" DESH KE TUKDE HONGE INSHAH ALLAH \" ITALIAN MAFIA ...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWHY DID THE KARNATAKA GOVERNOR HELP BJP BY GIVING TWO WEEKS TO YEDURAPPA TO PROVE HIS MAJORITY ON THE FLOOR OF THE HOUSE?\u201d ...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKARNATAKA GOVERNOR VAJUBHAI VALA DID THE RIGHT THING... HE USED THE DISCRETIONARY POWERS VESTED IN HIM BY THE CONSTITUTION TO PRESERVE DHARMA.. HS DECISION WAS SUBJECTIVE.. REASON?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNOT ONE SINGLE JDS VOTER VOTED FOR THE ITALIAN MAFIA...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n.. THE PLACE WAS RAIDED BY POLICE AT NIGHT ON REPORTS OF AN ONGOING SEXUAL ORGY WITH MINORS ( WHICH INCLUDED WHITE RULERS)!<br />\n<br />\nThe next day it was banned by the Govt of Singh-- an this incident was splashed by newspapers .<br />\n<br />\nthis was in British India.<br />\n<br />\nI quote the British newspaper--<br />\n<br />\n###########<br />\nDaily Mail, 13 March 1939 wrote:<br />\n<br />\nFive thousand angry husbands, parents, and guardians yesterday marched on the Sind Government secretariat in protest against the activities of the Om Mandli celibacy cult here.<br />\n<br />\nThe cult has aroused fierce indignation by inducing young girls to refuse to marry and wives to leave their husbands.<br />\n<br />\nA clash seemed inevitable as the march had been banned by the Government.<br />\n<br />\nThe crowd, led by the crippled Hindu leader Vaswani in a wheel chair, came face to face with a cordon of police.<br />\n<br />\nThen the Minster of Public Works, Mr Vazirani, intervened. He gave a written guarantee that the Government would order the cult to discontinue certain practises. The crowd dispersed.<br />\n<br />\n##########################<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://www.brahmakumaris.info/forum/viewtopic.php?f=19&amp;t=2417</span><br />\n<br />\ncheck out this link to see a SCAN of the above report . this is NOT bull.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Lekhraj Khubchand Kripalani was touted by the white invader as an avatar of Shiva .</span><br />\n<br />\nOur R media and waitress sponsored President Pratibha Patil had famously said in 2007 -- she had received a message from Lekhraj Khubchand Kripalani stating that a \u201cgreat responsibility\u201d was headed her way.<br />\n<br />\nDID AN ANGEL DELIVER THIS MESSAGE ?<br />\n<br />\n2 DAYS AGO NARENDRA MODI TOOK IN AROON POORIE, THE BOSS OF HEADLINES TODAY TV ( INDIA TODAY GROUP ) FOR HIS SWACHCH BHARAT CAMPAIGN . HE REPRESENTED HIS SCHOOL IN MATH OLYMPIAD .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MY YOUNGER SON IS JUST THE OPPOSITE.. At Paris COP21\nChitpavan Prakash Javedekar and APCO Modi sold Bharatmata in the kosher mandi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Bilderberg plays a major role in selecting the\npolicymakers in charge of foisting their schemes on an unsuspecting public. In\n1991, for example, a virtually unknown governor from Arkansas attended. Shortly\nafter that, he became President Bill Clinton.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW Obama, too, went to Bilderberg before becoming president&nbsp; though black men are not allowe. . Multiple\nmembers of virtually every U.S. executive branch Cabinet for generations have\nalso attended, including several of President Trump\u2019s top officials, such as\nDefense Secretary James Mattis, Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross, and Energy\nSecretary Rick Perry.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not just American\npoliticians and bureaucrats whose careers seem to get a major boost from\nattending the summits, either. Tony Blair, for example, attended Bilderberg as\na virtually unknown opposition member of Parliament. He then became prime\nminister shortly afterward. Numerous other British prime ministers, including\nDavid Cameron, have also attended.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other countries in Europe have faced similar\noccurrences, such as Bilderberg bigwig and Goldman Sachs operative Mario Monti\nbeing installed as the unelected prime minister of Italy in 2011, shortly after\nattending Bilderberg meetings. More than a few analysts have suggested that\nBilderberg leaders were \u201cvetting\u201d puppet politicians to determine whether they\nwould be a good fit \u2013</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">--AND MORE IMPORTANTLY\nIF THEY WILL PLAY KOSHER BALL</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deep State behind\nthe Deep State has a lot of overlap in terms of membership and leadership.\nBeyond the Bilderberg, CFR, Trilateral, and such establishment organs are other\nsecretive and semi-secret organizations, such as the World Affairs Council, the\nAspen Institute, Le Cercle, the Brookings Institution, the Club of Rome, the\nAtlantic Council, the World Economic Forum, and even the relatively new \u201cWorld\nGovernment Summit\u201d that last year erected the Arch of Baal at its confab in the\nUnited Arab Emirates. Punchamas are the one who does not come under Varna system. They are called as Avarnas.<br />\n<br />\nThass baby was made out to be a gret Sanskrit pandit though he did NOT know a word of Sanskrit. Pali is a Burmese language , it has nothing to do with India..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild got his agent JEW Robert Caesar Childers to convert Pali into an Indian language.. Sorry, Indians are NOT stupid to create a ridiculous language like Pali.</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nChilders baby created the first Pali -English dictionary..He was an expert in Hebrew. He went to Sri Lanka to spread Pali among Buddhists there, giving financial incentives.<br />\n<br />\nChilders baby wrote that The Pali Canon (Tripitaka) means the \"Three Baskets.\" The Three Baskets were first written during the reign of King Ashoka around 250 BCE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">But HEY Ashoka never existed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</span><br />\n<br />\nChilders BASTARD lied that canons of Buddhist literature are based upon first century CE Sanskrit translations of the Pali canon, which are called the \"Tripitaka\" in Sanskrit.<br />\n<br />\nSo now Sanskrit is a LANGOT of Pali \u2013TEE HEEEEE .<br />\n<br />\nGerman JEW Max Muller used JEW Michael Viggo Fausb\u00f6ll a Professor of Sanskrit in Copehnagen to give BULL about Pali . Max Muller would translate Fausboll babys version of the Dhammapada into English. (M\u00fcller in Vol. 10 of the Sacred Books of the East)..<br />\n<br />\nThe Dhammapada ( way of DHARMA ) is a collection of sayings of the Buddha in verse form, most of it injected with perfume to make Buddhism a great religion. Dhammapada was gleaned out of Khuddaka Nikaya . This nikaya consists of fifteen (Thailand), seventeen (Sri Lanka), or eighteen books (Burma) in different editions on various topics attributed to the Buddha\u2014all injected with perfume.<br />\n<br />\nMax Muller used JEW Thomas Rhys Davids , a Rothschild employee in Sri Lanka, to found the Pali text society. Rhys Davids wrote that Britons had a natural, \"racial\" affinity with Buddhist doctrine. TEE HEEE !<br />\n<br />\nRothschild opened out a PALI LANGUAGE DEPT at the University College, London\u2014with Robert Caesar Childers as the first professor. This dept churned out FAKE HISTORY about Emperor Ashoka who never existed. Today the Dept of Pali in JNU sustains this bullshit, with Amartya Sens help..<br />\n<br />\nBR AMBEDKAR MASS CONVERTED LAKHS OF MAHAR DALITS INTO BUDDHISM..<br />\n<br />\nBUT LATER WHEN THESE CONVERT BUDDHISTS FOUND OUT THAT BRAHMIN HATER BR AMBEDKAR MARRIED A CHITPAVAN BRAHMIN WOMAN, THEY PROMPTLY DISCARDED BUDDHISM.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are more than\n61,000 transnational corporations in the world. More than fifty five of the\nlargest one-hundred economies in the world are corporations. Transnational\ncorporations hold 92%&nbsp; of all technology\nand product patents worldwide. Transnational corporations are involved in 73\npercent of world trade.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The top 737 of these\nsuper-corporations or \"super-entities\" control 84% of the world\neconomy.&nbsp; The top 151 super-corporations\nor \"super-entities\" control 43% of the global economy through direct\nand indirect ownership or controlling interest.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds of companies\nown the stocks and bonds of each other - they collectively own themselves.\nHence, it becomes nearly impossible to trace the roots of ownership and\ncontrol. From their relative obscurity, they wield enormous control of national\nand global economies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The global corporatocracy\nis almost fully operational. The intentions of those negotiating the multiple\ntrade treaties are now crystal clear: to place complete power and control over\nour economies in the hands of the largest global corporations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The main driver of this\nchange are the bilateral and multilateral trade and investment treaties being\nnegotiated in complete secrecy and behind closed doors between corporate\nlobbyists, free trade activists and our elected representatives. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate goal of\nthese treaties is to reconfigure the legal apparatus and superstructures that\ngovern national, regional and global trade and business - for the primary, if\nnot exclusive, benefit of the world's largest multinational corporations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The transnational\ncorporations carry on inexorably. Increasingly flagless and stateless, they\nweave global webs of production, commerce, culture and finance virtually\nunopposed. They expand, invest and grow, concentrating ever more wealth in a\nlimited number of hands. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They work in coalition\nto influence local, national and international institutions and laws. And\ntogether with the governments of their home countries in Europe, North America\nand Japan, as well as international institutions such as the World Trade\nOrganization, the World Bank, the International Monetary Fund and increasingly,\nthe United Nations, they are molding an international system in which they can\ntrade and invest even more freely--a world where they are less and less\naccountable to the cultures, communities and nation-states in which they\noperate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Underpinning this\neffort is not the historical inevitability of an evolving, enlightened\ncivilization, but rather the unavoidable reality of the overriding corporate\npurpose: the maximization of profits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modern banking\nsystem manufactures money out of nothing. The process is perhaps the most\nastounding piece of sleight of hand that was ever invented. Banking was\nconceived in inequity and born in sin.&nbsp;\nKOSHER bankers own the earth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take it away from them but leave them the\npower to create money, and, with a flick of a pen, they will create enough\nmoney to buy it back again.&nbsp; But, if you\nwant to continue to be the slaves of bankers and pay the cost of your own\nslavery, then let bankers continue to create money and control credit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SEE WHAT IS HAPPENING\nIN VENEZUELA, IRAN , ZIMBABWE \u2013 THE KOSHER BANKERS WANT REGIME CHANGE ( TO\nINSTALL A JEWISH PUPPET ) SO THAT THEY CAN STEAL.. TILL THEN THEY WILL PUNISH\nTHE PEOPLE BY STARVATION , BY MAKING THEIR CURRENCY WORTHESS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE JEWS AND THEIR\nAGENTS WHO BLED VENEZUELA , FLED WITH THEIR LOOT AND ARE NOW LEADINGAFFLUENT\nLIVES IN FOREIGN NATIONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/29/world/europe/spain-property-boom-venezuela.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/29/world/europe/spain-property-boom-venezuela.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/irans-rial-hits-record-low-100000-to-the-dollar/articleshow/65184766.cms\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/irans-rial-hits-record-low-100000-to-the-dollar/articleshow/65184766.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE DEEP STATE WANTS A\nJEW ON THE IRANIAN THRONE.. SHAH MOHAMMAD REZA PAHLAVI WAS A JEW.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the center of the\ninternational financial system are the banks, asset management firms, oligarchs\nand financial dynasties that together control the network - or cartel - of the\nGlobal Financial Mafia. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This unprecedented\nglobal financial power concentrated in a relatively small list of banks,\ninsurance companies and asset management firms is itself controlled by rich and\npowerful individuals and families: the core constituency of the world of Global\nFinancial Governance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The five veto powers\nand permanent members of the Security Council have corrupted the UN Charter.\nAnd corrupted the work of the UN. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BOTH WORLD WARS WERE\nCONDUCTED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT THE STATE OF ISRAEL.&nbsp;&nbsp; LEAGUE OF NATIONS ( FORERUNNER OF UN ) WAS\nCREATED BY JEW ROTHSHILD IN 1920 TO ASSIST IN CREATION OF THE NATION OF ISRAEL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are told that the\nUnited Nations (UN) is an international organization that aims to facilitate\nco-operation through social progress, economic development, international\nsecurity and international law.&nbsp; They\npromote themselves, and are outwardly promoted as a reputable body that deals\nwith peace, security, development, human rights and humanitarian affairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;With this being the case it\u2019s no surprise to\nsee the UN at the forefront of all international conflict and instability,\nsince these exact events give them the ideal atmosphere to promote themselves\nas bringers of all that shit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The League of Nations\nwas an intergovernmental organization created at the Paris peace conference\nthat ended the First World War. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lionel Nathan Freiherr\nde Rothschild ( 1808 \u2013&nbsp; 1879) son of\nNathan Mayer Rothschild,&nbsp; was the\nfirst&nbsp; Jew to sit as a Member of\nParliament and King George V was his grandson <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King George Vs,&nbsp; father Edward VII was the son of Lionel\nNathan Freiherr de Rothschild and Queen Victoria<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GERMAN JEW Edward VII\nwas the REAL father of Jew Winston Churchill!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Edward VII took\nover the British throne after the death of senile Queen Victoria on 22 January\n1901, Edward VII became King of the United Kingdom, Emperor of India and King\nof the British Dominions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German Jew Rothschild\nhowever, was the REAL king of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Greg Hallett had the\nguts to reveal sordid truths<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Winston Churchill\u2019s\nfather, Queen Victoria\u2019s son, Prince Edward VII, was an illegitimate child of\nincest between Queen Victoria and her own father, Lionel Nathan Rothschild in\nRothschild\u2019s attempt to sire a son by her <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Greg\nHallet, Winston Churchill\u2019s grandfather and great grandfather - were the same\nperson!.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Winston Churchill was\ninvited to become the Prime Minister by his nephew, King George VI - with\nRothschild\u2019s blessings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When King Edward VII\ndied in 1910, Prince George and his wife came to the throne as King George V\nand Queen Mary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Edward VII with\nGerman Jew Rothschild blood in him - was the reason why WW1 took place\u2014 and the\nfoundations for carving out the state of Israel were laid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Windsor name now\nused by Queen Elizabeth II and other British royals only dates back to 1917.\nBefore 1917 the British royal family, of German origin, bore the German name\nSaxe-Coburg-Gotha \u2014 Sachsen-Coburg und Gotha in German.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So on July 17, 1917, to\nhide his German Jew lineage and to prove his loyalty to England, Queen Victoria\u2019s\ngrandson King George V officially declared that - \u201call descendents in the male\nline of Queen Victoria, who are subjects of these realms, other than female\ndescendents who marry or who have married, shall bear the name Windsor.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the king himself,\nwho was a member of the House of Saxe-Coburg-Gotha, changed his own name and\nthat of his wife, Queen Mary, and their children - to Windsor!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">George V's son, George\nVI was the father of Queen Elizabeth II<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Queen Elizabeth II\nconfirmed the royal Windsor name in a declaration following her accession in\n1952. --but in 1960 Queen Elizabeth II and her husband Prince Philip announced\nyet another name change! <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prince Philip of Greece\nand Denmark, whose mother had been Alice of Battenberg, had already Anglicized\nhis name to Philip Mountbatten when he married Elizabeth in 1947.\n(Interestingly, all four of Philip\u2019s sisters, all now deceased, married\nGermans.) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In her 1960 declaration\nto the Privy Council, the Queen expressed her wish (in effect, a command) that\nher children by Philip (other than those in line for the throne) would\nhenceforth bear the hyphenated name Mountbatten-Windsor. For those in line to\nbe potential heirs to the British crown, the royal family\u2019s name remained\nWindsor..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anytime there is global\nconflict, something is created out of that conflict, to give the illusion that\nwhatever is created out of that conflict is a direct solution to that conflict.\nHave you ever thought that the ones who created the conflict, are doing so in\norder to propose the solution?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Lemnitzer's Mafia ties go\nback to his first major command, running the 1944 invasion of Sicily in close\ncooperation with top Mafiosi. He worked with the Cosa Nostra again as head of\nNATO, to build up the Gladio death squads -- as indicated in Cottrell's\nsubtitle, \"the Pentagon-Mafia-Nazi Terror Axis.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Nazi element refers\nto the recruiting of Nazi assets after the war, another Lemnitzer commission<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/if-zionist-jews-created-isis-who.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1965, on Lemnitzer's\nNATO watch, a plot to kill Gen. De Gaulle led to the eviction of NATO HQ from\nParis to Brussels. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1961, when LL and\nJFK first collided, their mutual enmity was apparently common knowledge, as it\nbecame the theme of a best-selling novel in early 1962, \"Seven Days in\nMay.\" JFK himself encouraged the production of the film version<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_19TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3142750512322505957\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_18M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. IT WAS DRAINING MY MOBILE BATTERY BY 30%.<br />\n<br />\nI UNINSTALLED SKYPE ..<br />\n<br />\nI SWITCH ON GOOGLE MAPS LOCATION INDICATOR ONLY WHEN REQUIRED.<br />\n<br />\nThe world\u2019s most popular search engine, Google has created an enormously popular search service with many peripheral platforms (YouTube, Gmail, Google Maps, etc.) used by hundreds of millions of people.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, with this ease of use comes privacy concerns, especially in the realm of data storage, search tracking, and use of personal information.<br />\n<br />\nGoogle definitely tracks all of your search history. If you want to use any of Google\u2019s services, and have those services personalized, you must be signed in with a Google account. Once you are signed in, Google begins actively tracking:<br />\n<br />\nWhat you search for.<br />\nHow you search.<br />\nYour search patterns.<br />\nThe ads you\u2019re interested in.<br />\nWhat links you click.<br />\nWhich images you view.<br />\nWhich videos you watch.<br />\nThis is all detailed in Google\u2019s terms of service, as well as the Google privacy policies.<br />\n<br />\nEvery single time we log onto the Internet, we leave traces of our identity via IP addresses, MAC addresses, and other unique identifiers. In addition, most web browsers, sites, and applications require the user to opt in to the utilization of cookies \u2013 simple software that basically make our web browsing experience more enjoyable, personalized, and efficient.<br />\n<br />\nEven if you\u2019re not logged into Google, there is still a plethora of information you\u2019re making available to Google simply by being online. This information includes:<br />\n<br />\nWhere you are in the world geographically.<br />\nYour IP address.<br />\nInformation about the Google services you use and how you use them based on your activity patterns.<br />\nWhat ads you click and where those ads are located.<br />\nWhat devices you use to access Google services, the internet, and other applications.<br />\nServer information.<br />\nIdentifying information gleaned from your use of partner services.<br />\n<br />\nAll this information is used for targeted (and retargeted) ad placement and search relevancy. It\u2019s also made available to people who own sites that are tracking data via Google\u2019s statistics tool, Google Analytics; they won\u2019t necessarily be able to drill down and see from what neighborhood you\u2019re accessing their site, but other identifying information (device, browser, time of day, approximate geo, time on site, what content is being accessed) will be available.<br />\n<br />\nHere are a few examples of what Google collects from users:<br />\n<br />\nInformation that users give to Google, including personal information such as name, email address, phone number, credit card, and photo.<br />\n<br />\nInformation gleaned from use of Google services, including usage data, personal preferences, emails, photos, videos, browsing history, map searches, spreadsheet and documents, etc.<br />\n<br />\nInformation from the device you are using to access Google and Google services, including hardware model, mobile network information (yes, this includes your phone number), even what operating system you might be using.<br />\n<br />\nServer log information collated from when users are actively using Google services, including search queries, phone information (time and date of calls, types of calls, forwarding numbers, etc.), IP addresses, cookies that are uniquely linked to your web browser or Google account, and device activity information (crashes, what settings are on your hardware, language, etc.).<br />\nLocation information about where you are in the world, including your city, state, neighborhood, and approximate address.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_50MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_50BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_50B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_51B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ARCTIC ICE HAS MELTED DUE TO US FRACKING AND DEEP WATER HORIZON OIL RIG FIRE ( WARM GULF STREAM INFUSED WITH METHANE ) ...</span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;
