font-size: 16px;\"></b><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE HOLE IN THE OZONE LAYER WAS CAUSED BY US NUCLEAR SPACE EXPLOSION \"STARFISH PRIME\" WHICH CREATED AN INNER VAN ALLEN BELT..</span></b></b></div>\n<b style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n</b>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On Juy 9th 1962, the U.S. blew up a hydrogen bomb in outer space, some 250 miles above the Pacific Ocean.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It was a weapons test, but one that created a man-made light show that has never been equaled \u2014 and hopefully never will. This blast was an experiment to prevent Russian incoming missiles from reaching USA.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AMERICA BLAMED CFCs FOR CAUSING THE OZONE LAYER..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Earth is surrounded by belts of high-energy particles \u2014 mainly protons and electrons \u2014 that are held in place by the magnetic fields. Today these radiation belts are called Van Allen belts.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\"Starfish Prime\" literally created an artificial extension of the Van Allen belts that could be seen across the Pacific Ocean, from Hawaii to New Zealand.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">IN INDIA WE DONT CARE FOR ROTHSCHILDs RATING AGENCIES LIKE FITCH/ S&amp;P / MOODYs ETC ANY MORE..&nbsp; &nbsp; WE DONT NEED THESE KOSHER AGENCIES TO MEASURE INDIAN DICK.. WE CAN DO IT OURSELVES..</span></b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html<br /><br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_69BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_84M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_30.html?showComment=1533023468672#c7288595731336587569\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 31, 2018 at 1:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_84MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIN NORTH KERALA THERE ARE HUNDREDS OF ILLEGAL BANGLADESI IMMIGRANTS , ALMOST ALL OF THEM HAVE AADHAR CARDS..<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU ASK THEM WHERE THEY ARE FROM, THEY WILL SAY ASSAM.. THEY HAVE LEARNT MALAYALAM JUST ENOUGH TO NOT AROUSE SUSPICION... THEY ALL HAVE SEVERAL SIM CARDS ..<br />\n<br />\nSOME OF THEM ARE INVOLVED IN GOLD JEWELRY THEFTS ( PLENTIFUL IN KERALA --EVEN SERVANT WOMEN WEAR IT ) AND THEY SELL IT IS MUSLIM PAWN SHOPS.<br />\n<br />\nSOME OF THEM STEAL EXPENSIVE MOBILE PHONES AND SELL IT IN MOBILE REPAIR SHOPS RUN BY MUSLIMS..<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF THE HASSLE INVOLVED IN FILING FIR , MOST WELL TO DO PEOPLE KEEP AWAY FROM POLICE STATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK AJIT DOVALL-- ARE YOUR PEOPLE TRAINED ? .. DO WE HAVE AN INTELLIGENCE DEPT..<br />\n<br />\nSOME YEARS AGO, I NOTICED A FAST FOOD JOINT IN CALICUT HAVING BANGLADESIS.. SINCE I HAVE BEEN TO BENGAL AND BANGLADESH I CAN MAKE OUT THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A MALAYALI AND A BENGALI..JUST BY WATCHING BODY LANGUAGE..<br />\n<br />\nI TOLD MY WIFE \" THIS SHOP IS FULL OF BANGLADESIS \"<br />\n<br />\nSHE SAID \" HOW CAN YOU BE SO SURE ?\"<br />\n<br />\nSO I SANG A BANGLADESI MUSLIM SONG WHICH DENIGRATES KRISHNA AND RADHA ... WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF KRISHNAs SEXUAL PARTNER / MISTRESS RADHA TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME<br />\nTO INDIA...<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SHOKAALE UTHIYOO KAANU, DOH HAATHE DARIYO N</b></span><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">X</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">N</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">X</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">O THAKAAYILOO RAADHAR G</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">X</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">DH</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">X</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">E ---&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nIMMEDIATELY ALL COOKS STOPPED WORK AND PEERED OUT ..<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE WHO HAS BENGALI FRIENDS AND UNDERSTANDS THE LANGUAGE WHISPERED \" ALL ARE BANGLADESIS \"<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT ALLOW ILLEGAL BANGLADESI MUSLIMS/ ROHINGYAS TO VOTE OR OWN LAND/ HOUSE IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nIF THESE ILLEGALS CANNOT VOTE MOMOTO WONT WANT THEM IN BENGAL..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nCEC<br />\nCOL RATHORE<br />\nI&amp;B DEPT<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nSUPREME COURT BAR COUNCIL<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nMEA<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nCMs OF ALL STATES OF INDIA<br />\nALL STATE / CENTRAL MINISTER AND MINISTRIES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES OF INDIA<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nNHRC<br />\nNCM<br />\nNCW MAIN<br />\nNCW STATES<br />\nSWATI MALLIWAL<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nALL 3 ARMED FORCE CHIEFS<br />\nCLOSET COMMIE ARNAB GOSWAMI<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWEBSITES OF DESH BHAKT LEADERS<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW:&nbsp; &nbsp;:&nbsp; ERNST SEIMENS LOUDPEAKERS ON MOSQUES WERE FIRST IMPORTED FROM GERMANY BY ROTHSCHILD TO BE FITTED ON KANPUR MOSQUES&nbsp; -- TO WAKE UP TANNERY MUSLIM WORKERS BEFORE DAWN , TWO YEARS BEFORE WW1 .</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">LEATHER WAS REQUIRED FOR GUN HOLSTERS, BOOTS, BELTS, HORSE SADDLES ETC&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ALL MOSQUES IN TANNERY AREAS WERE BUILT BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">FREE FOOD WAS GIVEN TO CHILDREN OF TANNERY WORKERS IN ADJACENT MADRASSAS, CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHERE MAJOR RIVERS EMPTIED INTO THE SEAS , TANNERIES WERE BUILT--GANGES/ INDUS/ BRAHMAPUTRA ..&nbsp; IN REALITY THESE DOUBLE AGENTS DON\u2019T LIKE TRUMP AT ALL.<br />\n<br />\nAmericans for Prosperity (AFP), was created in 2004, by funded by JEW brothers David H. Koch and Charles Koch.<br />\n<br />\nEight years ago, the Koch brothers' network spent millions to help boost the Tea Party wave.<br />\n<br />\nThe Tea Party movement is an American conservative movement within the Republican Party. The Koch network preaches openness on immigration..<br />\n<br />\nThe long rise of the Tea Party movement was orchestrated, well funded, and deliberate. Its aim was to break Washington.<br />\n<br />\nThe movement's name refers to the Boston Tea Party of December 16, 1773, a watershed event in the launch of the American Revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe 1773 event demonstrated against taxation by the British government without political representation for the American colonists, and references to the Boston Tea Party and even costumes from the 1770s era are commonly heard and seen in the Tea Party movement.<br />\n<br />\nMY LEFT BALL..<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ABOUT OPIUM DRUG RUNNING FREEMASONS WHOSE DESCENDANTS CONTROL THE US DEEP STATE TODAY..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/dirty-secrets-of-boston-tea-party-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDuring 2015 the Koch Network (a network of donors that is organized by the Koch Brothers) spent nearly $400 million to influence politics.<br />\n<br />\nThe billionaire brothers who own Koch Industries, a private company with 70,000 employees and annual revenues of $100bn , used to joke that they controlled the biggest company nobody had ever heard of.Since 1989, Koch Industries has spent more than any other oil and gas company on finding favour in Congress, paying $50m to lobbying firms.<br />\n<br />\nThe Koch Brothers are the Cain and Abel of plutocratic politics. Older brother Charles Koch, age 82, forced his younger sibling\u2019s withdrawal from leadership in both the company and their extensive dark money network that funds political activity.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the 2016 election, they refused to contribute to Trump\u2019s candidacy, noting that they would instead spend their $300 million to prop up Republican candidates in local races.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7021626078600335911\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_108M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PM MODI</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AMITABH KANT</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NITI AYG</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HOME MINISTRY</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">RAJNATH SINGH</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WATER RESOURCES MINISTRY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Tlas51qkD8s/W2BfH7IjNNI/AAAAAAABdMQ/EVSmky_SC6Y3Hd89YZw6WTL1jRlRkP7QgCLcBGAs/s1600/doDwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SjU867fFiG8/W2FsG8rLpZI/AAAAAAABdM4/cPx_LnlWRK4wGta3p-XMnJUJVucgVjBfwCLcBGAs/s1600/mqqullaperiyar-graph-3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"440\" data-original-width=\"845\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SjU867fFiG8/W2FsG8rLpZI/AAAAAAABdM4/cPx_LnlWRK4wGta3p-XMnJUJVucgVjBfwCLcBGAs/s640/mqqullaperiyar-graph-3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bxkLdj7TSxk/W2FsN7Rxl1I/AAAAAAABdM8/MXBQj8RJTiQ03EcnOtLX-GfHZlsOP1jzACLcBGAs/s1600/downcload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"162\" data-original-width=\"311\" height=\"333\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bxkLdj7TSxk/W2FsN7Rxl1I/AAAAAAABdM8/MXBQj8RJTiQ03EcnOtLX-GfHZlsOP1jzACLcBGAs/s640/downcload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>IF MULLAPERIAR DAM BREACHES DUE TO SOLITON WAVE CREATED FROM A OF A HUGE LANDSLIDE OR EARTH QUAKE --&nbsp; IDUKKI DAM CANNOT CONTAIN THE WATER FLOW IMPACT--&nbsp; THOUGH IT HAS&nbsp; ARCH CONVEX SHAPE.</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LoZa8RxClbY/W2FvdNopnVI/AAAAAAABdNg/fz6g-Ctx17ECowW5TpmLx8AdwgfRg1w6ACLcBGAs/s1600/IMGx_2111.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"615\" data-original-width=\"802\" height=\"490\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LoZa8RxClbY/W2FvdNopnVI/AAAAAAABdNg/fz6g-Ctx17ECowW5TpmLx8AdwgfRg1w6ACLcBGAs/s640/IMGx_2111.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Below: CHERUTHONI dam</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A5poNSwPGis/W2Fs2OeTE8I/AAAAAAABdNI/x4d_OUCsByYwOZrIxEVkHMaXsMDQb7U0ACLcBGAs/s1600/Cheeruthoni004.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"512\" data-original-width=\"772\" height=\"424\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-A5poNSwPGis/W2Fs2OeTE8I/AAAAAAABdNI/x4d_OUCsByYwOZrIxEVkHMaXsMDQb7U0ACLcBGAs/s640/Cheeruthoni004.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">The water impounded by\nthese three dams of Idukki, Cheruthoni &amp; Kulamavu has formed a single\nreservoir spread over 60 sq.km on a height of 2300 ft above Mean Sea Level. The\nIdukki Dam is a double curvature arch dam constructed across Periyar River in a\nnarrow gorge between two granite hills and is the tallest double curvature arch\ndam in Asia.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">Cheruthoni Dam is located 1\nkm west of Idukki dam. The spill way of the Idukki Reservoir is in the\nCheruthony dam.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kulamavu Dam was constructed to prevent the\nwater escape through a rivulet called Kilivally, 30 km west to Idukki Arch Dam.\n&nbsp;It is a 100 metres tall Masonry gravity\ndam. &nbsp;Construction of this Cheruthoni\nDam, Idukki Arch Dam and Kulamavu Dam created an artificial lake of 60 km2 and\nthe water stored, is used for production of electricity at the Moolamattom\nPower house. The power house at Moolamattom is the biggest underground power\nstation in India and the pressure shaft is the largest in the country.</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The water used to\ngenerate electricity is taken through underground tunnels, from near the\nKulamavu area, to a underground generator situated at Moolamattam.. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Kerala </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">is heavily dependent on the power generated\nfrom here and still experience power-cuts before the monsoon.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Apart from the spillway\n(overflow) shutter at the Cheruthoni dam and the tunnels that take water to the\ngenerator, there is no way that water can be released suddenly.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The dams are\ndesigned in such a way to hold water permanently till a level. When water\nincreases above the safe level, the usual method is to increase the power\ngeneration by draining water through the tunnels and / or opening the spillway\nof the Cheruthoni dam.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-feppWa1N1Ig/W2Fukn6s5cI/AAAAAAABdNU/SdTRpvnJlfcz-NsFTSrrRCZbfyh6BvbBgCLcBGAs/s1600/dawm%2Btunnel%2B2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"576\" data-original-width=\"802\" height=\"458\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-feppWa1N1Ig/W2Fukn6s5cI/AAAAAAABdNU/SdTRpvnJlfcz-NsFTSrrRCZbfyh6BvbBgCLcBGAs/s640/dawm%2Btunnel%2B2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The landslide generated a wave that ran up 524 m on the opposite shore and sent a 30-m high wave through Lituya Bay.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PVLWLFMr8cw</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA KNEW WHAT A TSUNAMI WAVES WAS TILL THE 2004 , 26th DEC EVENT IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM OF KERALA<br />\nGOVERNOR OF KERALA<br />\nDGP OF KERALA<br />\nIG OF KERALA<br />\nCOLLECTOR OF IDUKKI<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nNITI AYG<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nWATER RESOURCES MINISTRY<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5175991207747934641\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_147M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">August 1, 2018 at 1:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_147MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">MAMATA BANNERJEE IS UNFIT TO BE CM OF BENGAL..<br /><br />WE ASK THE PRESIDENT TO DISMISS HER..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SHE IS WHIPPING UP PASSIONS FOR A BLOODY CIVIL WAR, IF INDIA DOES NOT ALLOW BANGLADESI ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS TO STAY.<br /><br />FOLLOW THE LAW !</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nCM OF WEST BENGAL MAMATA BANNERJEE<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nAJIT DOVAL<br />\nRAJNATH SINGH<br />\nHOME MINISTRY<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNET GENERAL<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nMEA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nNIRMALA SITARAMAN<br />\nDEFENCE MINISTER<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<ol id=\"bc_0_162TB\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_161B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4866404374363730415\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_161M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/07/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_30.html?showComment=1533090886431#c4866404374363730415\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 1, 2018 at 8:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_161MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE THE PEOPLE DEAMND THAT THE STATE GOVT UNDER CM MAMATA BANNERJEE BE DISMISSED IMMEDIATELY.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THERE HAS BEEN HIJACKING OF POLLS BACKED BY VIOLENCE.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE LAST STRAW IS CM MAMATA BANNERJEE THREATEING CIVIL WAR AND BLOOD BATH OVER THE CENTRAL GOVTs MOVE TO CURB ILLEGAL BANGLADESI / ROHINGYA IMMIGRANTS FROM RUNNING OVER THE NATION.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nUnder Article 356 of the Constitution of India, in the event that a state government is unable to function according to constitutional provisions, the Central government can take direct control of the state machinery.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Judiciary has NO powers to interfere with national security under Sec 356. Read this line twice.If the judiciary DELIBERATELY undermines with national security the judiciary can be punished .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn 1989, after the Centre dismissed the SR Bommai government in Karnataka, SC had said the validity of a proclamation for President\u2019s rule can be subjected to judicial review.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE HAVE DEEP STATE OUTETS LIKE THE WIRE ( SIDDHARTH VARADARAJAN ) AND THEPRINT ( SHEKAR GUPTA/ BARKHA DUTT ) SPREADING DISINFORMATION USING LAWYERS LIKE SANJAY HEGDE / PRASHANT BHUSHAN ETC REGULARLY.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://thewire.in/law/the-judiciary-can-stop-the-misuse-of-article-356-if-it-chooses-to-act</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>THE PRESIDENT IS NOT A RUBBER STAMP AS BEEN MADE OUT BY COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY AND BENAMI MEDIA..</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE PRESIDENT IS EXPECTED TO SUSTAIN DHARMA AND HOLD VETO POWERS WHEN IT COMES TO SECURITY OF THE WATAN..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS IS WHY PRESIDENT IS SUPREME COMMANDER OF OUR ARMED FORCES. THIS IS WHY THE PRESIDENT IF AFFORDED <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIndian President is not a ceremonial head, unlike many other countries. The President is the head of Indian State with SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS , while Prime Minister is the head of Indian Government.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAll important decisions regarding the country are taken in the name of Indian President, though most of these will be based on the binding advice given by Council of Ministers(CoM), as per Article 74 of Indian Constitution. But there are certain exceptions, like NATIONAL SECURITY where he can use his discretionary powers.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nUnder article 78 the President enjoys the right to seek information from the PM regarding the administration of the affairs of the union.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTraditionally, the structure of government has been divided into three components:--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n(1) the legislature to make laws;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n(2) the executive to implement laws and</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n(3) the judiciary to interpret laws and administer justice.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">JUDGES CANNOT PLAY GOD USING PIL ROUTE AS IS HAPPENING IN INDIA ..</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Preamble of our Constitution clearly articulates India as a republic. Being a republic there is no hereditary monarch but the President, as the head of the State. The office of the President of India is created by Article 52 of the Constitution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Indian Constitution has only two vesting clauses i.e. Article 53 and Article 154. This project is concerned about Article 53 which clearly states that \u201cthe executive power of the Union shall be vested in the President\u2026\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVested interests using Benami media and DEEP STATE collegium judges have converted the Indian President as a mere figure head, titular head, rubber stamp or golden zero.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President can remove any minister from the Council of ministers of the Parliament, the Governor of any state, the judges of the Supreme Court, High Courts, Election Commissioners, the members of the U.P.S.C.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">The President is the supreme commander-in-chief of the defense force. It is his duty to refrain the state from foreign aggression \u2014and this includes SPONSORED ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION BY STATE GOVERNMENTS TO BOOST THEIR VOTE BANKS.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President is the head to maintain foreign relations. The negotiation of all treaties and agreements are made in the name of the President.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_161BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_161b+seedfEtD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_157TN\"></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TD\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_161b+seedfEtD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_157TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_161b+seedfEtD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_157TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_161b+seedfEtD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_157B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 1, 2018 at 8:06 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_157MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe authority and status of the President depends upon the powers he can exercise and the functions he can perform under and within the express provisions of the Constitution and not by what is now practiced by the President.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">We cannot say that President is a figure head when vast SUBJECTIVE DISCRETIONARY POWERS are afforded to him by the constitution.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe preserver, protector and defender of the Constitution ( OATH ) cannot be a mere figure head.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nI will devote myself to the service and well-being of the people of Republic of India.\u201d But how can a person who is dependent upon the Council of Ministers, devote himself?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPresident can exercise his functions directly without the advice of the council of ministers or others, which is otherwise known as SUBJECTIVE discretionary power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President is independent in performing his functions.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President can only be impeached on one ground i.e. when he acts unconstitutionally. The Procedure for it is very difficult. Two-third majorities of both houses of total membership of Parliament are required to impeach him.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe question here is if the President has no role to play then why should he be impeached? If the President is not responsible to preserve, protect and defend the Constitution and his only job is to sign the bill, how can he be impeached for signing an illegal Bill, which is sent by the Parliament?</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAs in America, the President is totally free to exercise his executive powers, but he cannot make laws, i.e. legislative powers are not vested in him.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN INDIA THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY WHO CAN ONLY INTERPRET LAWS ( AND THAT TOO WHEN INVITED ) IS PLAYING GOD. THE PRESIDENT CAN PUNISH THE JUDICIARY.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe President can issue ordinances when the assembly is not in session.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn America, the President cannot hold officebeyond the period of eight years, but there is no such condition in Indian Constitution. A President can be re-elected after second term in India. The President of America has not been given the power to dissolvethe Congress, but Art. 85 (2) (b) of Indian Constitution gives the power to Indian President to dissolve the House of People.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe King of England reigns but does not rule. The President of India is adorned with more power in comparison to UK and USA</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES\u2014WHOEVER SITS ON THE INDIAN PRESIDENTs CHAIR MUST KNOW HIS POWERS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CHAIR OF THE PRESIDENT IS NOT LIKE A SARPANCH, AS WAS DEMONSTRATED BY A DISGRACE T INDIA , MADAME PURAN POLI.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/07/indias-worst-president-ever-so-what-she.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBUT PURAN POLI IS NOT THE WORST.THE WORST IS PRANAB MUKHERJEE WHO ALLOWED ENTIRE PARLIAMENT SESSIONSTO BE WASHED OUT, WHILE HE WALKED ON THE PRESIDENTIAL LAWNS EATING MISTI DOHI AND SIPPING MACHER JHOL.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px; text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">PRESIDENT PRANAB MUKHERJEE DID NOT KNOW THE POWERS OF HIS PRESIDENTIAL CHAIR\u2026 PRANAB MUKHERJEE ALLOWED THE ITALIAN WAITRESS TURNED EMPRESS TO RULE INDIA VIA AN UNCONSTITUTIONAL </span><span style=\"color: red;\">NAC</span><span style=\"color: magenta;\">\u2026</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWe the people demand that the Modi govt must make public all files related to the Sonia Gandhi-led National Advisory Council- and give documentary evidence that the Italian waitress turned empress ran the UPA regime by proxy, eroding the authority of prime minister's office and undermining the provisions of the Indian Constitution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe NAC members were hand picked by the Italian waitress \u2014 a bunch of handpicked, unelected, Utopian leftist economist, rights activists and socialist intellectuals , all rabidly ANTI-HINDU \u2014 they bypassed the elected Executive and the Legislature..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAn ILLEGAL extra-Constitutional body framed bad DESH DROHI and ANTI-HINDU policies which the elected government was forced to implement by the UNACCOUNTABLE proxy Italian waitress PM .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSONIA GANDHI MUST GO TO JAIL FOR SUBVERTING THE CONSTITUTION BY FORCING A ILLEGAL SUPER CABINET \" TO UNDERMINE THE REAL ELECTED PEOPLEs CABINET .. IN ANY OTHER NATION THIS WOMAN WOULD BE HUNG FOR TREASON ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_157MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_157BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_157B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_158B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9169558100881831597\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_158M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DEEP STATE Project MKUltra, also called the\nCIA <b style=\"background-color: white;\">mind control program</b>, is the code name given to a program of experiments on\nhuman subjects that were designed and undertaken by the United States Central\nIntelligence Agency\u2014which were illegal. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Experiments on humans were intended to\nidentify and develop drugs and procedures to be used in interrogations in order\nto weaken the individual and force confessions through mind control. The\nproject was organized through the Office of Scientific Intelligence of the CIA\nand coordinated with the U.S. Army Biological Warfare Laboratories.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Martin Luther King Jr\u2019s speck I HAVE A DREAM was written by the Tavistock institute.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Martin Luther King Jr &nbsp;used the phrase 'I have a dream' eight times in his address to about 2,000 people at Booker T. Washington High School in Rocky Mount, eight months before electrifying the nation with a much touted extempore speech &nbsp;at the March on Washington.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr King was awarded the\nNobel Peace Prize in Oslo, Norway on 10 December, 1964.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In presenting the\naward, the Nobel Committee Chairman stated that he was \"<span style=\"color: blue;\">the first person\nin the Western world to have shown us that a struggle can be waged without\nviolence</span>. He is the first to make the message of brotherly love a reality in\nthe course of his struggle..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dr King accepted the award on behalf of the\nthousands of participants in the Civil Rights Movement, whom he described as a\n\"mighty army of love\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
