, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\naim of the DEEP STATE ultimate control over future life on this planet, a\nsupremacy earlier dictators and despots only ever dreamt of..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rothschild-controlled\nBarings Bank bankrolled the Chinese opium and African slave trades. It financed\nthe Louisiana Purchase. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At the\ntime of the Louisiana Purchase, the thirteen Colonies had around seven million\ndollars in revenues and were already running a 3.2 million dollar deficit. Like\nall governments, and especially because they didn\u2019t yet collect taxes, they had\nno choice but to go to the First Bank of the United States to get the bankers\u2019\nOK. That was the bank opened by Robert Morris and Alexander Hamilton,\nRothschild\u2019s bank.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When\nCongress offered to pay ten million dollars for the port of New Orleans, for\nthat\u2019s all they wanted, to everyone\u2019s surprise, Napoleon sweetened the deal by\nthrowing in at no extra charge all of the French possessions in Louisiana,\nincluding a good chunk of Rupert\u2019s Land that makes up today\u2019s Canadian Prairie\nProvinces. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That\nwas, indeed, a mind-boggling offer and though Congress couldn\u2019t believe its\nluck, it didn\u2019t bother to question this \u2018divine\u2019 act. Moreover, in 1867, all of\nRupert\u2019s Land was given to Canada without a fight. It just seems that the\nstraight line represented by the 49th parallel was drawn by another \u2018divine\u2019\npower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Of\ncourse, this \u2018divine\u2019 intervention can easily be explained. &nbsp;The First Bank of the United States was a\nRothschild bank. And in Europe, because the Rothschilds were by now in charge\nof the Bank of England and were financing the Napoleonic Wars, Rothschild controlled\nJEW Napoleon.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nLouisiana Purchase had to have been an in-family Rothschild transatlantic\noperation. &nbsp;Rothschild main concern at\nthat time had to be the opening of the West, and because that couldn\u2019t happen\nuntil the Louisiana Purchase was completed.. Rothschild used Napoleon to make\nCongress an offer that it couldn\u2019t refuse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1804, Alexander Hamilton, US finance minister and aristocrat during President\nThomas Jefferson, coerced Congress to sign a charter with the Rothschild\nfinancier family to print US currencies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\ndecision came as a price for England loaning Jefferson the necessary money to\npurchase the Louisiana Territory (all the States bordering the Mississippi\nRiver) from Napoleon Bonaparte in 1803.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1811, the charter for the Rothschild family owned the first Bank of the United\nStates and managed to be in control of the US money supply. This control\nexpired and the US Congress voted against the renewal of the charter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Andrew\nJackson, later the 7th President of the US from 1829 to 1837, said:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cIf\nthe US Congress has a right under the US Constitution to issue paper money, it\nwas given them to use by themselves, not to be delegated to individuals or\ncorporations.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nathan\nMayer Rothschild was pissed off and he warned: &nbsp;&nbsp;\u201cEither the application for renewal of the\ncharter for the bank is granted, or the United States will find itself involved\nin a most disastrous war.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Andrew\nJackson\u2019s response to this was \u201cYou are a den of thieves vipers, and I intend\nto rout you out, and by the Eternal God, I will rout you out.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nathan\nMayer Rothschild replied:&nbsp; \u201cTeach those\nimpudent Americans a lesson. Bring them back to colonial status.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1812, backed by the Rothschild\u2019s money, the British declared war on the United\nStates, entered the Capital Washington and set fire on it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nRothschild\u2019s plan was to cause the United States to build up such a debt in\nfighting this war that they would have to surrender to the Rothschild family\nand allow the charter to be renewed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1816, during President James Monroe, the charter for the Bank of the United\nStates was renewed for another 20 years and the&nbsp;\nRothschild recovered the Control of the US money supply again.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nBritish war against the USA therefore ended with the deaths of thousands of\nBritish and US soldiers, but the Rothschild\u2019s got their bank.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1819, the Bank cut-off all credits to the settlers in Ohio and the North-West\nterritory and generated the first big financial crisis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1861, President Abraham Lincoln (16th President of the US from 1860 till his\nassassination in 1865) approached &nbsp;Rothschild to try to obtain loans to support\nthe ongoing American civil war. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rothschild\u2019s\nagreed, provided President Abraham Lincoln allows them a Charter for another US\ncentral bank, at interest of 24% to 36% on all monies loaned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">President\nAbraham Lincoln was very angry about this high interest rate and so his\ngovernment printed its own debt free money and informed the public that this\nwas now legal tender for both public and private debts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By\nApril 1862, $450 million worth of President Abraham Lincoln\u2019s debt free money\nhad been printed by the US government and distributed. Lincoln stated:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cWe\ngave the people of this republic the greatest blessing they ever had, their own\npaper money to pay their own debts.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">That\nsame year, The Times of London publishes a story containing the following\nstatement:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cIf\nthat mischievous financial policy, which had its origin in the North American\nRepublic, should be become indurated down (be rooted) to a fixture North-West\nterritory, then that government will furnish its own money without cost. It\nwill pay off debts and be without a debt. It will have all the money necessary\nto carry on its commerce. It will become prosperous beyond precedent in the\nhistory of civilized governments of the world.&nbsp;\nThe brains and the wealth of all countries will go to North America.\nThat US government must be destroyed or it will destroy every monarchy on the\nglobe.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1863, &nbsp;Rothschild &nbsp;used John D. Rockefeller, one of their agents\nin America, to form an oil business called \u201cStandard Oil\u201c, which eventually\ntook over all of its competition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1864, President Abraham Lincoln discovered that the Tsar of Russia, Alexander\nII (1855 \u2013 1881), was having problems with the Rothschild\u2019s for refusing their\ncontinual attempts to set up a central bank in Russia.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;President Lincoln asked the Tsar for help in\nthe Civil War and the Tsar sent part of his fleet to anchor off New York and\nthe other part off California.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nTsar made it clear to the British, French and Spanish that if they attacked\neither side, Russia would take the side of President Lincoln. Lincoln\nsubsequently won the Civil War.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">ROTHSCHILD\nWOULD HAVE HIS REVENGE .. &nbsp;&nbsp;HE WOULD\nMURDER THE RUSSIAN ROYALTY AND TAKE OVER RUSSIA BY A BLOODY REVOLUTION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/07/exhuming-dirty-secrets-of-holodomor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1865, in an a statement to Congress, President Abraham Lincoln stated,&nbsp; \u201cI have two great enemies, the Southern Army\nin front of me, and the financial institution in the rear. Of the two, the one\nin my rear is my greatest foe.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Later\nthat year, President Lincoln would be assassinated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The US\nFederal Reserve, an owned private institution, was created on December 23,\n1913.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was\nplanned at a secret meeting in 1910 on Jekyll Island, Georgia, by a group of\nZionist bankers and politicians. The power to print money was transferred from\nthe US Government to a private group of Zionist bankers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nFederal Reserve Act is hastily passed just before the 1913 Christmas break.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Congressman\nCharles A. Lindbergh Sr. warned: \u201cThis act establishes the most gigantic trust\non earth. When the President signs this act the invisible government by the\nmoney power, proven to exist by the Money Trust Investigation, will be\nlegalized.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">US\nPresident John F. Kennedy planned to terminate the privately owned Federal\nReserve System. In 1963, he signed Executive Orders EO-11 and EO-110, returning\nto the government the responsibility to print money, taking that privilege away\nfrom the Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shortly\nthereafter, President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Another\nmyth that all Americans live with is the charade known as the \u201cFederal\nReserve.\u201d It comes as a shock to many to discover that it is not an agency of\nthe United States Government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nname \u201cFederal Reserve Bank\u201d is not federal, nor is it owned by the government.\nIt is privately owned.&nbsp; Its employees are\nnot in civil service. Its physical property is held under private deeds, and is\nsubject to local taxation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is\nan engine that has created private wealth that is unimaginable, even to the\nmost financially sophisticated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It has\nenabled an imperial elite to manipulate US economy for its own agenda and\nenlisted the US government itself as its enforcer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Federal\nReserve Bank controls the times, dictates business, affects Americans\u2019 homes\nand practically everything in which Americans are interested.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\ntakes powerful force to maintain an empire, and this one is no different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nconcerns of the leadership of the \u201cFederal Reserve\u201d and its secretive\ninternational benefactors appear to go well beyond currency and interest rates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Alan\nGreenspan, served as Chairman of the Federal Reserve from 1987 to 2006, stated\nat the annual Dinner and Francis Boyer Lecture of The American Enterprise\nInstitute for Public Policy Research on December 5, 1996:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cAugmenting\nconcerns about the Federal Reserve is the perception that we are a secretive\norganization, operating behind closed doors, not always in the interests of the\nnation as a whole. This is regrettable, and we continuously strive to alter\nthis misperception.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nprivately owned Federal Reserve has confused the public, lied to them and stole\ntheir gold and silver.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All\nthe perplexities, confusion and distress in America arise, not from defects of\nthe Constitution, not from want of honor or virtue, so much as from downright\nignorance of the nature of coin, credit and circulation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Of all\nthe contrivances devised for cheating the laboring classes of mankind, none has\nbeen more effective than that which deludes him with paper money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After\nmany years of blundering toward it, and only a few months before the beginning\nof the World War 1, Rothschild found the formula for the most efficient credit\nmachine that was ever invented. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nwas the Federal Reserve System.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/great-american-depression-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/great-american-depression-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/worth-more-than-sum-total-of-entire.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/worth-more-than-sum-total-of-entire.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most\npeople are unsure of the meanings of words such as money, dollar, wealth,\ninflation and credit. The average person would be very surprised if they knew\nhow the money system used to work compared to how it operates now.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nessence of psychological warfare is to confuse the meaning of words, and\ninfiltrate the mind with conflicting concepts. The use of the word Federal in\nthe name federal Reserve leads the public to believe that the Federal Reserve\nis a government institution, when it is really a private corporation owned by\nforeign and domestic banks and operated for profit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nFederal Reserve controls America\u2019s money supply and interest rates, and there\nby manipulates the entire economy, in violation of--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">1.\nArticle 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution that expressly charges\nCongress with power to coin money and regulate the value thereof, and.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2.\nArticle 1, Section 10 of the constitution says \u201cNo State shall make any thing\nbut gold and silver Coin a Tender in payment of Debts.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Over\ntime, gold and silver coins were removed from American money supply and removed\nas backing for American paper currency and replaced with debt (or credit).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ndefinition of dollar has changed to hide the fact that a dollar is not money,\nbut a unit of measurement for gold and silver coin. For example:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">1.\nTitle 12 United States Code Section 152 says: \u201cThe terms lawful money or lawful\nmoney of the United States shall be construed to mean gold or silver coin of\nthe United Sates.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2.\nTitle 31 United States Code, Section 5101 says: \u201cThe money of account of the\nUnited States shall be expressed in dollars.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nrecent equivalent to the goldsmith\u2019s receipt for gold is the Federal Reserve\nNote. The word \u201cFederal\u201d implies Federal government, but the Federal Reserve is\na privately owned corporation. The word \u201cReserve\u201d implies that something gives\nthe paper receipt value, but no gold or silver backs this paper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nword \u201cNote\u201d implies a contract, because legally a note must state who is\npaying, what is being paid, to whom and when.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most\npeople say something like, \u201cI have a dollar bill\u201d. But what is a bill?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A bill\nis a receipt of a debt owed by one person or company to another. Therefore, a\n\u201cdollar bill\u201d is a receipt (or bill) of debt of one dollar that is owed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">From\n1914 to 1963, Federal Reserve Notes never claimed to be money, nor did they\nclaim to be dollars. A note for five dollars read: \u201cThe United States of\nAmerica will pay to the bearer on demand five dollars.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">How\ncan a promise to pay five dollars be five dollars?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To the\nleft of the President\u2019s picture and above the bank seal, it said: \u201cThis note is\nlegal tender for all debts public and private, and is redeemable in lawful\nmoney at the United States Treasury or at any Federal Reserve Bank.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1963, the Federal Reserve began to issue its first series of notes without the\npromise, while taking notes with the promise out of circulation. How can paper\nbecome what it promises by removing the promise?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">To the\nleft of the President\u2019s picture and above the bank seal, it now read: \u201cThis\nnote is legal tender for all debts public and private.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A note\nis a proof of debt. It is not possible to pay off a debt with a debt. No debt\ncan be paid in full unless paid in gold or silver, coined and regulated in value\nby Congress. The name \u201cFederal Reserve Note\u201d is a fraudulent label since each\nword claims to be something that in reality it is not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By\nremoving the promise to redeem the note in lawful money, the Federal Government\nin cooperation with the Federal Reserve, eliminated the monetary system of the\nUnited States as established by the Constitution and replaced it with something\ntotally different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If you\nare holding a one dollar Federal Reserve Note, the question is: \u201cwhat is it one\ndollar of?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nanswer is absolutely nothing. The number one measures no substance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nonly thing that give paper money value is the confidence people have in it as\nis stated in chapter 30 of our textbook.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Federal\nReserve Notes are only accepted because people believe they have value.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WHAT\nDOES WIKIPEDIA SAY ABOUT THE LOUSIANA PUCRCHASE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; The Louisiana Purchase (French: Vente de la\nLouisiane \"Sale of Louisiana\") was the acquisition of the Louisiana\nterritory (828,000 square miles or 2.14 million km\u00b2) by the United States from\nFrance in 1803. The U.S. paid fifty million francs ($11,250,000) and a\ncancellation of debts worth eighteen million francs ($3,750,000) for a total of\nsixty-eight million francs ($15 million, equivalent to $573 billion in\n2016).[1] The Louisiana territory included land from fifteen present U.S.\nstates and two Canadian provinces. The territory contained land that forms\nArkansas, Missouri, Iowa, Oklahoma, Kansas, and Nebraska; the portion of\nMinnesota west of the Mississippi River; a large portion of North Dakota; a\nlarge portion of South Dakota; the northeastern section of New Mexico; the\nnorthern portion of Texas; the area of Montana, Wyoming, and Colorado east of\nthe Continental Divide; Louisiana west of the Mississippi River (plus New\nOrleans); and small portions of land within the present Canadian provinces of\nAlberta and Saskatchewan. Its non-native population was around 60,000\ninhabitants, of whom half were African slaves.[2]&nbsp; UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nKingdom of France controlled the Louisiana territory from 1699 until it was\nceded to Spain in 1762. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\n1800, Napoleon, then the First Consul of the French Republic, hoping to\nre-establish an empire in North America, regained ownership of Louisiana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">However,\nFrance's failure to put down the revolt in Saint-Domingue, coupled with the\nprospect of renewed warfare with the United Kingdom, prompted Napoleon to sell\nLouisiana to the United States to fund his military. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nAmericans originally sought to purchase only the port city of New Orleans and\nits adjacent coastal lands, but quickly accepted the bargain. The Louisiana\nPurchase occurred during the term of the third President of the United States,\nThomas Jefferson. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Before\nthe purchase was finalized, the decision faced Federalist Party opposition;\nthey argued that it was unconstitutional to acquire any territory. Jefferson\nagreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain explicit provisions for acquiring\nterritory, but he asserted that his constitutional power to negotiate treaties\nwas sufficient.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nHouse of Rothschild financed the Prussian War, the Crimean War and the British\nattempt to seize the Suez Canal from the French. Nathan Rothschild made a huge\nfinancial bet on Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo, while also funding the\nDuke of Wellington's peninsular campaign against <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/britannia-did-not-rule-waves-and-this.html\">&nbsp;http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/02/britannia-did-not-rule-waves-and-this.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ndivision of the United States into federations of equal force [The North &amp;\nThe South] was decided long before the Civil War by JEW Rothschild. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">France\nwas to take over the whole South while Canada annexed the defeated North. In\n1863 France and Spain invaded Mexico with 30,000 troops. The embattled\nConfederate States actually offered Louisiana and Texas to France in exchange\nfor assistance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BUT\nHEY, WHAT BULLSHIT DOES&nbsp; ENCYCLOPEDIA\nBRITTANICA GIVE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; American Civil War, also called War Between\nthe States, four-year war (1861\u201365) between the United States and 11 Southern\nstates that seceded from the Union and formed the Confederate States of\nAmerica. The secession of the Southern states (in chronological order, South\nCarolina, Mississippi, Florida, Alabama, Georgia, Louisiana, Texas, Virginia,\nArkansas, Tennessee, and North Carolina) in 1860\u201361 and the ensuing outbreak of\narmed hostilities were the culmination of decades of growing sectional friction\nover slavery. Rather than invest in factories or railroads as Northerners had\ndone, Southerners invested their money in slaves UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By the\nyear 1800 there were more than&nbsp; 2,150\nJews in South Carolina (overwhelmingly Sephardic and settled in Charleston),\nwhich was more than in any other U.S. state at that time, and more than any\nother town, city, or place in North America. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Charleston\nremained the unofficial capital of North American Jewry until about 1830, when\nthe increasing number of Ashkenazi German Jews emigrating to America largely\nsettled in New Orleans, Richmond, Savannah, Baltimore, and the north-east\n(particularly in Philadelphia and New York City), eventually surpassing the\nmostly Sephardic Jewish community in Charleston.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Among\nthe founders of Richmond, Virginia's Jewish community were men such as Israel\nand Jacob I. Cohen, Samuel Myers, Jacob Modecai, Solomon Jacobs, Joseph Marx,\nZalma Rehine, and Baruch and Manuel Judah, all slave holders. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Following\nthe Revolutionary War, Richmond was a town of some 2200 people, half of whom\nwere slaves. By 1788, 18% of the White population were Jews and all but one of\nthe Jewish householders held at least one slave as a domestic servant, by 1820\n\"over 81 percent of all Jewish families in Charleston, Richmond, and\nSavannah owned slaves, employed as domestic servants; almost 53 percent of all\nJewish households in the United States owned one slave or more\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While\nimporting and selling African slaves in the New World proved to be a highly\nprofitable endeavor, it was their labor that enabled owners of large\nplantations in the Southern states to raise and harvest vast quantities of\nvaluable crops such as cotton, tobacco, sugar, rice, and indigo which Jewish\nmerchants brokered at wholesale prices, shipping them overseas where they were\nsold at a high markup. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nJews would then purchase, at wholesale cost. Cargoes of luxury goods from the\nmarkets of Europe for import back to the New World where they would sell them\nto American consumers through a retail network of Jewish merchants and\ndistributors all along the ports of the east coast and the Gulf of Mexico. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For\nthe slave-owners and the Jewish brokers and merchants whose wealth was built on\nthe agricultural products raised on Southern plantations, breaking away from\nthe Union made economic sense if it meant that they could continue to expand\nand perpetuate the system of slave labor in new territories<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">154\nslaves, were owned by the widow JEW C. Richards and her son P.C. Richards, who\nowned a large sugar cane plantation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">For\nthe North, the loss of the financial capital resulting from Southern secession\nwould have been a devastating economic disaster that it was willing to fight a\nwar to prevent. It was the irreconcilable differences over this controversy\nbetween the manufacturing industry of the North and the agricultural based\neconomy of the slave-holding South that encouraged the Jews to once again fan\nthe flames of war on American soil, just as they had done between competing kingdoms\nin Europe for centuries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">While\nJews in the Southern states largely concerned themselves with trading and\nretail, Jews living in the industrial states of the North such as Marcus\nGoldman, found their way into banking, money-lending and buying, selling and\ntrading shares of interest in corporations built by gentiles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Next\nthe bankers had to create an organization that could promote secession amongst\nthe southern states so that they would divide themselves away from the federal\ngovernment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lincoln\nwas receiving great pressure from&nbsp;\nRotshchild\u2019s banking establishment to float interest-bearing loans to\npay the costs of the war.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Abraham\nLincoln decided not to borrow money from the bankers nor to create interest\nbearing money.&nbsp; Lincoln issued the\n\u201cGreenback\u201d in February, 1862 not only unbacked by gold, but was debt free<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lincoln\nhad crossed the international bankers. The war was being fought to force the\nUnited States into a position of having to create a national bank, run\nindependently by the European bankers (London City), and Lincoln had turned his\nback on them by issuing his own Fiat Money.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lincoln\nhad to go\u2014he&nbsp; was shot by John Wilkes\nBooth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Britain\nand France were ready to snuff out the young republic but were deterred by\nRussia, the only European power not in the Rothschild\u2019s thrall. Czar Alexander\nII sent his fleets to New York and San Francisco and declared that an attack on\nLincoln would be an attack on Russia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Meanwhile\nLincoln created \u201cgreenback\u201d dollars to finance the war and escape indebtedness\nto the foreign financiers. \u201cThey understood at once that the United States\nwould escape their grip,\u201d Bismarck said. \u201cThe death of Lincoln was resolved\nupon. Nothing is easier than to find a fanatic to strike.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">American\nCivil War, also called War Between the States, four-year war (1861\u201365) between\nthe United States and 11 Southern states that seceded from the Union and formed\nthe Confederate States of America.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The\nname \"Rothschild\" cannot be found in the publication's list of the\n500 wealthiest people on Earth <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nRothschilds are thought to control the Bank of England, the European Central\nBank, the Federal Reserve, the World Bank, the International Monetary Fund and\nthe Bank of International Settlements. They own most of the world's gold and\nthe London Gold Exchange.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The\nRothschild cabal have infiltrated your government, your media, your banking\ninstitutions. They are no longer content with committing atrocities in the\nMiddle East, they are now doing it on their own soil (Europe), desperate to\ncomplete the plan for a one world government, world army, complete with a world\ncentral bank.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Russian\nPresident Vadimir Putin - to a Kremlin tour group, 2017<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"London's\ninner city is a privately owned corporation or city state, located right in the\nmiddle of greater London. Today, the City State of London is the world's\nfinancial power centre &amp; the wealthiest square mile on the face of the\nEarth. It houses the Rothschild controlled Bank of England, Lloyds of London,\nthe London stock exchange, all British banks, the branch offices of 385 foreign\nbanks &amp; 70 US banks. It has its own courts, its own laws, its own flag\n&amp; its own police force. It is not part of greater London, or England, or\nthe British Commonwealth, &amp; pays no taxes. It is the headquarters for the world\nwide money cartel known as The Crown.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"WaIl\nStreet financed the German cartels in the mid-1920s which in turn proceeded to\nbring JEW Hitler to power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"New\nYork and London ... have become the world's two biggest laundries of criminal\nand drug money, and offshore tax havens. Not the Cayman Islands, not the Isle\nof Man or Jersey. The big laundering is right through the City of London and\nWall Street.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The\npowers of financial capitalism had a far-reaching aim - nothing less than to\ncreate a world system of financial control in private hands able to dominate\nthe political system of each country and the economy of the world as a whole.\nThis <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"Most\nnations do not have control over their own currencies. Instead privately owned,\nfor-profit central banks - such as the Federal Reserve System in the US -\ncreate money out of nothing and then loan it at interest to their respective\ngovernments. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Not\nonly do the central banks have the power to create money for free, they also\nhave the power to set interest rates, to decide how much credit is issued, and\nto decide how much money is put into circulation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">With\nthis power, central banks can - and do - orchestrate boom and bust cycles,\nenabling the super-wealthy owners of the banks to profit from investments\nduring the booms, and buy up assets at bargain prices during the busts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">...\nThe most profitable of all central bank activities has been the financing of\nmajor wars, particularly the two World Wars. When nations are engaged in\nwarfare, with their very survival at stake, the governments stretch their\nresources to the limit in the competition to prevail. The struggle to get more\nfinancing becomes as important as the competition on the battlefield.\nMoneylenders love a desperate borrower, and vast fortunes have been made by extending\ncredit to both sides in conflicts: the longer a war continues, the more profit\nfor the central bankers.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The\nprivate issuance of a nation's money has given tremendous power to central\nbankers, a power so great that even democratically elected governments are\nsubservient to them. Governments are not in control of the economy; it is the\nall-powerful central bankers who create the money, determine interest rates,\nand decide who gets loans and who doesn't.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BALLS\nTO MESSIAH OF BLACKS MARTIN LUTHER KING JR AND HIS BOSS JEW ROTHSCHILD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; I HAVE READ LENGTHY PAST JUDGEMENTS OF SUPREME COURT JUDGES , ONE EVEN QUOTING SIGMUND FREUD TO SOUND LIKE AN INTELLECTAUL\u2026.AND I AM APPALLED ..<br />\n<br />\nMIND YOU, THESE MINDLESS JUDGEMENTS MADE UNDER THE SYSTEM OF \u201cJUSTICE IS BLIND\u201d SANS CONTEXT AND SUBJECTIVE DHARMA ARE BEING USED AS A LANGOT TO THE CONSTITUTION\u2026<br />\n<br />\nMY FINAL EVALUATION?... WE NEED TO SELECT JUDGES BY AN ALL INDIA EXAM LIKE IIT /IAS..<br />\n<br />\nMOST OF OUR JUDGES ARE ENGAGED IN MERE ACTIVITY TRAPS.. AN EXAMPLE? .. THIS IS NOT ALLOWED BY OUR CONSTITUTION.. INDIA IS THE ONLY NATION WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES..<br />\n<br />\nLAWYER TURNED JUDGES WHO CANNOT THINK BEYOND THE OBJECTIVE, ARE THE BANE OF INDIAN JUDICIAL SYSTEM\u2026 THEY CANT TAKE FAST DECISIONS.. The theology of the Brahmo Samaj was called \"neo-Vedanta\" by Christian commentators.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s agent Keshub Chandra Sen, a Christian convert controlled his nephew Vivekananda and had him enrolled in his Nava Vidhan ( Nobobidhan ).<br />\n<br />\nKeshab Chandra Sen and Vivekananda incorporated Christian theology within the framework of Hindu thought.<br />\n<br />\nKeshab Chandra Sen was Secretary to the Goodwill Fraternity, Masonic lodge associated with the Unitarian Rev.Charles Dall and a Christian missionary Rev. James Long .<br />\n<br />\nWith them Sen establish a TRAITOR \"British Indian Association\" filled with Bhadaraloks , Pir Ali \u201cbrahmins\u201d , white people and Anglo Indians ( RAPE PRODUCTS OF WHITE MAN AND THEIR MAID SERVANTS ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn 1866 Sen delivered an address on Jesus Christ, Europe and Asia, in which he proclaimed that \"India would be for Christ alone who already stalks the land\"<br />\n<br />\nVivekananda was a member of a Freemasonry lodge in 1883.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild published ( 1896 ) and propagated Vivekananda\u2019s book Raja Yoga.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild send Swami Vivekananda on his ship to represent Hinduism at the Parliament of Religions at Chicago on September 11th, 1893.<br />\n<br />\nFor the next three years Vivekananda would be shown to several western doctors in USA , England and Europe to treat his terrible diseases\u2014and all the while he lectured too.<br />\nRothschild gave Narendra his new name Swami Vivekananda just before he boarded his ship in May 1893.<br />\n<br />\nCOMMIE AGNIVESH IS ALSO SWAMI.<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA IS GUILTY OF ALLOWING HINDUISM TO BE BRANDED AS FULL OF SUPERSTITION \u2014 WHEN THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SUPERSTITION , OTHER THAN WHAT HIS MASTER ROTHSCHILD INJECTED- USING HIS FAKE CREATIONS AND FAKE MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILDs MEDIA PROPPED HIM UP<br />\n<br />\nVIVEKANANDA HAD VERY LITTLE PRANA WITHIN AND SUFFERED FROM 33 MAJOR ILLNESSES. LOT OF THIS MONEY WENT INTO THE FUNDS OF \" POPEs HUSH MONEY \" ( PEDOPHILE SEX OF CLERGY PAY OFFS )<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/diabolical-ministering-angel-mother.html</span><br /><br />95% OF THE CHILD VICTIMS PARENTS CHOSE HUSH MONEY ..<br /><br />There has been a culture of denial and secrecy that has prevented allegations from being fully investigated.<br /><br />A 1962 Vatican document instructed bishops to observe the strictest secrecy in sexual abuse cases and to address sexual abuse, or \u201csolicitation,\u201d as an internal church matter, not as an offense that should be reported to local authorities.<br /><br />Despite establishing a commission to look into the problem and address a backlog of cases, Pope Francis has still not established any protocol for handling sex abuse allegations for the Catholic Church as a whole. The Pope is more worried about the reputation of the church..<br /><br />ONCE AS A YOUNG MAN 38 YEARS AGO, I STAYED IN VATICAN FOR 3 DAYS IN A SEMINARY - CASA PAOLTTI BY THE BANKS OF THE RIVER TIBER . MY GOAN PURSER WHOSE BROTHER WAS A PRIEST IN VATICAN, HE WAS WITH ME.. WE HAD FREE FOOD AND LODGING -- NICE SPACIOUS CLEAN..<br /><br />THE WORD SPREAD AND SOME EXCITED MALAYALI NUNS CAME RUNNING TO SEE ME.. ALL PRETTY.. I WAS SURPRISED AS KERALA NUNS ARE ALL FUCKIN' BALLS TO LOOK AT.<br /><br />ONE NUN TOLD ME ABOUT THE RAMPANT SEXUAL ABUSE.. SHE WAS BEING ABUSED BY BOTH PRIESTS AND NUNS..<br /><br />IT WAS ALMOST AS IF SHE WAS A SEX SLAVE AND EXPECTED ME TO DO SOMETHING..<br /><br />I HAVE DONE MY PART IN THE PRE-INTERNET DAYS USING WHITE CLERGY IN BRITAIN.. SO I DONT HAVE A GUILTY CONSCIENCE ABOUT THIS.. MY DECISION TO START BLOGGING TO EXHUME BURIED TRUTHS HAS A ROOT IN THIS UNFORTUNATE NUN..<br /><br />SHE TOLD ME THAT BISHOPS ARE CHOSEN BY POPE IN KERALA TO SNUFF OUT ANY WHISTLE BLOWERS BY CASH/ LAND OR FEAR .. IT WAS A WATER TIGHT SYSTEM..<br /><br />The Vatican instructed Catholic bishops around the world to cover up cases of sexual abuse or risk being thrown out of the Church.<br /><br />It focuses on sexual abuse initiated as part of the confessional relationship between a priest and a member of his congregation. But the instructions also cover what it calls the 'worst crime', described as an obscene act perpetrated by a cleric with 'youths of either sex<br /><br />The 69-page Latin document bearing the seal of Pope John XXIII was sent to every bishop in the world. The instructions outline a policy of 'strictest' secrecy in dealing with allegations of sexual abuse and threatens those who speak out with excommunication.<br /><br />They also call for the victim to take an oath of secrecy at the time of making a complaint to Church officials. It states that the instructions are to 'be diligently stored in the secret archives of the Curia [Vatican] as strictly confidential. Nor is it to be published nor added to with any commentaries.'<br /><br />I DONT NEED TO PROVE ANYTHING --BUT MY PHOTO INSIDE THE COLOSSEUM ( WEARING WRANGLER JACKET , LEVI JEANS AND YASHICA CAMERA ) WAS TAKEN THE SAME DAY..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br /><br />IN THE POST BELOW, YOU CAN SEE MY PHOTO ON THE STEPS OF ST PETERs CATHEDRAL VATICAN ON THE SAME DAY. THE TALL MAN WITH ME IS SECOND ENGINEER, A HINDU MALAYALI FROM CALICUT.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/the-rotating-statue-on-nemi-ship-on.html</span><br /><br />The pope has set guidelines for removing bishops who have been \u201cnegligent\u201d in addressing cases of abuse. This is all charade..<br /><br />There has been a long history of protecting highly placed Catholic leaders from charges of sexual abuse.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_30BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedBPvhD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br /><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_28T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedBPvhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_28TN\"></span></span></span><br /><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedBPvhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedBPvhD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_28TN\"></span></span><br /></span><br /><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_28TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_30b+seedBPvhD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_28B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5270560851422573945\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_7.html?showComment=1533686521119#c5270560851422573945\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 8, 2018 at 5:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br /><br />When reports surfaced in 1995 that Austrian Cardinal Hans Hermann Groer had molested monks and schoolboys, the sexual abuse was dismissed by Bishop Kurt Krenn as \u201cboyish pranks.\u201d It was proved that parents of child victims were paid \u201chush money\u201d to buy their silence. The allegations of sexual abuse against Cardinal Groer proved to be true.<br /><br />LISTEN , ABOVE IS JUST ONE OF THE THOUSANDS OF CASES..<br /><br />In another case from the late 1940s, Marcial Maciel, the Mexican founder of a religious order, The Legionaries of Christ, was a sexual abuser multiple times over. When allegations against Maciel were initially raised, John Paul II ignored them.<br /><br />Joseph Ratzinger, John Paul II\u2019s confident and later successor, remarked: \u201cOne can\u2019t put on trial such a close friend of the pope.\u201d<br /><br />Maciel avoided prosecution until his death in 2008.<br /><br />The hierarchical structure of the church made it difficult to bring high-ranking figures to justice.<br /><br />Superiors are given nearly absolute obedience, which makes the threshold for acting against them high. By the same token, superiors can often protect offending priests.<br /><br />It is a terrible sin for a bishop to commit or cover up a terrible crime such as rape or sexual abuse. You see, the Catholic Church is a divine institution necessary for salvation, then there are those who will protect its reputation at all costs.<br /><br />ASRAMA BAPU HAS BEEN FRAMED TO PROVE THAT SUCH THINGS HAPPEN IN HINDUISM TOO. ALMOST ALL HIS ROOTLESS VULNERABLE FOLLOWERS ARE NOW CHRISTIAN CONVERTS..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/03/holi-celebrations-immoral-attack-on.html</span><br /><br />There is a tipping point, however. The key moment leading to the resignation of Cardinal Law was a letter, signed by 58 priests, asking him to resign.<br /><br />While the priest that Cardinal Law protected, John Geoghan, was convicted of his crimes \u2013 and later killed in prison \u2013 Bernard Law himself never faced a court of justice.<br /><br />In fact, he was effectively promoted to a venerable position as head of one of Catholicism\u2019s most famous churches, Santa Maria Maggiore in Rome.<br /><br />For victims of sexual abuse that occurred under his tenure, Cardinal Law only offered only a general apology and a vague reference to his own \u201cshortcomings.\u201d<br /><br />THE KERALA BISHOP MADE LOT OF HOOO HAAA ABOUT NCW WANTING TO STOP CONFESSIONS IN CHURCH..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/kerala-nun-rape-audio-clip-of-priest-trying-to-bribe-nun-surfaces-case-registered/story-46dy2OsB6YSIYJoyuuur0L.html</span><br /><br />There is an international conspiracy by the Church to hush up sexual abuse issues. It is a devious attempt to conceal criminal conduct and is a blueprint for deception and concealment.<br /><br />Threatening excommunication to anybody who speaks out shows the lengths the most senior figures in the Vatican were prepared to go to prevent the information getting out to the public domain<br /><br />THREE BILLION USD PAY OUT IN THE POST BELOW IS GROSS UNDER ESTIMATION.. AND HENCE REQUIRES A MIDDLEMAN BETWEEN THE DEVOTEE AND HIS GOD..<br /><br />PROTESTANT BELIEVE THAT ONLY GOD CAN FORGIVE--NOT A BROKER POPE OF PADRE..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/03/protestant-christianity-created-by-jews.html</span><br />THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO REFERENCE IN THE BIBLE OLD OR NEW ABOUT CONFESSING TO A MIDDLEMAN PRIEST WITHIN THE CONFINED OF A CONFESSION BOX INSIDE THE CHURCH..<br /><br />BIBLE WANTS SINNERS TO CONFESS TO GOD DIRECT IN REPENTANCE..<br /><br />QUOTE: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness. 1 john 1.9\u2014UNQUOTE<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_28MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_28B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_29B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6260624235427538576\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_29M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. This was more of a political ploy..<br /><br />UTRIUSQUE SEXUS MEANS HERMAPHRODITE.. A PERSON WITH PENIS ( WITHOUT BALLS ) AND VAGINA ..<br /><br />THESE UNFORTUNATE PEOPLE WERE THEN BLACKMAILED FOR SEX BY CATHOLIC ELITES WHO ENGAGED IN SUCH DEVIANT PLEASURES ..<br /><br />CONFESSIONS WERE 100% SEXUAL IN NATURE AND WEALTHY GAY CLIENTSS USED TO WAIT OUTSIDE THE CHURCH..<br /><br />THE SEXUAL ORIENTATION OF THIS HERMAPHRODITE WAS WHAT WAS CONFESSED AS SOMETIME IT COULD SATISFY AN ANAL SEX HUMPING GAY-- OR EVEN A PERVERTED STRAIGHT AS IT HAD A VAGINA.. .<br /><br />LATER THIS CONFESSION WAS EXTENDED TO BOTH MALE AND FEMALE GENDERS.. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So, by\nway of your gut bacteria, it still wields a significant influence on human\nhealth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aside\nfrom a cancer link, Roundup\u2019s effect on gut bacteria also suggests the chemical\nmay play a significant role in digestive issues, obesity, autism, Alzheimer\u2019s\ndisease, depression, Parkinson\u2019s disease, liver diseases and many other chronic\nhealth problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Monsanto\nfiled a motion to have the case dismissed, saying the label is accurate because\n\u201cthe enzyme targeted is not produced by the human body or found in human cells\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE\nKNOW WHY DEEP STATE SPONSORED EX-CJI JS KHEHAR ( A USELESS SUPREME COURT JUDGE\n)<span style=\"mso-spacerun: yes;\">&nbsp; </span>WANTED WHITE JEW LAWYERS IN INDIA..\nNOW THIS PATHETIC FELLOW WHO SUPPORTED TRIPLE TALAQ WILL BE THE NEXT CHAIRMAN\nOF NHRC... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
